name: The People Le Havre
description:
Welcome to The People Le Havre!

Here, you can meet, sleep, have a drink and even work, in the heart of the most arty city in Normandy.

Solo, with friends or family, we have everything you need: enjoy our 4 to 6 person dormitories or 2 to 4 person studios.

Enjoy the view, share a board and dance the night away from our Rooftop Bar.

Bring out your best ideas in our The People Work spaces.

The People Le Havre is waiting for you, the opportunity to take a breath of fresh air for a few days!

description:

We are proud to welcome you in an environment respectful of nature, where every detail has been thought of for your comfort. May your stay with us be as pleasant as the sweet fragrance of a flower in full bloom.

Every evening, we invite you to join us at the Club to experience a moment of greed and conviviality around the guest table: the aperitivo, composed of a selection of local products, often organic and always good.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage at the property. Guests can also access a sauna and a fitness area for free and buy local products in the on-site shop. Computers are at guests' disposal in the business area.

name: ibis Lyon Gerland Musée des Confluences
description:
Located in the south of Lyon on the Rhone River Banks, 200 metres from the A7 and A6 motorway, ibis Lyon Gerland Musée des Confluences features a 24-hour reception, a bar and private parking available for an extra charge. Musée des Confluences is 600 metres away while Halle Tony Garnier is 200 metres from the hotel. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All of the air-conditioned rooms include an LCD TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and hairdryer. Some rooms feature views over Musée des Confluences.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. The bar serves breakfast until 12:00.

An express breakfast is also served from 06:30 to 12:00.

With a private terrace, ibis Lyon Gerland Musée des Confluences has luggage storage and a lift. The closest tram stop is 200 metres away, and Lyon Saint Exupéry Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Matmut Stadium is 1.5 km away. A garage is available for bicycles upon request.

name: Jolie chambre à louer - Vue Imprenable
description:
Boasting garden views, Jolie chambre à louer - Vue Imprenable features accommodation with a shared lounge and a balcony, around less than 1 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.2 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma.

The kitchen has a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, as well as coffee machine and kettle. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast.

Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lyon, like walking tours. Guests at Jolie chambre à louer - Vue Imprenable can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 5.4 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 23 km away.

name: Séjours & Affaires Lyon Saint-Nicolas
description:
Séjours & Affaires Lyon St-Nicolas is located in central Lyon, 750 metres from Part Dieu Train Station. The studios and apartments offer equipped kitchenettes and free WiFi access.

Each studio has a desk, a private bathroom and a TV, and the kitchenettes are equipped with cooking facilities, a fridge and a microwave.

The property offers free weekly cleaning and a meeting room. Hotel services available for an additional cost include parking and laundry facilities.

Place Bellecour and Lyon's Old Town can be accessed directly via metro from Garibaldi Metro Stop, 700 metres away.

name: Appartement Tromba - Welkeys
description:
Appartement Tromba - Welkeys is situated in the 3rd arr. District of Lyon, 3.2 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, 3.7 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon and 4.5 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Fourviere Roman Theatre is 4.7 km from Appartement Tromba - Welkeys, while Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is 5.1 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km from the property.

name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Gare Perrache - Confluence
description:
Campanile Lyon Centre - Gare Perrache - Confluence is located in Lyon, within 50 metres of Lyon-Perrache Railway and Metro Stations. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All rooms have air-conditioning and a flat-screen TV. There are tea and coffee making facilities. The private bathroom features a hairdryer.

For an additional cost, guests may enjoy a daily buffet breakfast including tea, coffee, bread, cereal, pastries, fruit salad and yoghurt. There is also a bar at the hotel and free newspapers are available.

Place Bellecour is a 13-minute walk from Campanile Lyon Centre - Gare Perrache - Confluence, while Lyon's Museum of Fine Arts is 12 minutes away by car. Lyon Airport is a 41-minute drive from the property.

name: Hôtel des Facultés
description:
Hotel des Facultés is located in central Lyon, 400 metres from the Jean Macé Metro Station and a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour.  It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

Guest rooms are equipped with heating and a TV, and some rooms have a private bathroom.

Facultés hotel is 1.5km from the Lyon-Perrache TGV Train Station.  The Rue de l’Université tram stop is just 300 metres from the hotel and Lyon Saint-Exupery Airport is 20km away.

name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône
description:
Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône offers free WiFi access. It is just a 2-minute walk from the Guillotière Metro Station and an 8-minute drive from the Part-Dieu Train Station.

Set over 8 floors, rooms at Campanile are decorated in a simple style and feature air conditioning. Please note that only the TV in the bar broadcasts satellite channels and Canal+. The private bathrooms are complete with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Four of the guest rooms are adapted for wheelchair access.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and an express check-in service. Free newspapers are available.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour and Rue de la République, Lyon’s main shopping street. The A6 and A7 are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Hotel ParkSaône
description:
Hotel ParkSaône is situated on the bank of the Saône river in Lyon. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, bar and terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a hot drinks tray and a flat-screen TV with Canal + and beIn Sports channels. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and free toiletries.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Lyon Convention Centre is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot
description:
Situated in Lyon, 200 metres from Musée de la Resistance, MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot features accommodation with a bar, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Fourvière is 3.1 km away.

All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom.

The hotel offers a continental buffet breakfast.

There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen. The terrace is only open during the breakfast service.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 2.9 km from MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot, while Musée des Confluences is 2.4km from the property. Perrache Train Station is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel du Parc
description:
Hotel Du Parc is located in central Lyon, 450 metres from Massena Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom.

Hotel Du Parc offers a daily buffet breakfast served in the hotel's breakfast room.

Parc hotel also provides a laundry and dry cleaning service.

Hotel Du Parc is within easy access of the new and old towns. The Parc de la Tete d’Or is 800 metres from the hotel and the Espace Tete d’Or Exhibition Centre is 400 metres away.

name: Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu
description:
Situated 3.5 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu offers accommodation with a balcony. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift. The property is fitted with an indoor pool and is set 500 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station. Facilities for disabled guests are also available.

At the aparthotel, the units include a desk and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also have free WiFi. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings and Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu can arrange a bicycle rental service.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 4.7 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km away.

name: Residence Traversant Elegant - Parking prive
description:
Featuring a patio with city views, a garden and a bar, Residence Traversant Elegant - Parking prive can be found in Lyon, close to Part-Dieu Train Station and 4 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lyon, like walking tours.

Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.5 km from Residence Traversant Elegant - Parking prive, while Fourviere Roman Theatre is 5.5 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 31 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Boutique Richelieu, Lyon Gare Part-Dieu
description:
Hôtel Boutique Richelieu, Lyon Gare Part-Dieu is located in Lyon's business district, an 8-minute walk from Lyon-Part-Dieu Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Accessible via a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower.

The hotel serves a continental breakfast every morning in the hotel dining room. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar and chose from a variety of room service snacks 24 hours a day.

Hôtel Boutique Richelieu, Lyon Gare Part-Dieu is a 14-minute walk from the Tête d'Or Park, while Cité Internationale and Lyon Convention Centre are a 10-minute drive away. Brotteaux Metro Station is 280 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club by HappyCulture
description:
Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club by HappyCulture is located on Lyon’s Presqu’île, a 6-minute walk from Perrache train and metro station. It has an on-site restaurant, as well as a shaded terrace and garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All the guest rooms at the Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club by HappyCulture Perrache are air conditioned and have a private bathroom, and flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A Buffet Breakfast is available daily. Guests can relax with a drink during the evenings in the hotel bar or on the terrace.

Set in the heart of the city, the hotel is 800 metres from Place Carnot and the E15/A6 motorway. The old town and Saint Jean Cathedral are 2.5 km away.  The tramway stop Suchet is 200 metres from the property. The property offers a preferential rate at the public parking, available a 4-minute walk away.

name: Pullman Lyon
description:
Situated in Lyon and with Part-Dieu Train Station reachable within 200 metres, Pullman Lyon features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units have a desk.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.8 km from Pullman Lyon, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.3 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 32 km away.

name: Première Classe Lyon Centre Gare Part Dieu
description:
Première Classe Lyon Centre Gare Part Dieu offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, 500 metres from the Lyon Part-Dieu Train, metro and bus station.

Rooms at this Premiere Classe hotel include a TV, work desk and en suite facilities with a shower, washbasin and toilet. All rooms are accessible by lift and can accommodate a children's cot.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning.

Première Classe Lyon Centre Gare Part Dieu is an 8-minute walk to Part Dieu shopping mall. It is a 10-minute metro or bus ride from Vieux Lyon and 26 km from Lyon Saint-Exupéry Airport.

name: Pilo Lyon
description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Lyon, Pilo Lyon provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also provide guests with a city view.

A buffet breakfast is available at Pilo Lyon.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, French and Italian.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, Fourviere Roman Theatre and Musée Miniature et Cinéma. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 36 km away.

name: Studio Le Cocon de Jacquard with Breakfast
description:
In a central area of Lyon, located within a short distance of Fourviere Roman Theatre and the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, Studio Le Cocon de Jacquard with Breakfast offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property is set 200 metres from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, 2 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 3.2 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

A continental breakfast is available at the apartment.

Musée des Confluences is 6.1 km from Studio Le Cocon de Jacquard with Breakfast, while Eurexpo is 17 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 32 km from the property.

name: Le Philippe, Appartement cosy au cœur de Lyon, 2 chambres
GuestReady - Beau Séjour à La Croix-Rousse
description:
GuestReady - Beau Séjour à La Croix-Rousse is located in the 4th arr. District of Lyon, 3.7 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre, 3.9 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma and 4 km from Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere. The property is set 4.6 km from Part-Dieu Train Station, 6.1 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 7.8 km from Musée des Confluences. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Eurexpo is 17 km from the apartment, while Groupama Stadium is 17 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 35 km away.

name: Residence Montempo Lyon Cite Internationale
description:
Residence Montempo Lyon Cite Internationale offers ApartHotel accommodation next to the Parc de la Tête d'Or, in the heart of the Congress Centre area and a 15-minute drive from the centre of Lyon. The Rhône river runs outside the residence and guests can enjoy the sun terrace with views of the park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All air-conditioned studios and apartments at the Residence Montempo Lyon Cite Internationale have a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave a dishwasher and a dining area. Each unit has a flat-screen satellite TV and a safety deposit box. All units also have a private bathroom with a shower, toilet and a hairdryer.

Residence Montempo serves a buffet breakfast daily. Guests can enjoy their breakfast in the dining area.

It offers a 24-hour front desk service.

Sights nearby include the Contemporary Art Museum and the Palais des Congrès de Lyon. Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 10 minutes away by bus.

name: Gîte Les Fourches
description:
Set in Baudinard in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, Gîte Les Fourches has a garden. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 45 km from ITER / Cadarache.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests can take advantage of the warm weather with the property's barbecue facilities.

Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 110 km away.

name: Terres de France - Résidence Côté Provence
description:
Set in Gréoux-les-Bains in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, Terres de France - Résidence Côté Provence features accommodation with access to a solarium. The property features pool and city views, and is 23 km from Golf du Luberon. The holiday park also offers free WiFi, free private parking and facilities for disabled guests.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, a microwave and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. The units at the holiday park feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.

The holiday park also provides an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness room for guests to relax in. Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Marseille Provence Airport is 90 km away.

name: Bnb Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B
description:
A recently renovated bed and breakfast in Castellane, Bnb Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B offers sun terrace, private parking and sports facilities. It is set 20 km from Château de Taulane Golf Course and offers full-day security. Guests can make use of the picnic area or the seasonal outdoor pool, or enjoy views of the mountain and garden.

At the bed and breakfast, the units come with a desk. Units are fitted with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and some have inner courtyard views. At the bed and breakfast, the units have bed linen and towels.

Continental and Italian breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

You can play tennis at the bed and breakfast, and the area is popular for walking tours. Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and Bnb Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B offers ski storage space.

Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 85 km from the property.

name: Villa Castellane
description:
Set in Bauduen in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, Villa Castellane has a garden. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 48 km from Saint-Endréol Golf Club.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 108 km from the property.

name: Auberge des Salles
description:
Situated in Les Salles-sur-Verdon, Auberge des Salles features a terrace with panoramic views of Lake de Sainte-Croix and the surrounding Verdon Natural Park. Hiking, fishing, and swimming are within 10 minutes' walk of the property.

Rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathrooms with either a bath or shower and a toilet. Some rooms have balconies with lake views and other rooms overlook the village and surrounding hills. A kettle is available upon request subject to availability.

The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.

A buffet breakfast with hot drinks, orange juice, croissants, fresh bread with jams, honey and butter is served daily for a supplement. There is a bar on site.

The entrance to the Verdon Gorge is 6 km away and the village of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is a 20-minute drive away. Les Arcs-Draguignan Train Station is 55 km away and the Hyeres Airport is 115 km away. Free private parking and free WiFi are available at the property.

name: Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon
description:
Situated in Baudinard and with ITER / Cadarache reachable within 44 km, Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon features a terrace, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and a restaurant.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon, rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 110 km from the property.

name: Verdon Appartement Notre "Chez Vous"
description:
Verdon Appartement Notre "Chez Vous" is a 2-star property situated in Aiguines. The property has lake and city views. Guests can enjoy quiet street views.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and kettle. Each unit includes a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and some have mountain views. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 116 km from the property.

name: "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée
description:
Chambre D'Hôtes "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée offers accommodation in Moustiers-Sainte-Marie.

Each room has a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Rooms have a private bathroom.

Gréoux-les-Bains is 28 km from Chambre D'Hôtes "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée, while Manosque is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 82 km from the property.

name: Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile
description:
Located in Les-Salles-sur-Verdon, Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile is just 200 metres from Sainte-Croix Lake and offers a garden and terrace. The Gorges du Verdon are 10 km away.

Decorated in a simple style, all rooms feature a wardrobe and private bathroom with free toiletries, while some also offer a balcony and views of the lake. Guest have access to the refrigerator.

A continental breakfast can be served each morning at Résidence Plein Voile. A bar, pizzeria and restaurant are conveniently situated just 50 metres from the property.

Watersports activities can be found 200 metres away at the lake and Moustiers Sainte-Marie is 12 km away. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the public areas and free public parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: La Maison du Courtil, Citron-Caramel
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, La Maison du Courtil, Citron-Caramel is located in Moustiers-Sainte-Marie. The property has city and inner courtyard views. The property is non-smoking and is situated 41 km from Digne Golf Course.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, like hiking.

Marseille Provence Airport is 123 km away.

name: Gabrielle hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Verdon National Park, Gabrielle hôtel is situated in the village of Aiguines. It overlooks Sainte Croix Lake, where you can go canoeing or rent pedal boats.

All rooms have an en-suite bathroom with a hairdryer, TV and electric blinds.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Gabrielle hôtel is surrounded by many hiking trails and guests can enjoy cycling, windsurfing or visit the vineyards of Provence.

name: Le Petit Grillo - Gite proche des gorges du Verdon
description:
Le Petit Grillo - Gite proche des gorges du Verdon is set in Allemagne-en-Provence and offers a casino and a garden. The air-conditioned accommodation is 35 km from Golf du Luberon, and guests can benefit from on-site private parking and complimentary WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 45 km from Digne Golf Course.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. This apartment also provides guests with a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

A coffee shop can be found on-site, and in the warmer months you can make use of the barbecue facilities.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Allemagne-en-Provence, like bike tours. Snorkelling, hiking and walking tours are possible within the area, and a water park is available on-site.

Marseille Provence Airport is 102 km away.

name: Camping La Ferme de Castellane
description:
This campsite is set on the river bank, located in the village of Castellane, within a 5-minute drive of the Verdon Gorge. Free WiFi is provided in public areas and the property has a table tennis table as well as a boules pitch.

A TV with cable channels and a private terrace feature in all the chalets and mobile homes, which have a simple décor with wooden furnishings. The en suite bathrooms are fitted with a shower. Located at the edge of the forest, all accommodation types offer mountain views.

Guests can enjoy a variety of relaxing massages onsite and upon request.

A microwave, fridge and hotplates are included in each kitchenette at Camping La Ferme de Castellane. There are barbecue facilities at the property.  The property has a heated swimming pool as well as unusual accommodation.

Additional services include a laundrette and there is a children’s playground. You can watch Canal+ channels in the TV room, which also has a library or play table football and board games.

The centre of Castellane is 2.3 km from the campsite and the city of Grasse is 65 km away. It is the starting point of the GR4 hiking path and there is a free, private parking available on site.

Unlimited coffee, tea and hot chocolate is served in the morning.

name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.

name: La casa Elisa Gîte T2 indépendant
description:
Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, 17 km from ITER / Cadarache and 23 km from Golf du Luberon, La casa Elisa Gîte T2 indépendant offers a garden and air conditioning. The holiday home also provides free WiFi, free private parking and facilities for disabled guests.

The holiday home with a terrace and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Marseille Provence Airport is 80 km away.

name: Les Canyons du Verdon
description:
Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities. Castillon Lake is just 4.5 km away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Decorated in fresh colours, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV. They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel. Castellane village is conveniently located 250 metres away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.

A conference room is available on request. It can accommodate up to 20 people.

Notre-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site. Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

name: Les Bastides de Chanteraine Hôtel de plein air, bungalows, lodges & spa
description:
Set in Aiguines, Les Bastides de Chanteraine Hôtel de plein air, bungalows, lodges & spa offers accommodation with seating area. This property offers access to a terrace, table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

Featuring views of the mountain, all units in the property come with private entrance and a heated pool. The units come with a coffee machine, while selected rooms here will provide you with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. The units feature bed linen.

À la carte and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries and juice are available. A family-friendly restaurant, coffee shop and bar can be found on-site.

The campground boasts a variety of wellness options, including spa facilities, wellness packages and yoga classes. Guests at the campground can enjoy darts on-site, or walking tours in the surroundings.

Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 113 km away.

name: Résidence Lou Cigaloun - ANA LOCATION
description:
Situated just 18 km from ITER / Cadarache, Résidence Lou Cigaloun - ANA LOCATION features accommodation in Gréoux-les-Bains with access to a garden, barbecue facilities, as well as a 24-hour front desk. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. This 2-star apartment offers private entrance.

Each unit features a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area and a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Gréoux-les-Bains, like cycling, fishing and hiking. If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings.

Golf du Luberon is 23 km from Résidence Lou Cigaloun - ANA LOCATION. Marseille Provence Airport is 80 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Le Colombier
description:
Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie village centre, Le Colombier is just 5 km from Sainte-Croix Lake. This Provencal house features a swim spa, 2 hot tubs and tennis court. Free WiFi is provided.

Le Colombier offers air-conditioned rooms with panoramic views of the valley or Moustiers rocks. Decorated with Provencal-style furniture, they each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The Colombier provides free private parking and a garage for cars, bicycles and motorcycles. Local leisure activities nearby include rafting, paragliding and canyoning.

name: Camping Les Framboiseilles
description:
Set in Castellane and only 17 km from Château de Taulane Golf Course, Camping Les Framboiseilles offers accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property features garden views. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground.

Certain units in the campground have private entrance and are equipped with wardrobe and outdoor furniture. Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

You can play table tennis at this 3-star campground, and the area is popular for hiking and walking tours. The campground has a picnic area and a terrace.

Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 82 km away.

name: Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence
description:
Located 500 metres from the village and 800 metres from the thermal baths,Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence consists of 3 small complexes. It includes 3 swimming pools and relaxation facilities.

The apartments at Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence are equipped with a kitchenette including hotplates, a microwave, an oven, and a dishwasher.

The apartments situated on the ground floor boast a private garden and all others feature their own terrace.

Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence boasts 2 outdoor swimming pools and 1 indoor swimming pool. Sports-enthusiasts will appreciate the residence’s fitness centre.

You can also enjoy unwinding in the spa with its hot tub, hammam and sauna.

name: La Clorinde
description:
Located in the heart of an olive grove, 800m from the village of Moustiers, La Clorinde is ideally situated to discover the Gorges du Verdon (1.5Km) and to appreciate the beauty of the lake of Sainte Croix (3Km) and the lavender fields.

The large, bright, quiet, air-conditioned rooms have a view on the garden and the mountains.

Breakfast (3 formulas), dinner, prepared with local products, will be served on the terrace and will make you appreciate the charms of the Provencal gastronomy.

We propose you, free of charge, a parking and a very powerful Wifi access. A laundry service is also available.

We speak 3 languages: French, English, Spanish

All your requests are welcome. La Clorinde, a haven of peace, will do everything possible to make your stay in Provence an unforgettable experience.

name: Les cabanes de Bourras
description:
Located within 44 km of Château de Taulane Golf Course in La Palud sur Verdon, Les cabanes de Bourras features accommodation with seating area. There is a private entrance at the campground for the convenience of those who stay. The campground provides rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

All units come with a terrace with mountain views, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a toaster, and a private bathroom with shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the campground, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the campground will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Palud sur Verdon, like cycling.

Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 108 km away.

name: B&B Auberge Verdon
description:
Offering a sun terrace and views of the mountain, Auberge Verdon is a B&B situated in La Palud in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, 90 km from Fréjus, at the beginning of the Route des Crètes. Free private parking is available on site.

Rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Grasse is 89 km from AUBERGE VERDON, while Gréoux-les-Bains is 58 km away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 110 km from the property.

name: Le Vieux Château
description:
Situated in an 18th-century building, Le Vieux Château features rooms with free Wi-Fi, a bar and a terrace. Set in the centre of Aiguines, it opens on a Provençal-style square with bars and shops.

With views of the village, all of the rooms are located on the 2nd floor and include a private bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

A French breakfast is served every morning. You can also enjoy an ice cream at the bar or try one of the Provençal specialties proposed at the hotel’s restaurant which is closed every Thursday evening and Friday all day.

You can go sailing on the Sainte Croix Lake, which is 8 km away, or visit the Museum of Prehistory in Quinson, a 40-minute drive away. Le Vieux Château is accessible via the A51 motorway.

name: B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo offers accommodation in Colmar, 10 km from Kaysersberg.  Free private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Colmar Expo is opposite the B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo, while House of the Heads is 3 km away. EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg is 61 km from the property. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Best Western Colmar Expo
description:
Best Western Colmar Expo is 4 km from the centre of Colmar and 2 km from the A35 motorway. This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a free private parking and a bar. (2 charging station for electric vehicles)

Serviced by a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV, free wifi and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

Breakfast is served every morning at Best Western Colmar Expo. There is also a bar with terrace on site where guests can enjoy snacks.

Best Western Colmar Expo is a 10-minute drive from the Wine Route of Alsace and right at the opposite of  Colmar Expo Exhibition Centre.

name: James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre
description:
James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre offers accommodation in Colmar, on the Alsation Wine Route. This Boutique Hotel offers a contemporary and modern decoration style. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Private parking is available on site.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre features free WiFi throughout the property.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre is located within a 5-minute walk of Colmar's Christmas markets. Strasbourg Airport is a 1-hour drive from the hotel.

name: L'ambassadeur - Colmar centre
description:
L'ambassadeur - Colmar centre offers self-catering apartments with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV.

Each apartment includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath or shower. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Guests are able to prepare their own meals at L'ambassadeur - Colmar centre. Each apartment has a kitchen with a microwave, an oven and a stove.

House of the Heads is 600 metres from the apartment while La Petite Venise is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 58 km from the property.

name: Villa Élyane
description:
Built in 1920, Villa Elyane is located in the centre of Colmar, just 300 metres from the Colmar Train Station. Guests can enjoy free bike rentals and can relax in the sauna on site.

The rooms at Villa Elyane are decorated in a contemporary style and offer free WiFi and air-conditioning. Each room has a seating area and some rooms offer a private terrace.

Every morning breakfast is served. Guests can prepare coffee in their room with a coffee machine.

Mulhouse is 50 km away and the Alsace Wine Road is 10 km away. Guests can relax in the old smoking room with a library and a 3D TV or in the lounge with a billiards table.

name: Maison Cliquot - Appartements Colmar Centre
description:
Featuring city views, Maison Cliquot - Appartements Colmar Centre is set in the Old Town district of Colmar, 300 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 4 km from Colmar Expo. Offering private parking, the apartment is less than 1 km from Colmar Train Station. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from House of the Heads.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also have free WiFi. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to Maison Cliquot - Appartements Colmar Centre.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 31 km from the accommodation, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 41 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 54 km from the property.

name: Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent
description:
Located in Colmar, just 1.6 km from the train station, Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent offers a fitness room and swimming pool with counter-current and massage jets. The property is 700 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 1 km from House of the Heads.

The accommodation features a seating area, flat-screen TV, wardrobe and private bathroom with a bath or shower. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and refrigerator.

A breakfast is available each morning at Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent and children can enjoy it at a reduced cost.  Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the accommodation.

Additional features include free WiFi access throughout and private parking is available upon prior reservation. Colmar Expo Centre is 3.3 km away and Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport is located 54 km from the accommodation.

name: La Semeuse Hurst
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, La Semeuse Hurst is an accommodation located in the centre of Colmar, just 700 metres from House of the Heads and 400 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property features quiet street views and is 3.1 km from Colmar Expo and 27 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle. The property is soundproof and is situated 1.6 km from Colmar Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and toaster, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Parc Expo Mulhouse is 42 km from the apartment, while Mulhouse Train Station is 42 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km from the property.

name: Hotel Saint-Martin
description:
Located in the heart of Colmar’s Old Town, close to the Petite Venise district and the famous Rue des Marchands, Saint-Martin offers rooms decorated in traditional Alsatian style.

All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a safe. They also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer, a bath or a shower.

You can enjoy relaxing in the hotel’s lounge and reading room. There is also a tourist information and free WiFi access.

Colmar Train Station is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Colmar Airport, 5 km from Saint-Martin.

name: Klipfel Little Venice
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Klipfel Little Venice is an accommodation located in Colmar, less than 1 km from House of the Heads and a 8-minute walk from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Colmar Train Station.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance. Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and the apartment offers ski storage space.

Colmar Expo is 4.2 km from Klipfel Little Venice, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 31 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km away.

name: Chambres d'hôtes Chez Caroline
description:
Well set in Colmar, Chambres d'hôtes Chez Caroline provides a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. There is a private entrance at the bed and breakfast for the convenience of those who stay. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All units are fitted with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms include a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave. At the bed and breakfast, all units have bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Chambres d'hôtes Chez Caroline include House of the Heads, Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and Colmar Train Station. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 56 km away.

name: Le Grand Lion Colmar Centre Parking Gratuit
description:
Situated 300 metres from House of the Heads and 1 km from Colmar Train Station in the centre of Colmar, Le Grand Lion Colmar Centre Parking Gratuit features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The spacious apartment has a terrace, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen. A flat-screen TV is available.

Colmar Expo is 4 km from the apartment, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 28 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km away.

name: Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel
description:
Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access. There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks. Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

name: Appartement Colmar Petite Venise
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Appartement Colmar Petite Venise is located in Colmar, 700 metres from House of the Heads and 300 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 1.3 km from Colmar Train Station, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also provide guests with free WiFi. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Colmar Expo is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 28 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 54 km from the property.

name: Felicita Vintage Appartements - Colmar City Center
description:
Felicita Appartements is located in Colmar. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with bath. An oven and coffee machine are also offered.

The apartment of the second floor offers a terrace and bike storage is available.

Popular points of interest near Felicita Appartements include Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, House of the Heads and The Dominican Church. The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the accommodation.

name: PAUL & PIA - Welcome Home Hotel
description:
This hotel is located 500 metres from Colmar Train Station and the Old Town. Colmar Christmas Market -  Place des Dominicains is 700 meters away.

All rooms have a satellite flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

There is also a bar and a 24-hour reception.

Guests can easily explore the medieval villages in the Alsace wine region and the Musée d'Unterlinden is 750 meters away. The Colmar-Houssen Airport is just 5 km from the Paul&Pia.

name: CHEZ CECILE Bed and Breakfast chez le VIGNERON
description:
Boasting a garden, CHEZ CECILE Bed and Breakfast chez le VIGNERON is a bed and breakfast situated in a historic building in the centre of Colmar, close to Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. There is a private entrance at the bed and breakfast for the convenience of those who stay. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Units include a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and some have city views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and the bed and breakfast can arrange a bicycle rental service.

House of the Heads is 500 metres from CHEZ CECILE Bed and Breakfast chez le VIGNERON, while Colmar Train Station is 1.5 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 56 km away.

name: Gites Du Ladhof
description:
Gites Du Ladhof has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Colmar, 1.5 km from House of the Heads. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Skiing, snorkelling and walking tours are possible within the area, and the apartment offers ski storage space.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.3 km from Gites Du Ladhof, while Colmar Expo is 2.5 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 56 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Appartement Luxueux Centre Ville
description:
Situated in the centre of Colmar, 90 metres from House of the Heads, the historic Appartement Luxueux Centre Ville features accommodation with free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property has garden and city views, and is 400 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. This 3-star apartment offers private entrance.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Colmar, like pub crawls.

Colmar Train Station is 1 km from Appartement Luxueux Centre Ville, while Colmar Expo is 4.2 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km away.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: Quiet Corner
description:
Featuring a patio with city views, a casino and a garden, Quiet Corner can be found in Colmar, close to Colmar Train Station and 1.4 km from House of the Heads. The property features quiet street views and is 1 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 3.8 km from Colmar Expo. The apartment provides a picnic area, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. This apartment also provides guests with a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Bike hire and car hire are available at the apartment and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. If you would like to discover the area, hiking and walking tours are possible in the surroundings.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 30 km from Quiet Corner, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 41 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km from the property.

name: LUCKY PLACE - PARKING - CENTRE - BALCON
description:
Located 600 metres from House of the Heads and less than 1 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church in the centre of Colmar, LUCKY PLACE - PARKING - CENTRE - BALCON provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Guests can benefit from a balcony and a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Colmar Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Colmar Expo is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 27 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 56 km from the property.

name: Suites Residences Spa
description:
Ideally set in Colmar, Suites Residences Spa offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. Each accommodation at the 5-star apartment has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a spa centre. There is private parking and the property provides an electric vehicle charging station.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The apartment has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include House of the Heads, Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and Colmar Train Station. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Petit loft des prisons
description:
Petit loft des prisons in Annecy features accommodation with free WiFi, 38 km from Bourget Lake, 43 km from Stade de Genève and 46 km from Jet d'Eau. The property is around 46 km from St. Pierre Cathedral, 47 km from Gare de Cornavin and 47 km from Halle Olympique d'Albertville. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 37 km from Rochexpo.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms fitted with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

United Nations Geneva is 48 km from the apartment, while PalExpo is 48 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 43 km away.

name: L'Albigny - Lovely Studio - 150 m beach
description:
Featuring city views, L'Albigny - Lovely Studio - 150 m beach offers accommodation with a balcony, around 39 km from Bourget Lake. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is set 33 km from Rochexpo.

The apartment is fitted with a TV. There is a seating area, a dining area and a kitchen complete with a dishwasher, a microwave and a fridge.

Skiing is possible within the area and L'Albigny - Lovely Studio - 150 m beach offers ski-to-door access.

Stade de Genève is 39 km from the accommodation, while Jet d'Eau is 42 km away.

name: Le Bel Abri
description:
Le Bel Abri is a hotel set in a former family house. It is located a 1-minute walk from Annecy Lake and a 6-minute drive from the city centre of Annecy. A sun terrace and free WiFi are available.

All accessed by a staircase, the rooms include a flat-screen TV, floor heating, air conditioning, soundproofing and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Some rooms have a balcony and views of the lake or the mountains. There is a room on the ground floor adapted to people with reduced mobility.

The restaurant's cuisine is inspired by international flavours. A bar is also available on site.

The property is 46 km from Geneva International Airport. Free public parking is available.

name: Le Cocon - 3 étoiles
description:
Situated in the centre of Annecy, Le Cocon - 3 étoiles features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property has city views and is 38 km from Bourget Lake and 43 km from Stade de Genève. The property is non-smoking and is set 37 km from Rochexpo.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a fridge and a stovetop, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Jet d'Eau is 46 km from the apartment, while St. Pierre Cathedral is 46 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 43 km away.

name: Annecy coeur de ville et du lac
description:
Situated 36 km from Rochexpo and 37 km from Bourget Lake in the centre of Annecy, Annecy coeur de ville et du lac features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property has mountain and garden views, and is 42 km from Stade de Genève. The property provides a 24-hour front desk.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Annecy, like fishing. Skiing, windsurfing and diving are possible within the area, and Annecy coeur de ville et du lac offers a ski school.

Jet d'Eau is 45 km from the accommodation, while St. Pierre Cathedral is 45 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 42 km away.

name: Le Pélican
description:
Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast is available at the property.

Bourget Lake is 38 km from Le Pélican, while Stade de Genève is 43 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 43 km away.

name: Atipik Hôtel
description:
Situated 200 metres from the shores of Lake Annecy, Atipik Hôtel is at the entrance of the medieval old town and pedestrian shopping streets. It offers en suite rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen TV with international and TNT channels is provided in all rooms. Each has a private bathroom with a shower.

Enjoy a breakfast buffet as a way to start your day before heading out to visit the surrounding area.

Annecy TGV Train Station is 250 metres from Atipik Hôte.

name: Hôtel du Château
description:
Hotel du Chateau is a hotel situated at the foot of Annecy Castle. It has views over the old town. The reception offers free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Chateau are simply decorated. They are equipped with a private bathroom, a telephone and a TV.

Continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy a drink or a packed lunch on the hotel’s panoramic terrace, where a microwave and kitchenware are made available.

Hotel du Chateau is just a 5-minute walk from Lake Annecy. The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

name: T1 Confortable à 2 Pas du Centre d'Annecy avec Parking et Terrasse - FR-1-432-44
description:
Featuring accommodation with a balcony, T1 Confortable à 2 Pas du Centre d'Annecy avec Parking et Terrasse - FR-1-432-44 is situated in Annecy. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 35 km from Rochexpo.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom. A TV is provided. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Bourget Lake is 36 km from T1 Confortable à 2 Pas du Centre d'Annecy avec Parking et Terrasse - FR-1-432-44, while Stade de Genève is 41 km away. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 41 km from the property.

name: Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare
description:
Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare offers pet-friendly accommodation in Annecy. The property is 300 metres from Annecy Train Station, and a 5-minute walk from the old town and the lake. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

The rooms are air-conditioned, have a flat-screen TV, a desk and include a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property, and guests can enjoy their breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace.

Palais de l’île is 500 metres from Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare, while Chateau d'Annecy is 600 metres from the property. Lyon Saint Exupery Airport is 120 km away.

name: appart du Vernay
description:
Appart du Vernay is located in Annecy, 36 km from Bourget Lake, 41 km from Stade de Genève, and 44 km from Jet d'Eau. The property is situated 44 km from St. Pierre Cathedral, 45 km from Gare de Cornavin and 46 km from United Nations Geneva. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Rochexpo is 35 km away.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

PalExpo is 46 km from the apartment, while CERN is 48 km away. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 41 km from the property.

name: Charmant appartement à 1 minute du lac
description:

name: Auberge du Rempart
description:
Offering views of the city, Auberge du Rempart is a family-run inn situated in the historic centre of Eguisheim in the Alsace Region.The property is 100 metres from Eguisheim Christmas Market.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer and a shower or a bath.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at an extra cost. Guests can also enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant or on the terrace during nice weather.

Basel Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim
description:
This hotel is located 200 metres from the city centre of Eguisheim, a 10-minute drive from Colmar. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and free private parking.

The rooms at the Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim are also equipped with TVs and some have private balconies.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast.

The Alsace wine route and the Vosges Mountains are easily accessible from Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim.

name: Gite Le Petit Malsbach Eguisheim
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Gite Le Petit Malsbach Eguisheim is an accommodation set in Eguisheim, 6.6 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 10 km from Colmar Expo. The air-conditioned accommodation is 5.3 km from Colmar Train Station, and guests can benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 6.1 km from House of the Heads.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 34 km from the apartment, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 38 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 54 km from the property.

name: L'Adresse - Rempart Sud - Eguisheim avec garage privé
description:
Situated in Eguisheim and only 6.1 km from Colmar Train Station, L'Adresse - Rempart Sud - Eguisheim avec garage privé features accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. The air-conditioned accommodation is 6.9 km from House of the Heads. Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 35 km away and Parc Expo Mulhouse is 39 km from the apartment.

The 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 7.3 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 10 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 54 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Chambre Pin Up Wings
description:
Located in Eguisheim, 5.3 km from Colmar Train Station and 6.1 km from House of the Heads, Chambre Pin Up Wings offers a terrace and air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 6.6 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The guest house is fitted with a flat-screen TV. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave and there is a private bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Colmar Expo is 9.2 km from the guest house, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 33 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 54 km from the property.

name: Les chambres du domaine
description:
Situated in Eguisheim, 5.5 km from Colmar Train Station, Les chambres du domaine features accommodation with a terrace, free WiFi and a housekeeping service. The property is located 6.3 km from House of the Heads, 6.7 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 10 km from Colmar Expo. Mulhouse Train Station is 41 km from the bed and breakfast.

Accessible via private entrance, all units have air conditioning, soundproofing, desk and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. A toaster and kettle are also available. At the bed and breakfast, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

An à la carte breakfast is available at the bed and breakfast.

Guests at Les chambres du domaine will be able to enjoy activities in and around Eguisheim, like hiking.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 35 km from the accommodation, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 38 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 54 km away.

name: Villa atmosphère PETIT DEJEUNER COMPRIS
description:
Set in Grenoble, 2.6 km from Grenoble Train Station and 3.5 km from WTC Grenoble, Villa atmosphère PETIT DEJEUNER COMPRIS offers spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The 4-star guest house has mountain views and is 7.1 km from AlpExpo. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Alps Stadium.

The guest house is fitted with a satellite flat-screen TV. The guest house offers bed linen, towels and housekeeping service.

Guests at the guest house can enjoy a continental breakfast. For those nights when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to have groceries delivered. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

The guest house has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

The Bastille Grenoble is 1.9 km from Villa atmosphère PETIT DEJEUNER COMPRIS, while Summum is 7.3 km from the property. Alpes–Isère Airport is 47 km away.

name: Novotel Grenoble Centre
description:
The Novotel is set at the heart of Grenoble's business district, only a few steps from the TGV train station. A tram stop is conveniently situated just outside the hotel. Many large companies are located close to the Novotel Grenoble Centre, and the historical centre is only a 10-minute drive away.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a minibar. Some rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Guests at the Novotel benefit from access to the hotel fitness centre. The hotel also features a restaurant, a bar, conference rooms, facilities for the disabled, and private parking at an additional cost. Up to 2 children (16 years and under) stay free when sharing with parents.

This hotel is also just a few kilometres from the Belledonne Massif and the Vercors Mountains.

name: Le Téléphérique, vue Bastille, 6 pers, 300 m Gare
description:
Offering river views, Le Téléphérique, vue Bastille, 6 pers, 300 m Gare is an accommodation set in Grenoble, 800 metres from WTC Grenoble and 5.4 km from AlpExpo. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 500 metres from Grenoble Train Station.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and mountain views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. The unit is soundproofed and includes a parquet floors as well as a fireplace. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Alps Stadium is 2.2 km from the apartment, while The Bastille Grenoble is 1.8 km away. Alpes–Isère Airport is 46 km from the property.

name: Campanile Grenoble Centre Gare
description:
Campanile Grenoble Centre Gare is located near a pedestrian and commercial street in Grenoble city centre. It features en suite rooms with free WiFi. The Train Station is 250 metres away.

With double glazing, each room at Campanile Grenoble Centre Gare includes an LCD TV with SMART TV and international channels and a private bathroom. A hairdryer is available at the reception, which is open 24 hours per day.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the air-conditioned breakfast room. Guests are invited to visit the Musée de Grenoble, which is 1.6 km away, and the Cathedral, which is a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

The Grenoble-Bastille cable car is 1 km away and the Palais des Sports is 2.5 km away. The Tramway stop is 40 metres away and Grenoble Airport is a 35-minute away. A private garage is available on site.

name: Residhotel Grenette
description:
Residhotel Grenette is located in central Grenoble, a 3-minute walk away from Place Victor Hugo. It offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi.

Each unit has a living area with work desk and cable TV.  The kitchenette features a hot-plate, microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker.

The Residhotel provides a daily buffet breakfast service which is served in its breakfast room.

The Grenette is only a 5-minute walk from the historic centre of Grenoble, and the train station is 800 metres away. Private parking spaces are limited and available at an extra charge upon reservation and depending on availability.

name: Tempologis Grenoble
description:
Tempologis Grenoble is located in Grenoble and offers self-catering accommodation. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 1 km from Paul Mistral Park and 2.5 km from Grenoble Train Station.

Apartments at Tempologis Grenoble feature a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy mountain view and city view from the room.

At Tempologis Grenoble you will find a garden. Other facilities like grocery deliveries, laundry facilities and a vending machine are offered.

Grenoble-Isère Airport is 43.1 km away.

name: Hostel Le Hüb Grenoble
description:
Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble – Comfort and Accessibility in the Heart of the Alps

Ideally located just a 5-minute walk from the train station and the Europole district, and 5 minutes by tram from the Presqu'île scientifique, Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble is the perfect place for a business or family stay in complete serenity. The city center is easily accessible in just 15 minutes, making it a strategic location for exploring Grenoble and its surroundings.

Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the property as well as private on-site parking. Every morning, a varied buffet breakfast is available to start the day right. For a relaxing break, guests can also take advantage of a pleasant terrace with sun loungers, perfect for unwinding after a day of work or sightseeing.

With the first ski resorts just 45 minutes away by car or public transport, Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble is the ideal base for exploring the Grésivaudan Valley, discovering the three iconic mountain ranges – Vercors, Chartreuse, and Belledonne – and enjoying outdoor activities such as hiking and skiing. Whether you're visiting for business, leisure, or a stopover to explore the region, our establishment offers a warm and functional setting, perfectly suited to your needs.

name: Le Bon Quai
description:
Le Bon Quai features a terrace and is set in Grenoble, within just 1.1 km of WTC Grenoble and 1.6 km of The Bastille Grenoble. It is situated 5.9 km from AlpExpo and features a lift. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 800 metres from Grenoble Train Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Alps Stadium is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Summum is 6.1 km away. Alpes–Isère Airport is 45 km from the property.

name: Le Grand Hôtel Grenoble, BW Premier Collection by Best Western
description:
In the heart of the historic city centre of the Capital of the Alps, the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection is waiting to welcome you to an unforgettable experience.

Whether you are on a business trip or a sporting getaway, our attentive and dedicated team is here to offer you a quality of service that lives up to your expectations and up-to-date facilities.

Relax in our newly refurbished rooms and suites. Enjoy a breakfast of fresh, local and seasonal produce. Bring your best projects to life in our coworking space.
At the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection, every detail is carefully orchestrated to make your stay an unforgettable experience. We look forward to welcoming you and offering you an exceptional stay in Grenoble.

Our hotel is located in the heart of a pedestrianised street, and can be reached by public transport or by car by parking in the Saint-Claire Les Halles private car park, formerly the Lafayette car park (preferential rate).

name: Appartements Residilaverde Gare
description:
Offering a terrace and mountain view, Appartements Residilaverde Gare is situated in Grenoble, 300 metres from Grenoble Train Station and 600 metres from WTC Grenoble. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. This 3-star apartment offers private entrance.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

AlpExpo is 5.7 km from the apartment, while Alps Stadium is 2.5 km from the property. Alpes–Isère Airport is 46 km away.

name: Le Cocon de la Bastille - DaLoc
description:
In the Grenoble City Centre district of Grenoble, close to WTC Grenoble, Le Cocon de la Bastille - DaLoc features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is around 5.5 km from AlpExpo, 1.7 km from Alps Stadium and 1.8 km from The Bastille Grenoble. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Grenoble Train Station.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.
