You can play billiards at the apartment.

Summum is 5.7 km from Le Cocon de la Bastille - DaLoc, while Col de Parménie is 33 km away. Alpes–Isère Airport is 46 km from the property.

name: Kyriad Grenoble Centre
description:
Located 200 metres from Stade Lesdiguières, Kyriad Grenoble Centre offers 3-star accommodation with 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Alpexpo convention centre is 3 km away from the property. A private car park under video surveillance is available for guests and is free of charge.

All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, including Canal+. The private bathrooms come with a bath and free toiletries. Tea and coffee making facilities are provided.

Room service and bar access are available 24/7 and the hotel serves a buffet breakfast every day.

La Bastille Grenoble cable-car is 4 km from the accommodation, while  Grenoble train station is 3 km away and accessible in 10 minutes with the tramway. Grenoble - Isère Airport is 46 km away.

name: RockyPop Grenoble Hotel
description:
Situated in Grenoble, 1.6 km from Grenoble Train Station, RockyPop Grenoble Hotel features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The property is 1.9 km from WTC Grenoble, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available.

Speaking English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

AlpExpo is 4.8 km from RockyPop Grenoble Hotel, while Alps Stadium is less than 1 km from the property. Alpes–Isère Airport is 48 km away.

name: Maison Barbillon Grenoble
description:
Maison Barbillon Grenoble is located in Grenoble, just 100 metres from the train station. It offers comfortable guest rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi Internet access.

Guest rooms at the Maison Barbillon Grenoble have an authentic and elegant décor and feature a private bathroom including a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Maison Barbillon is accessible via the A480 motorway. The hotel is located beside Grenoble World Trade Centre and Saint-André Cathedral is just a 13-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre
description:
Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre is set in the heart of Grenoble, opposite the gardens of Place Victor Hugo. It is just a 1-minute walk to the Victor Hugo tram stop and offers free WiFi and an onsite bar .

All the rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They feature a desk, a LCD satellite TV and a DVD player. The private bathrooms come with free toiletries. Some rooms also have a hydro-massage bathtub and a private balcony with views over the Vercors mountain range.

A buffet breakfast is available every day and includes hot, cold, sweet and savoury options. An other continental breakfast option consisting of a hot drink, a juice, a pasty, bread, butter and jam is also available.

An underground car park is available nearby at an extra charge.  The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Terminus
description:
Located in Grenoble, the Hôtel Terminus is opposite the bus and SNCF train stations. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The Hôtel Terminus Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and a currency exchange service.

The Terminus is 5 minutes from the World Trade Centre and 1 kilometre from the A48 motorway, which provides easy access to Lyon and Geneva.

Guests can use the hotel’s bicycle and car rental services to explore Grenoble and the Rhone-Alpes region.

name: Magnifique T2 refait à neuf - Calme & Tout Equipé avec Parking
description:
Magnifique T2 refait à neuf - Calme & Tout Equipé avec Parking is situated in Grenoble, less than 1 km from WTC Grenoble, 6.1 km from AlpExpo, as well as 2.9 km from Alps Stadium. It is located 600 metres from Grenoble Train Station and features a lift. The apartment also provides free WiFi, free private parking and facilities for disabled guests.

The accommodation is non-smoking.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

The Bastille Grenoble is 4.6 km from the apartment, while Summum is 6.3 km away. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 45 km from Magnifique T2 refait à neuf - Calme & Tout Equipé avec Parking.

name: The Babel Community Hôtel - Grenoble Bastille
description:
Situated conveniently in Grenoble, The Babel Community Hôtel - Grenoble Bastille offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. The property features mountain and garden views, and is 1.9 km from Grenoble Train Station. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units at the aparthotel feature air conditioning and a desk.

At the aparthotel, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner and lunch and serves local cuisine. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

A bicycle rental service is available at The Babel Community Hôtel - Grenoble Bastille.

WTC Grenoble is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while AlpExpo is 6.3 km away. Alpes–Isère Airport is 46 km from the property.

name: - N26- Studio calme et lumineux cœur de ville
description:
- N26- Studio calme et lumineux cœur de ville is located in the centre of Besançon, close to Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Time museum of Besançon. The property is situated 4.6 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 600 metres from Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The property provides a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a stovetop, and 1 bathroom with slippers. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon is 700 metres from the apartment, while Besançon Vesoul University is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from - N26- Studio calme et lumineux cœur de ville.

name: Charmant cocon centre historique
description:
Located in Besançon, 1.9 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station and 5.2 km from Micropolis, Charmant cocon centre historique provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. This apartment is 14 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 6 km from Besançon Vesoul University. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 1.2 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchenette, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon, Time museum of Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Charmant cocon centre historique.

name: ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare
description:
Located in Besançon, just 100 metres from Gare de la Viotte Train Station, ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour access.

Each room is air-conditioned and includes a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily.

The palace Granvelle is 2 km from the hotel, and the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Citadel Vaubon is 2.5 km away. Besançon town centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel SPA Husseren Collections - Proche Colmar - Eguisheim
description:
The hotel, with terraces southerly oriented, is located between vineyards and forest, at the foothills of the ruins of the three castles in the heart of Alsace, on the wine-road, 6 km from Colmar, 70 km from Strasbourg.

The establishment boasts a bistronomic restaurant, "Bain de Forêt", with a terrace featuring forest views. Guests can also enjoy an indoor swimming pool, a sauna, and bright seminar rooms with professional material and Wi-Fi access.

Staff at the Hotel Restaurant & Spa Husseren Collections speak English, German, Danish and Italian. Nine charging stations (including 3 tesla) for electric cars are available at this property.

Parking is available and for free.

name: Appartement 4 prsn Au pied de la Citadelle
description:
Right in the centre of Besançon, situated within a short distance of Besançon-Mouillère train station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon, Appartement 4 prsn Au pied de la Citadelle offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. The property is around 7.5 km from Micropolis, 14 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 1.1 km from Time museum of Besançon. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station.

The recently renovated apartment has 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Besançon Vesoul University is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Appartement 4 prsn Au pied de la Citadelle.

name: L'adresse à Besançon
description:
Situated in Besançon, in a historic building, less than 1 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, L'adresse à Besançon is an apartment with a garden and barbecue facilities. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property provides a children's playground and outdoor furniture.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some fruits and chocolates or cookies. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

For visitors looking to embark on day trips to nearby landmarks, the apartment features a selection of packed lunches.

The apartment has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near L'adresse à Besançon include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Time museum of Besançon. Dole-Jura Airport is 63 km from the property.

name: 1924 Hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Grenoble on a quiet street, only 450 metres from the SNCF train station and offers free WiFi, service clean, comfortable rooms with modern facilities and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere.

All the cosy guest rooms are equipped with all modern amneties, en suite facilities, soundproofing and satellite TV. All rooms are served by a small lift. Some allow you to see the mountain Vercors.

 The helpful staff at this delightful hotel will help you to make the most of your visit. Local and Bio breakfast is served every morning. Guests can find restaurants nearby.

Explore Grenoble on foot, with our bikes available, or using the excellent public transport links. Guests will appreciate the tramwa stop just a stone's throw from the hotel, providing easy access to the city's business districts and famous sites

name: Temis hôtel anciennement All Suites Besançon
description:
Situated in Besançon, 3.3 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Temis hôtel anciennement All Suites Besançon features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. Built in 2010, this 3-star hotel is within 4.4 km of Besançon-Mouillère train station and 5.7 km of Micropolis. The hotel has a sauna, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 10 km from Temis hôtel anciennement All Suites Besançon, while Besançon Vesoul University is 1.2 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 61 km away.

name: Hotel Vauban
description:
Located in Besançon, Hotel Vauban a 2-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and an 18-minute walk from the Citadel of Besançon. It offers free internet access, a 24-hour front desk and a terrace.

Serviced by a lift, all the soundproofed rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a telephone. The bathroom is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

Both a continental and a buffet breakfast are served every morning at Hotel Vauban.  The property has 2 restaurants: an Italian and traditional meals are served.

Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. The hotel is a 5-minute drive from Besançon Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Madeleine Church.

name: L'Amour d'Or Centre Historique
description:
Right in the centre of Besançon, situated within a short distance of Besançon-Mouillère train station and Besancon Viotte Train Station, L'Amour d'Or Centre Historique offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This recently renovated apartment is located 5 km from Micropolis and 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. Set in the Besancon Old Town district, the apartment is within 6.1 km of Besançon Vesoul University.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the inner courtyard views. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Time museum of Besançon, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from L'Amour d'Or Centre Historique.

name: Hotel Régina
description:
Hotel Régina is situated conveniently in Besançon, and features a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is set 4.8 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 500 metres from Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have garden views. The units feature a wardrobe.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Régina.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Time museum of Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Hotel Régina.

name: Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa
description:
Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa offers accommodation 50 metres from Viotte train station and just 15 minutes' walking distance from the historic city centre of Besançon. Many rooms open onto an inner garden.

All the rooms come with ensuite facilities, satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room . Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

name: Besançon: charmant duplex au pied de la citadelle
description:
Set in the centre of Besançon, just 1.2 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station and 2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Besançon: charmant duplex au pied de la citadelle offers accommodation with inner courtyard views and free WiFi. Located around 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station, the apartment is also 5.7 km away from Besançon Vesoul University. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.9 km from Micropolis.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Time museum of Besançon, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Besançon: charmant duplex au pied de la citadelle.

name: Best Western Hotel Fontaine Argent
description:
Set less than 1 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station, Best Western Hotel Fontaine Argent offers 3-star accommodation in Besançon and has a terrace. The property is around 6.6 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 1.4 km from Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Best Western Hotel Fontaine Argent include Besancon Viotte Train Station, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Time museum of Besançon. Dole-Jura Airport is 64 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage
description:
Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage, formerly the Clarisses Monestary, is located in the historic district of Besançon, 500 metres from the citadel's ancient walls. It offers views of the tree-lined park, the medieval walls, the city and the Doubs Valley.

All of the rooms feature parquet flooring and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. They also have a flat-screen TV, telephone and a desk. Some rooms offer a view on the garden and on the city.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area, on the terrace or can be brought to your guest room upon request. You can also relax on the west-facing terrace with a drink from the bar. Guest can access the spa upon reservation and for an additional fee.

Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage is a 10-minute walk from the Musée du Temps and just 2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station. Shops and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Private parking is available at a surcharge and free WiFi internet access is provided.

name: Hotel Du Nord
description:
This hotel is set in the heart of Besançon, just 700 metres from the banks of the Doubs River. Guests have free Wi-Fi internet access and are invited to relax in the hotel's lounge bar.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each of the simply decorated guest rooms. The rooms are serviced by a lift and include en suite bathrooms.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast, including fresh orange juice and regional specialities, can be enjoyed in Hotel du Nord's breakfast area.

The Church of Sainte-Madeleine is a 10-minute walk away and the Besançon-Viotte Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. The Besançon Museum of Fine Arts and Archeology is just 450 metres away.

A bike box is available on site, free of charge for bikes, charges may apply for motorbikes.

name: Les Fabuleux appartements du Coeur de ville - Place Victor Hugo
description:
Les Fabuleux appartements du Coeur de ville - Place Victor Hugo provides accommodation within 200 metres of the centre of Besançon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This apartment features free private parking and a minimarket. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a private bathroom and have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like cycling, fishing and hiking. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at Les Fabuleux appartements du Coeur de ville - Place Victor Hugo.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. Dole-Jura Airport is 64 km away.

name: Comfort Aparthotel Besancon Hauts du Chazal
description:
Situated in Besançon and within 4.1 km of Micropolis, Comfort Aparthotel Besancon Hauts du Chazal has a terrace, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is located 7.6 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, 8.7 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station and 15 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

All guest rooms at the hotel are fitted with a TV and a kitchenette. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at Comfort Aparthotel Besancon Hauts du Chazal.

Dole Train Station is 46 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Vesoul University is 5 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 54 km away.

name: Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City
description:
This Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is located in Besançon and offers studios and apartments with free WiFi access. It is next to the Doubs River and 2 km from the town’s train station.

Accommodation at the Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is serviced by a lift and has a living room with, free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. Each apartment also has, wire internet access and a kitchenette equipped with a microwave.

Breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room. This residence also provides a bike storage room, laundry facilities, a garage and free Wi-Fi at the reception.

The Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is a 10-minute walk from the city centre and 1.5 km from the Cathedral Saint-Jean. A Tramway Station can be reached within a 2-minute walk and provides direct access to Besançon Viotte Train Station.

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

name: Mercure Besancon Parc Micaud - Hotel & Bar
description:
This Hotel Mercure is situated in the city centre of Besancon in the casino garden on the Doubs River and opposite the Micaud Park.

Guests can enjoy a hike along the Doubs, or enjoy a boat cruise.

There are 91 air-conditioned guestrooms, all non-smoking, equipped with clean, private bathrooms and flat screen satellite TV.

L’Instant, the hotel bar, is open until 23:00.

There is a casino, a fitness centre and a karaoke bar within 3 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Besançon Centre la City
description:
Located on the banks of the Doubs River within the business complex known as La City, this ibis hotel is a 10-minute walk from Besançon city centre and its museums and a 35-minute walk from Citadelle.

The ibis Besançon La City offers air-conditioned rooms, 4 of which are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. The Bistro Régent restaurant offers a bistro menu based on fresh produce.

With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel offers secure underground parking at an extra fee.

name: ibis Styles Besançon
description:
Conveniently located in a park, ibis Styles Besançon is a 15-minute walk from the TGV Train Station and the centre of Besançon. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and contemporary in style. They include an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning at this hotel. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or have dinner at the hotel's restaurant. A children's playground and meeting rooms are also available on site.

Providing free private parking, the property has a 24-hour reception. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Parc des Expositions Micropolis and just 3.7 km away from Citadel of Besançonet, which is one of the UNESCO World Heritage Sites.

name: ibis Besançon Centre Ville
description:
Located in the old town of Besançon, ibis Besançon Centre Ville is 500 metres from Viotte Train Station and both the Vauban Citadel and the Museum of Fine Arts can be found within a 20-minute walk. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a 24-hour front desk and a 24-hour snack bar.

All the air-conditioned rooms at ibis Besançon Centre Ville feature wooden floors, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. The private bathroom includes a shower and heated towel rail.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

This property is 18 km from the A36 motorway and private parking is available on site, at an extra cost and subject to availability.

name: Hôtel de Paris
description:
Located in the centre of Besançon, Hôtel de Paris offers contemporary décor, a 24-hour reception and terrace. The Besançon Citadelle is just a 15-minute walk away. Vesoul is 48 km from the property.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, wardrobe and telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hôtel de Paris. A traditional restaurants can be found within walking distance.

The fine arts museum is just a 5-minute walk away and Besançon Franche-Comté TGV Train Station is 12 km from the hotel. Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and free wired internet.

name: Au Duplex d'Or Centre Historique
description:
In the centre of Besançon, located within a short distance of Besançon-Mouillère train station and Besancon Viotte Train Station, Au Duplex d'Or Centre Historique offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. This recently renovated apartment is located 5 km from Micropolis and 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. Outdoor seating is also available at the apartment.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some chocolates or cookies. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near Au Duplex d'Or Centre Historique include Time museum of Besançon, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. Dole-Jura Airport is 60 km away.

name: Hôtel particulier Maleteste
description: This apartment comprises 1 living room with a sofa bed ,1 separate bedroom and 1 bathroom with a shower and free toiletrie. The kitchen is equiped with a refrigerator, kitchenware and a microwave. The apartment provides a coffee maker, a TV with cable channels, as well as garden views. The unit offers 2 beds.

name: Le Comte - Heart of Dijon - With AC
description:
A recently renovated property, Le Comte - Heart of Dijon - With AC is located in Dijon near Dijon Congrexpo, Dijon Train Station and Foch-Gare Tramway Station. It is situated 3.8 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station and offers full-day security. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Saint-Philibert Church.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Universite Tramway Station is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Zénith de Dijon is 4.6 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Studio le Petit Bareuzai
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Studio le Petit Bareuzai is an accommodation located in Dijon, 1.1 km from Dijon Train Station and 1 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station. The property is around 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church, 3.8 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station and 4.1 km from Universite Tramway Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Dijon Congrexpo is 1.3 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Zénith de Dijon is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Lake Kir is 5.9 km away.

name: Monseigneur Dijon central & design avec parking
description:
Set in Dijon and only 700 metres from Dijon Train Station, Monseigneur Dijon central & design avec parking offers accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is situated 1.1 km from Saint-Philibert Church, 2.3 km from Dijon Congrexpo and 4.9 km from Lake Kir. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station.

The recently renovated apartment comes with 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some chocolates or cookies. The property offers quiet street views.

CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Universite Tramway Station is 5.2 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Maison Philippe Le Bon
description:
Set in the heart of the historic centre of Dijon, Maison Philippe Le Bon is 300 metres from Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne. Free WiFi in all rooms and all public areas of the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Maison Philippe Le Bon have a private bathroom and flat screen TV. Rooms offer views over the city of Dijon, the interior garden or Gothic courtyard or over rue Sainte Anne.

Restaurant La Closerie serves inventive, seasonal gourmet cuisine, complemented by an excellent wine list featuring many local wines. La Closerie offers elegant dining in a setting dating back to the 17th century, with original floortiles, exposed beams and rustic stonework, yet infused with contemporary touches.

In the summertime, lunch and dinner can be served in the hotel's private garden. A full buffet breakfast is served daily. Please note that our restaurant will be closed from the 1st January 2025 until 28th February 2025 as it will be undergoing renovations. We are still providing breakfast, but as room service only.

Guests at Maison Philippe Le Bon can explore the historical centre, its quaint streets and squares, while visiting Les Halles market, a wide variety of museums and original boutiques and shops.

Gare de Dijon-Ville train station is a 5-minute drive or a 15-minute walk away from Maison Philippe Le Bon.

name: JunglAppart - Votre Refuge Jungle Proche de la Gare et du Centre-Ville, avec Garage
description:
JunglAppart - Votre Refuge Jungle Proche de la Gare et du Centre-Ville, avec Garage is located in Dijon, 100 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station, 600 metres from Saint-Philibert Church, and 2.1 km from Dijon Congrexpo. This apartment features free private parking, a lift and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Dijon Train Station.

The recently renovated apartment features 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and microwave, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

Lake Kir is 4.2 km from the apartment, while Chenove Centre Tramway Station is 4.7 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 51 km away.

name: Les Burgondes
description:
In the Old Town district of Dijon, close to Dijon Congrexpo, Les Burgondes features a shared lounge and a washing machine. It is set 2.8 km from Universite Tramway Station and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Saint-Philibert Church.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Featuring free private parking, this 3-star apartment also features free WiFi. The property has an outdoor dining area.

CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Dijon Train Station is 1.8 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 49 km away.

name: Appartement Le Louvre
description:
In the Old Town district of Dijon, close to Dijon Congrexpo, Appartement Le Louvre has a garden and a washing machine. The property is located 2.9 km from Universite Tramway Station, 4.6 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station and 4.7 km from Zénith de Dijon. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from Saint-Philibert Church.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. Offering free private parking, this 3-star apartment also features free WiFi. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station, Dijon Train Station and Foch-Gare Tramway Station. Dole-Jura Airport is 49 km from the property.

name: Appart Cosy et Spacieux Centre Historique avec Parking Gratuit
description:
Located in Dijon and only 1.3 km from Dijon Congrexpo, Appart Cosy et Spacieux Centre Historique avec Parking Gratuit provides accommodation with city views, free WiFi and free private parking. This recently renovated apartment is located 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church and 1.3 km from Dijon Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with an a bath or shower. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

A bar can be found on-site.

CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Universite Tramway Station is 3.4 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 50 km from the property.

name: Cosy T2 31m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon - Gare et Darcy
description:
Offering city views, Cosy T2 31m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon - Gare et Darcy is an accommodation located in Dijon, 300 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station and 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church. Among the facilities at this property are a minimarket and bicycle parking, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Dijon Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Dijon, like fishing. Outdoor play equipment is also available at Cosy T2 31m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon - Gare et Darcy, while guests can also relax in the garden.

Dijon Congrexpo is 2 km from the accommodation, while Lake Kir is 4.4 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 51 km from the property.

name: ibis Styles Dijon Central
description:
Set in a pedestrian district in the heart of Dijon’s historic area, ibis Styles Dijon Central is just 1 km from Dijon Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

The ibis Styles Dijon Central boasts air-conditioned and soundproofed guest rooms, as well as a conference room enjoying the support of a professional staff and a reliable organization.

The success of the ibis Styles Dijon Central is closely linked to its gastronomic restaurant, Le Central and its brasserie-style restaurant. After a tasty meal, you can discover the city of Dijon and its countless landmarks.

The Palace of the Dukes of Burgundy is 400 metres from the hotel.

name: Dijon hypercentre - Loge Buffon
description:
Dijon hypercentre - Loge Buffon is set in the Old Town district of Dijon, less than 1 km from Saint-Philibert Church, a 17-minute walk from Dijon Train Station and 1.4 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station. Featuring city and quiet street views, this apartment also includes free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Dijon Congrexpo.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Universite Tramway Station is 3.1 km from the apartment, while CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 3.2 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 50 km away.

name: Hôtel République
description:
This 18th-century coaching hotel is located in a peaceful street in the historical centre of Dijon. It offers a modern and elegant setting and free Wi-Fi access.

Hotel République features rooms decorated with warm colours to offer a cosy atmosphere. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

Guests can relax on the terrace at the République Hotel. A buffet breakfast is served daily.

Dijon-Ville Train Station is less than a 15-minute walk away, or a 5-minute tram ride from République Tram Stop. Hotel République is 900 metres from Musee de Beaux-Arts de Dijon and an 8-minute walk from Dijon Cathedral.

name: Oceania Le Jura Dijon
description:
The Hôtel Le Jura is located in the city centre, 200 metres from the train station and a 10-minute tram ride from the Palais de Congrès. The hotel offers rooms with a garden view and free WiFi internet access.

Most of the spacious guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable and are soundproofed.

The Hôtel Le Jura serves a buffet breakfast, which can be taken in the guest rooms. You can also enjoy a drink from the bar and there are vending machines available.

Guests can enjoy an indoor heated swimming pool, a hammam and a fitness room.

name: Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers
description:
Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers is located in the historic centre of Dijon. The aparthotel offers en suite rooms and self-catering accommodations. Guests can relax in the garden or in the steam bath.

All of the accommodations at Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers have a private shower room with free toiletries and hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access and a cable TV are also available.

The apartments have an equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave and an electric kettle. Restaurants and bars can be found within a walking distance.

The property is 500 metres from the Palais des Ducs and Fines Arts Museum, and 1.50 km from Dijon ville train station. Dijon Congrexpo is 1.5 km away.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo
description:
Located within a walking distance from the historic centre of Dijon and 650 metres from the train station, Hotel Victor Hugo offers a garden and rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

Some of the heated rooms at Hotel Victor Hugo have a view of the garden. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. It can be served in the dining room which features wooden furniture or in the comfort of your room.

The hotel is 500 metres from Darcy Square and 800 metres from the cathedral. There is a private car park on site, available at an additional cost.

name: Residhome Dijon Cité Des Vignes
description:
Set less than 1 km from Dijon Train Station, a 10-minute walk from Foch-Gare Tramway Station and 3.1 km from Dijon Congrexpo, Residhome Dijon Cité Des Vignes offers accommodation located in Dijon. It is situated less than 1 km from Saint-Philibert Church and features a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchenette including a dishwasher, microwave, fridge and a stovetop. Kitchenware and kettle are also offered. At the aparthotel, units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and cheese are available.

Chenove Centre Tramway Station is 3.8 km from the aparthotel, while Universite Tramway Station is 4.2 km from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 50 km away.

name: Best Western Citadelle
description:
The Best Western Citadelle is located in the historic city center of Besançon, a 5-minute walk from the Doubs River and the Citadelle. Free Wi-Fi is available in the rooms.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a television with Canal+ channels. The private bathroom is equipped with solar-heated water. Additionally, the establishment offers rooms adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

The hotel serves breakfast every morning for an additional fee. You can enjoy it in your room or as a buffet in the dining room. Room service is also available.

The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space. An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.

Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).

The establishment is 5 km from the Micropolis convention center. Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge. Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

name: Nomad Hotel Dijon
description:
Set in Dijon, 300 metres from Dijon Train Station, Nomad Hotel Dijon offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a TV with satellite channels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at Nomad Hotel Dijon.

At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of an indoor swimming pool.

Foch-Gare Tramway Station is 300 metres from Nomad Hotel Dijon, while Saint-Philibert Church is 700 metres from the property. Dole-Jura Airport is 51 km away.

name: Hotel Le Jacquemart
description:
In the centre of Dijon, capital of Burgundy, close to the Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne, Hotel Le Jacquemart enjoys a privileged location in the district of the Antique shops.

Whether on a holiday or on a business trip, enjoy the comfort of 31 elegant rooms ranging from economic to premium. The hotel's welcoming staff will be more than happy to help you make the most of your stay.

While in Dijon, make sure you spare some time to visit the art museum and the Notre-Dame church with its famous owl-shaped carving.

name: City Loft Apparthotel
description:
Ideally located in the heart of the pedestrian quarter, close to the Palais des Ducs.

Formerly known as the Au Pauvre Diable shop, the building houses 53 nicely furnished apartments ranging from single to quadruple. Every apartment is equipped with air-conditioning, a full kitchenette with hot hobs, fridge and microwave, a safe and a television.

While in Dijon, make sure you take some time to discover the city's famous products such as its mustard, gingerbread and blackcurrant liquor. The city also houses an auditorium and a famous university.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Dijon République
description:
Located in the centre of Dijon, just a 3-minute walk from the Place de la République, Aparthotel Adagio Access Dijon République offers a 24-hour reception and free WiFi access throughout. The Fine Arts Museum is a 15-minute walk away.

All accommodation is air-conditioned and features a living area with a TV, a desk and a bathroom with a hairdryer. The fully equipped kitchen includes a microwave, stovetop and refrigerator.

You can prepare homemade meals in the studio or apartment. A buffet breakfast is also served each morning in the property's breakfast room and children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate. Guests can also find grocery shops and restaurants within walking distance.

Classed as an eco-friendly building due to its photovoltaic roof, the aparthotel is easily accessible by public transport. The tramway and L3 bus provide direct access to Dijon Train Station, which is 500 metres from Dijon Congrexpo Exhibition Centre. Private parking is available on site at a surcharge.

name: Hôtel des Ducs
description:
This hotel is located in historic centre of Dijon, listed as a World Heritage site by Unesco, 50 metres from The Palace of the Dukes. The Hotel Des Ducs have the main buiding (Hotel des Ducs) and 2 annexes (Maison des Ducs 150 m from the Hotel and Residence des Ducs 300 m from the hotel).

It offers a bar and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Des Ducs serves a buffet breakfast each morning and guests can relax with a drink on the terrace.

Rooms at Hotel Des Ducs are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with bath or shower. The rooms are accessible by lift and some are air-conditioned.

Hotel Des Ducs is less than 50 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts, the city's opera house and the city's shopping area. The Burgundy Wine Route begins just a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel des Halles
description:
Located in Dijon historical city center, 50 metres from the pedestrian area, Hôtel des Halles features a free WiFi access. The Halles centrales Covered Market is located 300m walk away. The road of vintage wines of Bourgogne starts a 10-minute drive from the property.

All rooms provide air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower. Rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at Hôtel des Halles.

Godrans Tramway Stop is 30 metres away and provides direct access to Dijon Zenith and Dijon University. Paid public parking is located 250 metres away.

name: Aloft Hotel Dijon By Marriott
description:
Located less than 1 km from Dijon Train Station, Aloft Hotel Dijon By Marriott offers 4-star accommodation in Dijon and has a bar. The property is around 4.3 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station, 4.6 km from Universite Tramway Station and 4.8 km from Zénith de Dijon. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features a hammam and evening entertainment.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Aloft Hotel Dijon By Marriott provides certain rooms with city views, and each room is fitted with a kettle.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Guests at Aloft Hotel Dijon By Marriott use the gym or relax in the wellness area including an indoor pool, a sauna and a hot tub.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include German, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Foch-Gare Tramway Station, Saint-Philibert Church and Dijon Congrexpo. Dole-Jura Airport is 52 km away.

name: Chambre d'hôtes Le Petit Tertre
description:
Le Petit Tertre is located in the centre of Dijon, a 3-minute walk from the Palace of the Dukes of Burgundy and offers free Wi-Fi.

All apartments are fully furnished in an 18th century style. The Apartment-Empire has views of the courtyard and is decorated in a Napoléon style.

Guests can have breakfast in their room.

This property is a short walk from the Musée des Beaux Arts de Dijon and the Notre Dame church.

name: Hôtel De L'Ill
description:
Hôtel De L’ill is located in a one-way street in Strasbourg, halfway between the cathedral and the university. It offers a large terrace and modern guest rooms.

All of the guestrooms feature a flat-screen TV. Private bathrooms include a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in all of the rooms and some of them are air-conditioned.

Hôtel De L’ill features a lounge area where guests can relax.

There are many typical restaurants serving regional specialities in the area.The buffet breakfast served daily also includes regional specialities.

name: Appartement L'Ill au Sable
description:
Located in the centre of Strasbourg, Appartement L'Ill au Sable provides accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is less than 1 km from St. Paul's Church. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg, Strasbourg History Museum and The 'Petite France'. Strasbourg International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Citadines Kléber Strasbourg
description:
Located next to Place Kléber, this Citadines Apart'hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Strasbourg SNCF Train Station. It offers fully-furnished apartments serviced by an elevator and equipped with free Wi-Fi access.

Apartments at the Citadines Apart'hotel Strasbourg Kléber feature a flat-screen TV, DVD player and desk in the seating area. They each have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher and linen and towels are provided.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room.

Private parking is available on site at an additional cost. The hotel also has a launderette and offers a dry-cleaning service.

Strasbourg Cathedral and the Petite France area of the city are a 5-minute walk from the aparthotel. The Alsace Museum is 750 metres away.

name: Carpe Diem Home - Au pied de la Cathédrale
description:
Located a 1-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral and 700 metres from the Petite France district, Carpe Diem Home offers accommodation with a kitchen. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

Located on an upper floor and accessed by stairs, each unit has a dishwasher, oven, a coffee machine, as well as a microwave and kettle.

The European Parliament is a 15-minute drive away and the Alsatian Museum is 450 metres away. Strasbourg International Airport is 12 km away.

name: EtC...Hôtel - Strasbourg Hyper Centre
description:
EtC…Hôtel is in Strasbourg near the Petite France district. It offers modern guestrooms and a peaceful environment.

All of the guestrooms are equipped with private bathrooms, flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi internet access. The entire hotel is non-smoking.

Breakfast is served daily in the pleasant dining area from 07:00 to 10:00.

The central location of the EtC...Hôtel puts you just 400 metres from the famous Strasbourg Cathedral located in the heart of the city.

name: Student Factory Strasbourg Etoile
description:
Located in Strasbourg, near St. Paul's Church, Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg and Strasbourg Cathedral, Student Factory Strasbourg Etoile has a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers soundproof units and is set 700 metres from Strasbourg History Museum.

At the apartment complex, the units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchen facilities, which include a stovetop and kitchenware.

The 'Petite France' is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Strasbourg Exhibition Centre is 3.9 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 11 km away.

name: Appartements Le 32
description:
Featuring self-contained accommodation, Le 32 is ideally located in the centre of Strasbourg near the cathedral and the famous Gutenberg square.

The apartments and studios at Le 32 all have a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Each has a dining area and a fully-equipped kitchenette that includes a fridge, a microwave and a Nespresso coffee maker.

The decor is contemporary with fresh white walls and modern furniture.  Most of the rooms have their own private bathroom with a shower.

Conveniently located in the Alsace region, Le 32 is 17 km from Strasbourg airport and 2.5 km from the train station. The property is located in the pedestrian zone and the public parking is located 100 or 250 metres away.

name: ibis Strasbourg Centre Petite France
description:
Hotel ibis Strasbourg Centre Petite France is situated in Strasbourg’s Petite France quarter, just 450 metres from Strasbourg Train Station. The air-conditioned hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet access and an on-site bar.

The guest rooms at ibis Strasbourg Centre Petite France include a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels. They each have a telephone, a work desk and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Newspapers and luggage storage are available for free on site.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 800 metres from the hotel and Place Kléber is 650 metres away. The property is 130 metres from Faubourg National Tram Stop and 16 km from Strasbourg Airport.

name: Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte & Restaurant Louisiane
description:
Set near the River Ill, Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane is 2 km from the historic district. It features a restaurant with a summer terrace and a garden.

The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms include a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

Regional specialities are served in restaurant La Louisiane and guests can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning from 06:30 until 11:00 at Hotel Strasbourg - Montagne Verte Restaurant Louisiane.

This Hotel offers a free private parking lot on site.
 Strasbourg Golf Club is 15 km from the hotel. Strasbourg International Airport is only 19 km away.

Please note that pets cannot be left alone in the rooms.

Please note that hotel rules are applicable for all reservations. Any stay involve the acceptation of the hotel rules, this guide of rules is available on request at the reception.

name: Les toits de Gutenberg
description:
Offering city views, Les toits de Gutenberg is an accommodation situated in Strasbourg, 1.1 km from St. Paul's Church and 1.6 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg. It is set 700 metres from The 'Petite France' and features a lift. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from Strasbourg History Museum.

With free WiFi, this homestay offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are offered in the homestay. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 100 metres from the homestay, while Strasbourg Exhibition Centre is 4.6 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 11 km away.

name: Hotel Arok
description:
Boasting a bar, Hotel Arok is set in Strasbourg in the Alsace region, 600 metres from The 'Petite France' and 2.4 km from St. Paul's Church. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna, or enjoy city views.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All units feature a desk.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and American options.

Hotel Arok offers a sun terrace.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include German, English, Spanish and French.

Strasbourg History Museum is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.9 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 10 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Bristol Strasbourg Gare
description:
Hôtel Le Bristol Strasbourg Gare Bristol, Strasbourg Centre Gare is set just across the street from the TGV Train Station.

From the reception woodworks to stylishly rooms, Hôtel Le Bristol Strasbourg Gare Bristol, Strasbourg Centre Gare provides a pleasant setting for family and leisure time as well as for business trips. It features 33 non smoking, soundproofed and air conditioned rooms, of which 2 are for guests with reduced mobility.

Breakfast is served daily in the communal lounge. It consists of orange juice, hot drinks, fruit compote, cheese, cold meats, eggs, croissants, bread, jam, butter and local products.

The hotel also benefits from a central location from which you can easily discover the city and its amazing architectural and cultural heritage.

name: Hotel Esplanade
description:
The Hotel Esplanade is located in the university area of Strasbourg.  It offers on-site bicycle rental and comfortable and contemporary rooms in a warm atmosphere.

All of the rooms are non-smoking and they include an LCD TV and free WiFi access. Each room has a private bathroom with free toiletries, and hairdryers can be borrowed at the reception. A breakfast buffet is available every morning from 06:30 to 10:00 in the hotel’s breakfast lounge.

The Strasbourg tramway station just in front of the Hotel Esplanade will take you directly to the new high-speed train station, the European Parliament and the international Entzheim-Strasbourg Airport (tramway + shuttle service).

The Strasbourg Cathedral is a 20-minute walk away. Free public parking is available nearby the hotel from 19:00 to 09:00.

name: Hotel Suisse
description:
The Hotel Suisse has a central location just behind Strasbourg Cathedral. It offers family-run accommodation with free WiFi access and a summer terrace. The historic Petite France district is just a 10-minute walk away

Guest rooms at the Hotel Suisse are equipped with en suite facilities, a TV, telephone.
As our hotel is a 14th century building, our rooms do not dispose of air-conditioning, but we provide fans in every room.

The traditionally decorated rooms have a view of the cathedral’s steeple. All rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The property has a 24-hour front desk.

The Hotel Suisse is ideally situated for visiting the city on foot. It is near the River Ill and next to the famous Palais des Rohan Museum. "Bateliers parking is available at 300 meters from the property at 22€/24h

Please note that only some of our rooms can host pets.

name: Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel
description:
Located opposite Strasbourg TGV Train Station, this eco-friendly Boutique Hotel is just 1.7 km from the city centre and a 5-minute walk from the picturesque Petite France district. The European Parliament is a 10-minute tram ride away and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel offer a TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast with home-made products only is served every morning at Hôtel Tandem - Boutique Hôtel and includes local organic produce with a selection hot and cold options. Guests can enjoy a drink from the bar or relax on the patio, which is an inside terrace.

Our wine selection is entirely bio-dynamic

Several working areas are available for business guests and there is also a lounge and library area.

Bike and tandem rental is available onsite and secure bike storage space is also available. Public parking is available nearby for a supplement.

name: Adonis Hotel Strasbourg
description:
Located in Strasbourg, Adonis Hôtel Strasbourg offers guest rooms with a modern or baroque décor and free Wi-Fi access. It is 2.4 km from Strasbourg Cathedral and 20 km from Strasbourg-Entzheim International Airport.

All of the rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge, with an additional cost. There is a restaurant 200 metres from the hotel.

Public parking is possible near the hotel at an extra cost and A35 Motorway is 1.4 km away.

name: Château de Pourtalès
description:
Château de Pourtalès is located in the north area of Strasbourg. It has witnessed years of European history, welcoming some of the most important musicians, philosophers and poets. It provides a spa area with Finnish sauna and relaxing facilities and which has direct access to the garden.

Château de Pourtalès offers rooms set in one of the property's 3 buildings, each with a different ambiance. The rooms in the Château and the Château Annexe are decorated in a traditional style and have authentic features. The rooms in the Park building are more modern and feature decor inspired by the environment.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Guests can enjoy walking and relaxing in the gardens around the Château.

Free private parking is available onsite.

name: Citadines Eurometropole Strasbourg
description:
Situated just 2.1 km from Zénith de Strasbourg, Citadines Eurometropole Strasbourg features accommodation in Strasbourg with access to a fitness centre, a bar, as well as a 24-hour front desk. The aparthotel provides a spa experience, with its spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a kettle, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a well-fitted kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher and oven. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. At Citadines Eurometropole Strasbourg, the restaurant is open for dinner, lunch and cocktails and specialises in French cuisine.

The area is popular for cycling and hiking, and bike hire is available at this 4-star aparthotel. Walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

St. Paul's Church is 5.5 km from the accommodation, while The 'Petite France' is 5.9 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 13 km away.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg
description:
Set 100 metres from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg offers 4-star accommodation in Strasbourg and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. Located around 600 metres from European Parliament, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.8 km away from St. Paul's Church. The hotel has family rooms.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet, American or vegetarian breakfast is available at the property.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.5 km from AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 2.6 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Hôtel le Grillon
description:
This hotel is located in central Strasbourg, a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station and from Petite-France. It offers a wooden deck terrace and soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Grillon Hotel are individually decorated. They each have a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower.

A breakfast buffet is served daily in the Grillon's dining room. The terrace also provides tables and chairs. In the evening you can enjoy a drink at the hotel bar.

The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception. A bicycle rental service is available on request. Place Kleber as well as the Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art are 700 metres away.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Strasbourg
description:
Situated in Strasbourg, near Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, European Parliament and St. Paul's Church, Residence Inn by Marriott Strasbourg features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel has facilities for disabled guests.

The aparthotel has a flat-screen TV. The kitchen features a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster, as well as coffee machine and kettle. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, American and vegetarian options.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.5 km from the aparthotel, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 2.6 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 13 km away.

name: Romantic Studio Vacances
description:
Featuring free bikes, garden and views of garden, Romantic Studio Vacances is situated in Labaroche, 15 km from House of the Heads. This apartment features free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Barbecue facilities are provided.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 16 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 16 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 74 km away.

name: Gîte d’Alsace l’Escale
description:
Set in Ostheim, in a historic building, 7.5 km from Colmar Expo, Gîte d’Alsace l’Escale is an apartment with an open-air bath and casino. This apartment has a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is located 11 km from House of the Heads.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ostheim, like hiking.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 11 km from Gîte d’Alsace l’Escale, while Colmar Train Station is 15 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: LES HORTENSIAS
description:
Offering a garden and inner courtyard view, LES HORTENSIAS is located in Sainte-Marie-aux-Mines, 30 km from Colmar Expo and 33 km from House of the Heads. This property offers access to a patio, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 18 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The area is popular for skiing and cycling, and free use of bicycles is available at the apartment. LES HORTENSIAS has a picnic area and a barbecue.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 33 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Train Station is 37 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 59 km away.

name: Au Bout du Chemin
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Au Bout du Chemin is located in Hohrod, 22 km from House of the Heads and 23 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 21 km from Colmar Train Station.

The bed and breakfast comes with a cable flat-screen TV. Guests can take in the views of the mountain from the balcony, which also has outdoor furniture. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Hohrod, like walking tours. Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and Au Bout du Chemin offers ski storage space.

Colmar Expo is 24 km from the accommodation, while Gérardmer Lake is 34 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 76 km from the property.

name: Le Petit Nid
description:
Featuring a garden, private pool and quiet street views, Le Petit Nid is located in Bergheim. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The apartment provides an indoor pool, spa facilities and a lift.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with mountain views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bergheim, like cycling and walking tours.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 10 km from Le Petit Nid, while Colmar Expo is 15 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 50 km from the property.

name: Gîte Sonnenberg
description:
Located 8.2 km from House of the Heads, Gîte Sonnenberg provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 8.6 km from Colmar Expo, 8.9 km from Colmar Train Station and 24 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle. The property is non-smoking and is set 8.6 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The 2-bedroom holiday home is equipped with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home.

Strasbourg International Airport is 64 km away.

name: maison d en haut
description:
Located in Wintzenheim, 5.7 km from Colmar Train Station and 6.3 km from House of the Heads, maison d en haut offers a garden and air conditioning. This holiday home provides free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.7 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The holiday home with a terrace and city views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the quiet street views. The holiday home offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

Guests can take advantage of the warm weather with the property's barbecue facilities.

Colmar Expo is 8.1 km from the holiday home, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 33 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 59 km from the property.

name: Domaine Léon Bleesz
description:
Featuring quiet street views, Domaine Léon Bleesz provides accommodation with a garden and a balcony, around 27 km from Würth Museum. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 27 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

This air-conditioned bed and breakfast comes with a fully equipped kitchenette, a seating area, a dining area and a satellite flat-screen TV. Guests can take in the views of the mountain from the terrace, which also has outdoor furniture. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

For visitors looking to embark on day trips to nearby landmarks, the bed and breakfast offers a selection of packed lunches.

You can play darts at Domaine Léon Bleesz, and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. Outdoor play equipment is also available for guests at the accommodation.

Colmar Expo is 39 km from Domaine Léon Bleesz, while House of the Heads is 42 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 30 km from the property.

name: Relais du Klevener
description:
Situated in the heart of a vineyard in Heiligenstein, this hotel features a garden, terrace and offers free Wi-Fi. A wide choice of wines is available for guests to taste.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and an en suite bathroom. Rooms are simple in style and some have a balcony and garden view.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Relais du Klevener. For other meals the restaurant on site proposes traditional French cuisine.

The Relais du Klevener is on the Wine Route, 28 minutes by car from Strasbourg and its train station and airport. Free private parking is available.

name: La Pouponiere
description:
La Pouponiere, a property with barbecue facilities, is situated in Sainte-Marie-aux-Mines, 33 km from House of the Heads, 33 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, as well as 37 km from Colmar Train Station. The property has garden and quiet street views, and is 30 km from Colmar Expo. The property is non-smoking and is set 18 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

The holiday home is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. Offering free private parking, this 3-star holiday home also features free WiFi. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy skiing and cycling nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Würth Museum is 47 km from La Pouponiere, while Gérardmer Lake is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 59 km from the accommodation.

name: Chalet les airelles
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Chalet les airelles is situated in Labaroche, 18 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 18 km from Colmar Expo. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 17 km from House of the Heads.

The spacious chalet with a terrace and mountain views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the chalet. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests at the chalet will be able to enjoy activities in and around Labaroche, like skiing, cycling and hiking. Chalet les airelles has a picnic area and a barbecue.

Colmar Train Station is 19 km from the accommodation, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 74 km from Chalet les airelles.

name: Studio La Grenouillère
description:
Housed in a historic building, Studio La Grenouillère features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi in Turckheim, 6.6 km from House of the Heads. The property is around 7.4 km from Colmar Train Station, 7.8 km from Colmar Expo and 32 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle. The property is non-smoking and is situated 7 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the inner courtyard views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Turckheim, like hiking.

Parc Expo Mulhouse is 46 km from Studio La Grenouillère, while Gérardmer Lake is 47 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 62 km away.

name: Au Jardin de Lina
description:
Au Jardin de Lina has river views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Lapoutroie, 19 km from House of the Heads. The property features garden and city views, and is 20 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. This 3-star apartment offers private entrance.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lapoutroie, like hiking. A children's playground is also available at Au Jardin de Lina, while guests can also relax in the garden.

Colmar Expo is 20 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Train Station is 20 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 75 km away.

name: Gite Jehl GO10
description:
