Located 24 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle, 28 km from House of the Heads and 28 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, Gite Jehl GO10 provides accommodation set in Artolsheim. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. Colmar Expo is 31 km from the holiday home and Würth Museum is 34 km away.

The holiday home is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Europa-Park Main Entrance is 29 km from the holiday home, while Colmar Train Station is 29 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: Gite Du Rittersberg
description:
Located in Scherwiller in the Alsace region and Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle reachable within 13 km, Gite Du Rittersberg provides accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a garden and free private parking. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen features an oven, a microwave and a fridge. A stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Colmar Expo is 24 km from the apartment, while House of the Heads is 27 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 40 km from the property.

name: Studio neuf - parking - 3 Epis proche Turckheim
description:
Studio neuf - parking - 3 Epis proche Turckheim is set in Turckheim, 15 km from Colmar Train Station, 38 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle, and 47 km from Gérardmer Lake. With free private parking, the property is 13 km from House of the Heads and 13 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property is non-smoking and is located 14 km from Colmar Expo.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a cable flat-screen TV and a kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 72 km away.

name: Au Petit Paradis
description:
Situated in Ammerschwihr, 8.4 km from House of the Heads, 8.8 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 8.9 km from Colmar Expo, Au Petit Paradis features accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. Guests can make use of barbecue facilities.

This spacious bed and breakfast will provide guests with a satellite TV, a seating area and a CD player. The kitchenette has a microwave, a toaster and a fridge and there is a private bathroom with bathrobes and a hair dryer. The property has an outdoor dining area.

The traditional restaurant at the bed and breakfast specialises in French cuisine, and is open for dinner and lunch.

For guests with children, Au Petit Paradis provides outdoor play equipment. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings.

Colmar Train Station is 9.1 km from the accommodation, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 24 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 65 km away.

name: Gite Lammer
description:
Located 24 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle, Gite Lammer offers accommodation with a balcony, as well as a garden and barbecue facilities. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, microwave, toaster, fridge, stovetop and kitchenware. Complete with a private bathroom, the units at the holiday home are equipped with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms include a seating area. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Artolsheim, like cycling. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

House of the Heads is 28 km from Gite Lammer, while Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 29 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: Gîte d’Anna
description:
Gîte d’Anna, a property with a garden and barbecue facilities, is located in Mackenheim, 25 km from House of the Heads, 25 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, as well as 26 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle. The property has garden and inner courtyard views, and is 22 km from Colmar Expo. The holiday home also provides free WiFi, free private parking and facilities for disabled guests.

The holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. This holiday home also provides guests with a terrace that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Europa-Park Main Entrance is 26 km from the holiday home, while Colmar Train Station is 26 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 55 km from the property.

name: Gîte Binnert Bader
description:
Boasting a sauna, Gîte Binnert Bader is situated in Nothalten. The 2-star holiday home features garden views and is 22 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle. There is a picnic area and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

The holiday home with a terrace and mountain views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the holiday home, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne. This holiday home is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A minimarket is available at the holiday home.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Nothalten, like hiking and walking tours. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at Gîte Binnert Bader.

Würth Museum is 26 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Expo is 34 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 29 km away.

name: Au Nid Des Pies
description:
Situated in Soultzeren and only 26 km from Colmar Train Station, Au Nid Des Pies features accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. Set 27 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, the property provides a garden. The property is non-smoking and is located 26 km from House of the Heads.

The spacious apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Gérardmer Lake is 27 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport, 80 km from Au Nid Des Pies.

name: Gîte Les Cerisiers
description:
Gîte Les Cerisiers, a property with barbecue facilities, is set in Triembach-au-Val, 20 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle, 31 km from Colmar Expo, as well as 33 km from Würth Museum. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. House of the Heads is 34 km away and Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 35 km from the holiday home.

The holiday home with a terrace and mountain views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Triembach-au-Val, like hiking.

Colmar Train Station is 39 km from Gîte Les Cerisiers, while Strasbourg History Museum is 50 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 37 km from the accommodation.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: Claude
description:
Set 20 km from Würth Museum, 30 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 38 km from Colmar Expo, Claude offers accommodation situated in Bindernheim. The property is around 40 km from Strasbourg History Museum, 41 km from House of the Heads and 42 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. Zénith de Strasbourg is 43 km away and Colmar Train Station is 46 km from the holiday home.

This holiday home comes with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a bath. Offering free private parking, this 2-star holiday home also features free WiFi.

The holiday home features a children's playground and a barbecue.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 42 km from Claude, while Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 43 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 43 km from the property.

name: Hôtel du Haut Koenigsbourg- entre vignes et château
description:
This hotel de charme offers en suite accommodation within the Ballons des Vosges Regional Park. It is situated in the scenic village of Thannenkirch, in the Alsace region.

Garden views are available from the bright guest rooms, which have queen-size beds. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in all rooms. Private bathrooms are equipped with amenities and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and can be taken on the terrace in warmer weather.

Guests at Haut Koenigsbourg have access to a lounge with a TV, video games and a range of books. Free Wi-Fi is accessible from this lounge.

Haut Koenigsbourg Chateau is 7.1 km from the hotel. Ribeauvillé Train Station is 10 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Hotel Rose
description:
Composed of thoughtfully designed independent bungalows and guestrooms in the annex house of a 19th-century building, Hotel Rose offers comfortable accommodation and a peaceful atmosphere.

The residence is set in a verdant park full of trees and flowers. Some of the accommodation opens out onto the river that leads to the famous Mont Saint Michel and offer a tranquil, relaxing living space. All of the bungalows are independently ecological and can accommodate 4 people (or 5 on request).

Enjoy a tasty breakfast, a casual drink or a relaxing moment on the manor's veranda or under the shade of the trees.

Hotel Rose also features a shared living area with a piano, free Wi-Fi access, games and plenty of reading material. Nearby you can take quiet walks or bike rides and enjoy traditional and regional cuisine in one of the local restaurants.

name: La Jacotière
description:
Situated in Ardevon, La Jacotière is a B&B set in a renovated farm with a garden and a furnished terrace offering views of the Mont Saint-Michel, just 3 km away. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

The rooms offer a TV, a desk and wardrobe and a private bathroom with shower. The studio also has a kitchen equipped with microwave and stove.

Breakfast is served in the large dining room. Supermarkets, bars and restaurants serving traditional and international cuisine can be found a 5-minute walk away.

At the B&B, guests have access to guides on excursions to do in the area. There are shuttle services nearby to discover the Mont Saint-Michel. Pontorson Train Station is 8.5 km away, while Saint-Malo and Granville are 46 km away.

name: Gîte du Vignoble
description:
Offering a casino and garden view, Gîte du Vignoble is situated in Beblenheim, 9.1 km from Colmar Expo and 13 km from House of the Heads. This holiday home features free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Outdoor seating is also available at the holiday home.

Boasting a Blu-ray player, the holiday home has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room, a dining area, 1 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with a shower. A private entrance leads guests into the holiday home, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne. This holiday home is non-smoking and soundproof.

A minimarket is available at the holiday home.

Guests at Gîte du Vignoble will be able to enjoy activities in and around Beblenheim, like walking tours. The holiday home has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 13 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Train Station is 13 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 56 km away.

name: Insolite dans les arbres Les Ormes, Epiniac
description:
Set in Epiniac in the Brittany region and Port of Houle reachable within 29 km, Insolite dans les arbres Les Ormes, Epiniac offers accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a traditional restaurant, a water park and a sun terrace. The indoor pool features a water slide and fence.

At the bed and breakfast, the units come with a outdoor furniture. At the bed and breakfast, units are fitted with a shared bathroom and bed linen.

A continental breakfast, comprising fresh pastries and juice is served every morning at the property. Guests may relax in the on-site bar, while packed lunches are also available upon request.

You can play table tennis and darts at the bed and breakfast, and bike hire is available. Kids pool is also available at Insolite dans les arbres Les Ormes, Epiniac, while guests can also relax in the garden.

The Pointe du Grouin is 33 km from the accommodation, while Solidor Tower is 35 km from the property. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 55 km away.

name: Roulotte au pied du Mont Saint Michel
description:
Offering barbecue facilities and garden view, Roulotte au pied du Mont Saint Michel is set in Pontorson, 8.6 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 21 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is situated 8.6 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

The chalet includes 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, as well as a coffee machine. Towels and bed linen are available in the chalet. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests at the chalet will be able to enjoy activities in and around Pontorson, like hiking and walking tours.

Granville Train Station is 45 km from Roulotte au pied du Mont Saint Michel, while Champrepus Zoo is 47 km from the property. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 85 km away.

name: Etoile des Grèves
description:
Etoile des Grèves is situated in Ardevon, 8.1 km from Mont Saint-Michel, 21 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, as well as 45 km from Granville Train Station. The property has garden and quiet street views, and is 8.1 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the bed and breakfast, units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. At the bed and breakfast, all units are soundproof. All units will provide guests with a outdoor furniture and a kettle.

After a day of cycling, hiking or walking tours, guests can relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.

Champrepus Zoo is 47 km from the bed and breakfast, while Port of Houle is 47 km from the property. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 93 km away.

name: Le Petit Moulin Rouge, B&B, SDB en-suite, parking privé gratuit
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Le Petit Moulin Rouge, B&B, SDB en-suite, parking privé gratuit is situated in Beauvoir, 5.6 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 23 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. The property offers soundproof units and is set 5.6 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

All units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also have free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, the units include bed linen and towels.

Guests can enjoy fresh pastries during the à la carte breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Beauvoir, like walking tours. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Port of Houle is 44 km from Le Petit Moulin Rouge, B&B, SDB en-suite, parking privé gratuit, while Granville Train Station is 47 km from the property. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 85 km away.

name: Apparthôtel Mont Saint Michel - Résidence Fleurdumont
description:
Résidence Fleurdumont offers pet-friendly accommodation in Beauvoir. Mont Saint Michel Abbey is 4.4 km away. Résidence Fleurdumont also includes a seasonal outdoor pool, a tennis court and a pétanque playground. Free private parking is available on site.

Most units include a terrace or balcony. Résidence Fleurdumont features free WiFi and TV. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is also a kitchenette, equipped with a microwave, a refrigerator and stovetop, as well as a coffee machine. A breakfast kit is provided every morning.

The nearest airport is Pleurtuit Airport, 42 km from Résidence Fleurdumont.

name: gites 2 beauvoir
description:
Featuring quiet street views, gites 2 beauvoir provides accommodation with a balcony, around 5.7 km from Mont Saint-Michel. Housed in a building dating from 1900, this apartment is 23 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel and 45 km from Port of Houle. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.7 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Granville Train Station is 48 km from the apartment, while The Pointe du Grouin is 49 km away. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 85 km from the property.

name: Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel 2
description:
Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel 2, a property with barbecue facilities, is located in Pontorson, 8.3 km from Mont Saint-Michel, 21 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, as well as 45 km from Granville Train Station. Featuring private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The property is non-smoking and is set 8.3 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

The holiday home with a terrace and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the holiday home. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy hiking and walking tours nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Champrepus Zoo is 47 km from Maison au pied du Mont Saint Michel 2, while Granville's Marina is 47 km away.

name: Chez Adèle
description:
Chez Adèle, a property with water sports facilities, is situated in Le Mont Saint Michel, 200 metres from Mont Saint-Michel, 29 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, as well as 49 km from Port of Houle. The property is non-smoking and is located 100 metres from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

Composed of 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, this recently renovated holiday home is equipped with a flat-screen TV. The kitchen features a microwave, a fridge and kitchenware, as well as coffee machine and kettle.

name: Les Vieilles Digues
description:
Set in a renovated Breton-style house, this family-run B&B is located in Beauvoir, 3 km from Mont-Saint-Michel. With a 3000-m2 flowered park, it features en suite rooms with antique furniture and free Wi-Fi.

All with a private entrance, the elegant rooms at Les Vieilles Digues have free toiletries. Those on the ground floor include French doors with direct access to the patio, which has deck chairs.

The breakfast includes hot drinks, orange juice, yogurt, cheese and cereals and fresh baguettes are delivered daily by the local baker. The owners are at guests’ disposal for advising good restaurants nearby.

Guests are invited to have a walk or a ride along Le Couesnon River, which is 200 metres from Les Vieilles Digues. Saint-Malo and Cancale are a 45-minute drive and Pontorson Train Station is 5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Auberge Saint Pierre
description:
The Auberge Saint Pierre is made up of small 14th century half-timbered houses located on the island of Mont-Saint-Michel. It combines the period charm of exposed beams with modern comforts, including a TV and free Wi-Fi.

Ideally located for visiting Mont-Saint-Michel, this hotel is on the main street which leads to the Mont-Saint-Michel abbey.

Two annexes of the hotel are located in the middle of the village and are accessible by numerous stairs.

The rooms at Auberge Saint Pierre and the annexes have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some rooms offer sea views.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily. Traditional Norman cuisine and fish dishes are served in the authentic restaurant and you can choose to dine on site.

name: Hôtel la Croix Blanche
description:
Situated in the heart of Mont Saint Michel medieval Village, Hôtel La Croix Blanche will be happy to accommodate you.

The rooms at Hôtel La Croix Blanche have a flat-screen, satellite TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

In addition to the visit of Mont-Saint-Michel and its abbey, guests can go to Saint-Malo, 50 km from the hotel.

name: Le Mouton Blanc
description:
At the foot of the abbey, the Mouton Blanc Hotel, welcomes you in its historic 14th century location. Le Mouton Blanc provides comfortable rooms with a simple yet cosy decoration.

The rooms are divided in 3 buildings: one of them offers views of the Mont Saint-Michel, and the other one features medieval-style rooms.

The Mouton Blanc restaurant offers local traditional cuisine, served in the dining room or the terrace. Breakfast is served daily.

Personalised services for visits, recreation and other activities are available upon request.

Please note that the reception of the hotel Le Mouton blanc is currently closed. Please note that arrival arrangements are made at the reception of the hotel Les Terrasses Poulard.

name: La Mère Poulard
description:
Stay in a Historic Hotel at the Heart of Mont Saint-Michel.

Hôtel La Mère Poulard, located in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel, has preserved the authentic charm of traditional inns from the past. For over a century, this iconic establishment has welcomed pilgrims and travelers from around the world in a setting rich in history.

The hotel consists of three historic houses, each offering a unique atmosphere:

The Historic Inn, where the story of La Mère Poulard began.

La Maison Rouge, with its adjoining garden, providing a peaceful setting.

L’Ermitage, also known as Maison d’Annette, the final residence of the famous cook.

The rooms, with their classic style, offer breathtaking views of the bay, the Abbey, or the medieval town. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi, and a private bathroom with a bathtub.

La Mère Poulard’s renowned restaurant invites you to savor its traditional recipes, including the famous omelet, prepared using Annette Poulard’s unique expertise since 1888.

Take advantage of your stay to explore Mont Saint-Michel and its picturesque streets, hike the surrounding trails, or discover the region by bike.

Avranches is a 23-minute drive away, and Saint-Malo is 45 minutes away.

name: Hotel Gabriel
description:
Hotel Gabriel is located 1.6 Km from Mont Saint-Michel. It offers free Wi-Fi access and en suite rooms just a 25-minute walk from the walls of the old city.

Accessed by stairs, the hotel's spacious rooms include satellite TV. Each room has its own bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Hotel Gabriel is a 6-minute drive from the E401 motorway. Pontorson TGV Train Station has connections to Paris and is 7.3 km away.

La Salicorne offers you authentic, vegetable, colorful, festive and eco responsible world cuisine. Le Pré Salé offers you Pré Salé lamb and semi gastronomic french cuisine.

name: Le Saint Aubert
description:
Set amid lush greenery, just 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel welcomes you in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.

After a day spent exploring the Mont Saint-Michel, enjoy a delicious regional cuisine in the picturesque setting of a former farmhouse.

The helpful staff will be happy to provide you with information about the visits and the many attractions in the surrounding area.

name: La Vieille Auberge
description:
La Vieille Auberge is located in the medieval village of Le Mont Saint Michel, just a short walk from the famous Mont Saint-Michel Abbey. It offers free WiFi access, a restaurant and a terrace with views of the Mont Saint-Michel Bay.

Rooms are located in 2 annex buildings with many stairs to climb. One building offers standard rooms on the main street and the other building, located at the top of the village, offers rooms with a sea view. They feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is also a bar at the hotel, and the restaurant serves traditional French cuisine.

This property is 24 km from Avranches and 49 km from Cancale. Dol-de-Bretagne is 30 km away.

name: Les Terrasses Poulard
description:
Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.

Accessed by stairs, each room has a modern décor. Some rooms include large windows with bay views. They are equipped with TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served at La Confiance restaurant, a 2-minute walk away, and the restaurant specialises in French and regional cuisine and is also open for lunch and dinner. Alternatively, guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite La Confiance restaurant and offers meals, drinks and snacks.

Guests can enjoy a drink in the Les Terrasses Poulard’s bar. It offers a 24-hour front desk service and guests can leave their luggage at the reception.

Activities in the area include cycling, fishing and hiking and explore the island.

name: Hôtel Vert
description:
Hotel Vert offers pastel-coloured rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.

Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Vert’s restaurant, La salicorne. The hotel’s bar, L’Equinoxe, opens onto a private terrace.

The Vert Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and private parking. There is also an on site supermarket and souvenir shop.

name: Mercure Mont Saint Michel
description:
This Mercure is situated in parkland just 2 km from the abbey of Mont Saint Michel. It offers spacious en suite rooms, a restaurant and bar and plenty of free on-site parking.

The air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Mont Saint Michel are equipped with facilities for making hot drinks.  A flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels is also provided.

The restaurant, Le Pré Salé, is famous in the area and serves delicious seafood and regional specialities. The bar, Le Normandy, offers a relaxed setting for a drink amongst friends.

Mercure Mont Saint Michel is 6.5 km from Pontorson and 52 km from Saint-Malo.

name: Le Vieux Carré
description:
This hotel is located in central Rouen, in a pedestrian area, just 850 metres from Rouen Rive-Droite Station. It offers en suite rooms and an interior courtyard with flowers and trees.

Le Vieux Carré’s restaurant provides daily continental breakfast and lunch. In the afternoon, it turns into a tea room, serving gourmet pastries. Guests can enjoy their meals outdoors, in the courtyard.

Each room at Le Vieux Carré is equipped with a TV and a telephone. The private bathrooms all feature a bathtub. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the rooms and in the entire hotel.

The common living room features exposed beams and wooden furniture. Guests can relax in the armchairs, by the fireplace.

Le Vieux Carré is 400 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral and 450 metres from Rouen’s Museum of Fine Arts. Paid public parking can be found nearby.

name: Le Relais Du Roy
description:
Le Relais Du Roy is a 3-star hotel situated next to the River Couesnon, just 1.5 km from the Mont Saint-Michel and 50 metres from the free shuttle bus.

Featuring flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a telephone and a welcome tray, each guest room at Le Relais Du Roy is decorated in a classic style. They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms feature a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

A grocery store can be found within a 3-minute walk from the hotel. The town of Pontorson is 7 km away. Private parking is available with an extra cost.

name: DOMITYS Les Mosaïques
description:
Set just 1 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen, DOMITYS Les Mosaïques provides accommodation in Rouen with access to a garden, a terrace, as well as full-day security. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers an indoor pool, sauna and a lift. Accommodation for disabled guests is also available at the property.

Each unit features a balcony, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area and a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

You can play billiards at DOMITYS Les Mosaïques.

Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 2 km from the accommodation, while 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 2.8 km away. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 84 km from the property.

name: Hôtel De La Cathédrale
description:
Set just 50 metres from the Rouen Cathedral, in the heart of the city's historic centre, this hotel has a timber-framed façade dating from the 17th century and is located 4 km from the Kindarena Stadium. Guests are invited to enjoy afternoon tea in a room leading onto the patio. Secure and paid public parking is available nearby.

All of the individually decorated rooms feature flat-screen TVs and cable channels, and some include a lounge area. The en suite bathrooms at Hotel De La Cathédrale are equipped with hairdryers.

A buffet-style breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the hotel's breakfast room, decorated in a traditional Norman style.

The Rouen-Rive-Droite Train Station is located just 1.6 km from the hotel and the Church of St. Ouen is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Joli studio hyper centre
description:
Joli studio hyper centre in Rouen provides accommodation with free WiFi, less than 1 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, 3.3 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall and 3.9 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen. The property is located 4.9 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen, 5.7 km from 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen and 7.4 km from Rouen Expo. The property is 600 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The recently renovated apartment includes 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, as well as a coffee machine. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Musee des Beaux-Arts de Rouen is 200 metres from the apartment, while Flaubert bridge is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 85 km from Joli studio hyper centre.

name: Mercure Rouen Centre Champ de Mars
description:
This hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the historic city centre and the Rouen Cathedral and offers free Wi-Fi access. Breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast area.

Each elegantly decorated room is air-conditioned and features satellite TV. The rooms are heated and include en suite bathrooms equipped with complimentary toiletries.

The restaurant, Le Honfleur, serves regional cuisine and the hotel's on-site bar, Le Boston, is open throughout the day and evening.

Private parking is available on site and the Church of St. Ouen is 1.1 km from the hotel. The Musée des Beaux Arts de Rouen is 1.5 km away. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Residence Reine Marine
description:
Welcome to our new 4-star residence, completely dedicated to your comfort and well-being.

An exceptional location. A panoramic view of the islands and the bay of Saint-Malo. Direct access to the beach (no roads), convenient for residents and ideal for children. Saint-Malo is a great holiday location for all the family with cultural and sporting events throughout the year : literary festivals, boat races and regattas, exhibitions...

The Residence offers privileged access to the Thermes Marins de Saint-Malo sea spa centre, the Aquatonic® pool and the Saint Malo Golf Club.

name: Escale Oceania Saint Malo
description:
Escale Oceania Saint-Malo is located on the seafront, facing the Sillon Beach and a 14-minute walk from Saint-Malo Train Station. It offers modern rooms, a sunny outdoor terrace and 24 hour-a-day food service.

Guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV and some of them offer a sea view. Free Wi-Fi internet access is provided.

Free of charge guests have at their disposal a PC with internet access and a printer. Bikes can be rented on site.

Breakfast is served every morning, and evening meals can be enjoyed at the hotel. Snacks are available throughout the day and packed lunches for picnics are also available.

name: Résidence Quai Sud-Le Cartier
description:
In the Sillon district of Saint Malo, close to Sillon Beach, Résidence Quai Sud-Le Cartier has a bar and a washing machine. It is located 500 metres from Eventail Beach and provides a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and quiet street views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a snack bar on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Bon Secours Beach, Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo.

name: Hotel De La Mer
description:
Located just 150 metres from the beach in Saint-Malo, Hotel De La Mer offers free WiFi access throughout and an on-site bar. The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and heating. Each room has a private bathroom that includes a bath and free toiletries.

In July and August, a continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel De La Mer. From September to June, it is served from Tuesday to Saturday. Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

Saint-Malo Port is 2 km away and Espace Duguay Trouin Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the property. Naye Ferry Terminal is 2.4 km away.

name: chambre d'hôte et gîte du jardin des corsaires
description:
Offering a garden and quiet street view, chambre d'hôte et gîte du jardin des corsaires is located in Saint Malo, 2.4 km from Rochebonne Beach and 3.4 km from Palais du Grand Large. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 2.3 km from Sillon Beach. The guest house provides garden views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available.

The units at the guest house feature private entrance and soundproofing so guests can enjoy a peaceful stay. Every unit includes a kettle and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms come with a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a dishwasher. At the guest house, every unit is equipped with a desk and a TV.

The guest house has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 3.4 km from the guest house, while National Fort is 3.6 km away.

name: Logis Maison Vauban - Hotel St Malo
description:
Hotel Maison Vauban is located next to the Saint-Vincent Cathedral in Saint-Malo. Just 200 metres from the beach and 450 metres from Saint-Malo Marina, it offers comfortable accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Palais are brightly decorated and equipped with a telephone, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning. It can be enjoyed in the hotel's breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms.

name: B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre
description:
B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre is located in the heart of Rouen next to Saint-Sever Shopping Centre and 4 km from Kindarena Stadium. It offers en suite rooms, a restaurant and 24-hour reception desk. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Rooms at B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre are equipped with satellite TV and a telephone. The rooms are accessible by lift.

B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine and guests can relax with a drink in the bar.

B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre is 1.5 km from Rouen Orléans Train Station, which can be accessed in 10 minute using the metro system. Jardin des Plantes de Rouen is 1 km away and public parking is possible in St Sever shopping centre, next to the hotel.

name: Le Relais Saint Michel
description:
Le Relais Saint Michel is an hotel facing the bay of Mont Saint-Michel. All guest rooms ( except Twin Room Saint-Michel with interior view) offer a private terrace and some have panoramic views of Mont Saint-Michel.

The soundproofed rooms are comfortable and spacious. They are fully equipped with modern comforts including a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has en suite facilities.

The hotel’s restaurant offers traditional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink or a meal on the terrace, which offers views of the Mont St Michel.

A free shuttle service that stops in front of the hotel will take you to the famous landmark Mont St Michel in just 10 minutes. Safety jackets are provided for guests wishing to take a walk at night. For guests arriving by car, secured parking is available with an extra cost.

name: Jasmin
description:
Offering quiet street views, Jasmin is an accommodation set in Rouen, 1.3 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen and 1.4 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the inner courtyard views. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Gare de Rouen Rive Droite is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall is 3.5 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 85 km from the property.

name: Grand Hôtel De La Seine
description:
Grand Hôtel De La Seine is just 500 metres from the Gare de Rouen-Orléans, a 15-minute walk from Rouen Cathedral and 2 km from Kindarena Stadium. Free Wi-Fi access and facilities for making hot drinks are provided in each en suite room.

Guest rooms at Grand Hôtel De La Seine have a flat-screen TV. All rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Grand Hôtel De La Seine. The restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and serves regional cuisine.

Rouen’s historic quarter with its boutiques and cafes is a 15-minute walk from Grand Hôtel De La Seine. The Musée de la Ceramique is 500 metres away.

name: Le Flaubert appartement et parking en centre ville
description:
Offering city views, Le Flaubert appartement et parking en centre ville is an accommodation situated in Rouen, 1.2 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and 1.8 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall. This apartment provides free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. A TV is provided. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Voltaire Station, Rouen is 3.6 km from Le Flaubert appartement et parking en centre ville, while Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 4.7 km away. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 85 km from the property.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre
description:
Situated conveniently in the centre of Rouen, Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre offers air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hammam. The accommodation provides room service, a business centre and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units feature a safety deposit box.

Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen and Musee des Beaux-Arts de Rouen. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 84 km away.

name: B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite
description:
Located a 20-minute walk from the centre and the cathedral, B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite offers a French restaurant, a bar and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen, cable TV. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

All of the rooms at B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A telephone and a radio are also provided.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite is a 16-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and a 13-minute walk from Rouen Opera.

The hotel is situated 1 km from the train station and 6 km from the A28 motorway. There is a private car park on site, available at a surcharge.

name: Sous les Etoiles - dans le plus haut gratte-ciel avec garage privé
description:
In the heart of Rouen, set within a short distance of Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen and Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, Sous les Etoiles - dans le plus haut gratte-ciel avec garage privé offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.3 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall and 3.3 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with bathrobes. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment, while walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 4.4 km from Sous les Etoiles - dans le plus haut gratte-ciel avec garage privé, while 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 5.1 km from the property. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 85 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Novotel Rouen Centre Cathédrale
description:
Situated in Rouen, 600 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen, Novotel Rouen Centre Cathédrale features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.4 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at Novotel Rouen Centre Cathédrale can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The accommodation offers an indoor pool.

Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall is 3 km from Novotel Rouen Centre Cathédrale, while Voltaire Station, Rouen is 3 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 84 km away.

name: Hotel Morand
description:
Hotel Morand is a renovated 17th-century coaching inn that now works as a hotel and is located in the historic centre of Rouen, 400 metres from SNCF Train Station. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

All guest rooms at Hotel Morand are equipped with tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning. Guests can relax in the lounge with its fireplace and exposed beams.

Le Morand is located opposite the Musée des Beaux Arts and Rouen Cathedral is a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Appartement dans ancien Hôtel historique
description:
In the Rouen City Centre district of Rouen, close to Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, Appartement dans ancien Hôtel historique has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is around 2.3 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen, 3 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall and 4.4 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 5.1 km from the apartment, while Rouen Expo is 6.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 84 km from Appartement dans ancien Hôtel historique.

name: Le Garden Studio avec terrasse et parking centre ville
description:
Le Garden Studio avec terrasse et parking centre ville, a property with a garden, is located in Rouen, 1.3 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen, 2 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall, as well as 3.9 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen. It is set 1.3 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with garden views. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. The property has an outdoor dining area.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 4.9 km from the apartment, while 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 5.7 km away. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 85 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection
description:
Situated in the historic centre of Rouen, Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection, offers accommodation with a literary theme in honour of the writer Gustave Flaubert. It is located 3 km from the Kindarena Stadium and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is included in each of the elegant rooms. All rooms have private bathrooms.

Breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms. Guests are invited to relax in the hotel's cocktail lounge. The hotel is situated across the street from a number of French and international restaurants.

Notre Dame Cathedral of Rouen is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the Musée des Beaux Arts de Rouen is 800 metres away.

name: Appartement F2 Rouen Gare - parking gratuit
description:
Located in Rouen and only 300 metres from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, Appartement F2 Rouen Gare - parking gratuit provides accommodation with inner courtyard views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 3.8 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall, 4.4 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen and 6.2 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 7 km from the apartment, while Rouen Expo is 10 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 85 km from the property.

name: Mercure Rouen Centre Cathédrale
description:
This Mercure is located in central Rouen, 160 metres from Notre Dame Cathedral and 3 km from Kindarena Stadium. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms, each with a private bathroom, satellite TV and free WiFi access.

The Mercure Rouen Centre Cathédrale serves a full breakfast, which can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room and an express breakfast option. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The Place du Vieux Marché (the old market) and the Gros Horloge are within easy walking distance of the Mercure Rouen Centre. Rouen Train Station is situated just 1 km away and underground, private parking is available on site.

name: Seine-Front Apt in Stone House with parking and garden, Lacroix Island
description:
Located in Rouen and only 1.1 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen, Seine-Front Apt in Stone House with parking and garden, Lacroix Island provides accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. Housed in a building dating from 1908, this apartment is 3.4 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and 3.7 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.3 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 4.2 km from the apartment, while 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 4.9 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 84 km from the property.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Rouen Centre Cathédrale
description:
Conveniently located in the centre of Rouen, Aparthotel Adagio Access Rouen Centre Cathédrale offers air-conditioned rooms with private parking and room service. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. At Aparthotel Adagio Access Rouen Centre Cathédrale all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Gare de Rouen Rive Droite is 1.3 km from Aparthotel Adagio Access Rouen Centre Cathédrale, while Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall is 3.1 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 84 km away.

name: VILLA la GLORIETTE
description:
Located in Rouen, in a historic building, 1.2 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, VILLA la GLORIETTE is a recently renovated bed and breakfast with a garden and terrace. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property offers allergy-free units and is situated 1.4 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen.

The units at the bed and breakfast are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, bathrobes and a hair dryer. A fridge, a minibar and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, all units include bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is available at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop on-site.

A water park is also available for guests at VILLA la GLORIETTE.

Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall is 4.1 km from the accommodation, while Voltaire Station, Rouen is 4.3 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 84 km from the property.

name: ibis Rouen Centre Champ de Mars
description:
Located just a 10-minute walk from the centre of Rouen, ibis Rouen Champ de Mars offers a sauna, hammam and 24-hour reception. Rouen Cathedral is only a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe, desk and telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Guests can relax with a drink in the on-site bar and restaurants can be found in the city centre.

Additional features include free WiFi access throughout and luggage storage. The train station is 2 km away and the A150 motorway is ideally located a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Domaine de la Barbinais
description:
Set in a 7000 m², landscaped park, Domaine de la Barbinais is a hotel located in the countryside of Saint Malo.  WiFi access is available throughout.

Each individually decorated room features a flat-screen TV and a desk. Each also includes a private bathroom with a  shower and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room with an additional cost.

Other facilities offered at the property include physical reception is from 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. a telephone reception is provided 24 hours a day.. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling. The property offers free private parking on site and it is located a 5-minute drive from the beach.

name: Ker Annick
description:
Situated in Saint Malo and within 1 km of Sillon Beach, Ker Annick has a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is located 1.3 km from Casino Barrière Saint-Malo, 1.7 km from National Fort and 1.8 km from Grand Bé. The hotel features family rooms.

At the hotel, all rooms have a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Ker Annick, rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Ker Annick include Eventail Beach, Bas-Sablons Beach and Palais du Grand Large.

name: Villa du Manoir 1685
description:
Villa du Manoir 1685 features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Saint Malo, 2.3 km from Plage du Rosais. Housed in a building dating from 17th century, this villa is 2.3 km from Plage des Fours à Chaux and 2.9 km from Bas-Sablons Beach. This 3-star villa offers private entrance.

All units comprise a seating area with a sofa, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a dishwasher, an oven, a microwave and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Guests at the villa will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint Malo, like windsurfing.

Solidor Tower is 4.7 km from Villa du Manoir 1685, while Palais du Grand Large is 4.9 km away. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 74 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Le Nautilus
description:
Hôtel Le Nautilus is set in a renovated 17th-century building and is located in the walled city of Saint-Malo. This hotel offers a bar, luggage storage and a shared lounge. The property is a 2-minute walk from Saint-Vincent Cathedral and 50 metres from the beach. The property offers 4 Dutch bikes for free according to availability.

All the rooms feature soundproofing, a desk and satellite TV. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The bed linen has been upgraded for a 5 stars sleep quality.

Hôtel Le Nautilus is 300 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and 50 metres from several restaurants. Rennes Airport is 80 km away and free WiFi is included.

name: Cap à l'Ouest by Cocoonr
description:
Located 200 metres from Eventail Beach and 400 metres from Sillon Beach in the centre of Saint Malo, Cap à l'Ouest by Cocoonr provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The 3-star apartment features sea views and is 500 metres from Bon Secours Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Grand Bé.

Featuring a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room, a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint Malo, like hiking and walking tours.

Popular points of interest near Cap à l'Ouest by Cocoonr include Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort.

name: La Marinière Hôtel Restaurant
description:
Boasting a restaurant, bar and views of city, La Marinière Hôtel Restaurant is set in Saint Malo, 1 km from Sillon Beach. Featuring a terrace, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service and a concierge service for guests.

At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe. All rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at La Marinière Hôtel Restaurant have a balcony.

A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast is available at the property.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Eventail Beach, Bas-Sablons Beach and Palais du Grand Large.

name: Hotel des Abers
description:
Set in a property originally built in the 16th century, Hotel des Abers is situated in central Saint Malo, 400 metres from Saint-Malo Casino and 500 metres from Cale de Dinan Ferry. Saint-Malo Marina is 290 metres away.

The rooms have a flat-screen TV. The hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.

National Fort is 500 metres from Hotel des Abers, while Espace Duguay Trouin is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Pleurtuit Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Les Charmettes
description:
Les Charmettes, on the seafront in the Brittany town of Saint-Malo, offers direct beach access and a guests can sample a drink at the beach bar. Each guest room has a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

All seaside room feature a balcony, while other rooms look onto the courtyard. All rooms come with a nautical theme.

The hotel Les Charmettes serves a continental breakfast, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room. The on-site restaurant serves traditional meals including seafood platters. Guests can also relax on the hotel terrace, overlooking the sea.

The Sillon beach is situated directly in front of the hotel and the Saint Malo Train Station is 2 km away. Guests can reach Saint-Malo city centre within 30 minutes by walk.

name: Hotel Eden
description:
The charming Hotel Eden is located 100 meters from the beach, with direct access to the old town and the congress centre. It offers comfortable rooms.

Start the day with a delicious breakfast in the Hotel Eden’s spacious breakfast room. In the summertime you can dine on the pretty outdoor terrace.

Hotel Eden makes a great base for exploring the sites of Brittany and Normandy. The hotel is located on the road to the Mont Saint-Michel.

After a busy day sightseeing you can enjoy a drink and a snack back at the Hotel Eden’s cosy lounge bar.

The hotel is only 2,3 kilometres from Saint-Malo's TGV train station and 3 kilometres from the ferry terminal to Jersey and Guernsey.

name: Hotel Ajoncs d'Or
description:
Hotel Ajoncs d'Or is located in the heart of the historic fortified city walls of Saint Malo, 350 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers individually decorated rooms, which feature original artwork and free Wi-Fi access.

Each soundproofed room has a private bathroom and satellite TV. Rooms are accessible by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the spacious bright dining room. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Ajoncs d'Or hotel bar.

The hotel is conveniently placed to make the most of St Malo's many famous restaurants. In the summer, Saint Malo is a lively seaside resort featuring numerous outdoor and beach activities. Gare de Saint-Malo Train station is 1.8 km away. Private parking is available for an additional fee and must be reserved in advance.

name: Hôtel San Pedro
description:
Ideally located in the centre of Saint Malo, Hôtel San Pedro offers continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to Grand Bé, Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo. Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at Hôtel San Pedro also have a city view.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and free use of bicycles is available at this 2-star hotel.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bon Secours Beach, Mole Beach and Eventail Beach.

name: Hotel De L'univers
description:
Hotel De L'univers is located in the walled city of Saint Malo in Brittany, and is walking distance to the ferry port and train station. The property is 400 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and offers free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are comfortable and equipped with TV, telephone and private bathroom.

Friendly staff are available to offer personalised service and advice on the area.

Hotel De L'univers is located directly in front of the castle, close to the sea, with a view of the main square. From here you can easily explore the historical city on foot.

name: Hôtel Anne de Bretagne
description:
Hôtel Anne de Bretagne is located in the old walled city of Saint Malo, 270 metres from Saint-Malo Marina, close to the ferry terminal and the exhibition centre. It offers 24-hour reception and bar service.

Hôtel Anne de Bretagne has simple, comfortable guestrooms with a TV. Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout the hotel free of charge.

The hotel Hôtel Anne de Bretagne also has computers for guests at reception and serves a buffet breakfast every morning.

name: Hôtel Bristol Union Intra Muros
description:
Hotel Bristol Union is located in the heart of Saint Malo, within the city walls of the old town and 180 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. Its rooms and suites are en suite with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily breakfast service is available. It is served in the dining area or in the comfort of your guest room. The bar offers a nice place to enjoy a quiet drink or evening aperitif.

The Bristol Union benefits from a convenient location for those wishing to explore and discover Saint-Malo and the picturesque region of Brittany. Mont Saint Michel is just a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

name: B&B HOTEL Saint-Malo Centre
description:
B&B HOTEL Saint-Malo Centre is located in Saint Malo, 2 km from the sea and 2.4 km from Saint-Malo's Grand Aquarium. The hotel offers rooms with a flat-screen TV  with cable channels and free WiFi access.

Rooms have a bathroom with a shower and towels. Extras include a desk and bed linen.

A continental breakfast is available daily and includes fresh bread, eggs and bacon as well as French pastries. The breakfast is available for children at a reduced rate. Food and drinks dispensers are also available on site.

B&B HOTEL Saint-Malo Centre is 3.2 km from Saint-Malo Ferry Terminal and 11.7 km from the city of Dinard. Saint-Jacques Airport is 66 km away and the property offers free parking. Saint-Malo Train Station is located 3 km from the property and can be reached by public transport.

Our property is open Monday to Thursday from 6:30 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. and from 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m.

Fridays from 6:30 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. to 8:30 p.m., and Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays from 7:30 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.

Outside of reception opening hours, head to the hotel entrance where a Room Vending Machine allows you to retrieve your room number and access code at any time.
To do this, have your reservation number and your bank card ready for payment, then let yourself be guided on the screen.

The access code to your room also opens the gate and the hotel lobby door if applicable.

name: Hôtel La Porte Saint Pierre-Logis Hôtel Intra Muros
description:
Situated inside the historic walls of Saint-Malo’s old town, this hotel is just 10 metres from the beach.

The guest rooms at La Porte Saint Pierre are decorated in a contemporary style and have a flat-screen TV and an electric kettle. Optical fiber access and a private bathroom, and some also have panoramic sea views.

Please note that all the rooms are accessed by a staircase.

In the mornings, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

A meeting room for up to 20 people is available on site.

Saint-Malo Train Station is 2 km from La Porte Saint Pierre. Numerous ferry connections to the Channel Islands and the UK are possible from Saint-Malo port, 1.5 km away.

name: Studio cocooning
description:
Studio cocooning is a beachfront property located in Saint Malo, 1.4 km from Rochebonne Beach and 1.7 km from Eventail Beach. Providing free private parking, the 3-star apartment is 300 metres from Sillon Beach. Grand Bé is 3.2 km away and Solidor Tower is 3.6 km from the apartment.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some chocolates or cookies. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint Malo, like fishing.

Popular points of interest near Studio cocooning include Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort.

name: Hôtel Ar Iniz
description:
Providing a direct access to the Sillon Beach, Hôtel Ar Iniz offers a regional restaurant, a bar and a terrace with a view of the sea. The modern-style hotel is situated 1.5 km from the city centre.

The elegant rooms at Hôtel Ar Iniz have a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a safety deposit box. The bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available daily and the restaurant on site serves dishes made with fresh and local products. Additional facilities are available such as free WiFi access and bicycle rental.

The property is located 12 km from Cancale and its beaches and a 45-minute drive from the city of Rennes. The train station is 3 km away and there is a private car park on site, available at an additional cost

name: Hyatt Place Rouen - Rouen Centre
description:
Situated in Rouen, less than 1 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, Hyatt Place Rouen - Rouen Centre features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. All rooms at Hyatt Place Rouen - Rouen Centre are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box.

The breakfast offers buffet, continental or American options.

Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall is 4.3 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 84 km away.

name: LE PETIT LH - PLAGE - B'PAM
description:
LE PETIT LH - PLAGE - B'PAM is situated in the Perret district of Le Havre, 700 metres from Le Volcan, less than 1 km from Perret Model Appartment and a 16-minute walk from Saint-Michel's Church. It is set 200 metres from Eglise St-Joseph and offers private check-in and check-out. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Le Havre Beach is 700 metres away.

This apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Le Havre, like walking tours.

Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts is 25 km from LE PETIT LH - PLAGE - B'PAM, while Honfleur's Old Harbour is 25 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Mercedes
description:
This 1930s Art-Deco building is located 1.4 km from the Champs-Elysées and Arc de Triomphe. It offers elegant rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi.

Each guest room at Hôtel Mercedes is serviced by a lift and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. It also has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Breakfast can be served every morning in guests' rooms.

Facilities and services at Hôtel Mercedes include a 24-hour reception, a 24-hour room service and an airport shuttle service available at an extra cost. The Hôtel Mercedes is just a 2-minute walk from Wagram Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Parc Monceau.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre
description:
Facing the beachfront, Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre offers 4-star accommodation in Le Havre and features a fitness centre, terrace and restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 500 metres from Le Havre Beach, 500 metres from Eglise St-Joseph and less than 1 km from Le Volcan. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Every room is fitted with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at the hotel have a balcony. All units will provide guests with a fridge.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

With staff speaking English, Spanish and French, around-the-clock guidance is available at the reception.

Perret Model Appartment is 1 km from Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre, while Saint-Michel's Church is 1.5 km away. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 39 km from the property.

name: Hôtel France et Chateaubriand
description:
The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand is located in the heart of the historic city of Saint Malo, 210 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers breathtaking views over the sea and le sillon.

The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand offer comfortable rooms with a refined decoration.

The restaurant serves many traditional seafood and regional specialties.

Its unique façade to Saint Malo, and the presence of the birthplace of Chateaubriand make the building to be classified a historical monument.

name: WS Opéra - Duphot
description:
WS Opéra - Duphot features accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Paris, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Popular points of interest nearby include Musée de l'Orangerie, Tuileries Garden and Orsay Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Fitted with a balcony, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Popular points of interest near WS Opéra - Duphot include Opéra Garnier, Louvre Museum and Gare Saint-Lazare. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Studio Bourdonnais
description:
Located in Paris, Studio Bourdonnais is 500 metres from the Eiffel Tower and 700 metres from the Quai Branly Museum. This self-catering studio offers free Wi-Fi access and modern-style décor.

Studio Bourdonnais features a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a telephone. The private bathroom includes a shower and a hairdryer.

Guests are able to prepare their own meals at the kitchenette, which is equipped with a microwave, a fridge and a stove. A dining area is also available.

Located on the ground floor, this studio is 550 metres from École Militaire Metro Station, which leads directly to Place de la Concorde. The Seine River is 800 metres away.

name: Hôtel Paris Voltaire
description:
Located in the heart of Paris in the 11th district, Hôtel Paris Voltaire is just a 13-minute walk from the famous Place des Vosges. It offers an elevator, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast serving orange juice, hot drinks, French pastries, jam and cheese is available every morning in the breakfast room at Hôtel Paris Voltaire.

Voltaire Metro Station is ideally located a 3-minute walk away and allows direct access to the Grands Boulevards and Galeries Lafayette. Place de la Bastille is a 12-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Danton Renaissance - F2 rénové - Tout équipé
description:
Danton Renaissance - F2 rénové - Tout équipé is located in Le Havre, 1.2 km from Saint-Michel's Church, 1.3 km from Perret Model Appartment, as well as 1.5 km from Le Volcan. The property is around 2.5 km from Eglise St-Joseph, 23 km from Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts and 23 km from Honfleur's Old Harbour. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.2 km from Le Havre Beach.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

La Forge Museum is 23 km from the apartment, while Trouville Casino is 40 km from the property. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Maison du Moulin Vert
description:
Featuring a garden and views of garden, Maison du Moulin Vert is a recently renovated aparthotel located in Paris, 2.9 km from Luxembourg Gardens. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units include a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms will provide you with a terrace and some have lake views. At the aparthotel, units have bed linen and towels.

If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchenette facilities, which include a toaster, a fridge and a stovetop.

Paris Expo - Porte de Versailles is 3.4 km from the aparthotel, while Rodin Museum is 3.8 km away. Paris - Orly Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: Nomad Hotel le Havre
description:
Nomad Hotel le Havre is located in Le Havre and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access and a modern-style decor. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Dock Océane shopping centre is 900 metres from this hotel and the city centre and its city hall are a 5-minute drive away.

All of the rooms at Nomad Hotel le Havre feature a tablet and a video projector. They all include a bathroom with free toiletries and a shower.

A breakfast is served everyday. Restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surroundings.

Le Havre Train Station is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and André Malraux Modern Art Museum is 2 km away.

name: Au coin du Volcan - Hypercentre
description:
Au coin du Volcan - Hypercentre has a balcony and is located in Le Havre, within just 100 metres of Le Volcan and 400 metres of Eglise St-Joseph. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Le Havre Beach.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Perret Model Appartment is 400 metres from Au coin du Volcan - Hypercentre, while Saint-Michel's Church is 1 km from the property.

name: Birgit Hôtel Le Havre Centre
description:
Welcome to Birgit!

When visiting Le Havre, there is nothing better than to stay in this 86-room hotel, completely renovated in 2022. Enjoy the friendly atmosphere  surrounded by antique objects and travel souvenirs.

Located close to the city centre, the train station and public transport, you can reach the beach and the esplanade of Le Havre in 10 minutes.

Stay in the cosy and designer rooms, suitable for couples, families, friends and business travellers.
Enjoy our breakfast made with love by our team from healthy and local products. Take time to enjoy one of our local drinks in our bar.

The B!rgit Le Havre hotel is the ideal base for your travels with family or friends and will be perfect for a break during a business trip.

name: Studio Meublé Vue Mer
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Studio Meublé Vue Mer is an accommodation set in Le Havre, 800 metres from Le Havre Beach and 200 metres from Eglise St-Joseph. Situated on the beachfront, this property has a casino. Parking on-site is available and the apartment also features bike hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.
