Featuring sea views, this apartment also includes a satellite flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop, as well as 1 bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

For guests with children, the apartment offers outdoor play equipment. A car rental service is available at Studio Meublé Vue Mer.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Le Volcan, Perret Model Appartment and Saint-Michel's Church. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 38 km from the property.

name: Appartement urbain à deux pas de la plage
description:
Offering quiet street views, Appartement urbain à deux pas de la plage is an accommodation located in Le Havre, 400 metres from Eglise St-Joseph and 700 metres from Le Volcan. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and bicycle parking, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from Le Havre Beach.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Perret Model Appartment is less than 1 km from the apartment, while Saint-Michel's Church is a 18-minute walk away.

name: Le Chaleureux
description:
Set 1.3 km from Saint-Michel's Church, 2.5 km from Le Volcan and 1.8 km from Perret Model Appartment, Le Chaleureux offers accommodation located in Le Havre. The property is around 3 km from Eglise St-Joseph, 23 km from Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts and 23 km from Honfleur's Old Harbour. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Le Havre Beach is 2.8 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Forge Museum is 23 km from the apartment, while Trouville-Deauville SNCF Railway Station is 40 km from the property.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Le Havre Centre
description:
Our hotel, located in Le Havre downtown and at 600 meters from the SNCF train station, welcomes you for a professional and leisure stay. Our location is ideal to quickly reach the city center or the beach by the streetcar, accessible in front of the hotel. You will appreciate the quality of amenities: Wi-Fi, snacking, buffet style breakfast and the lounge bar. In order to facilitate your arrival by car, you can enjoy our private parking
. Book one of our large cosy rooms and enjoy your stay!

name: Les 4 Saisons - Vue Bassin & Volcan - Quartier Perret UNESCO
description:
Offering city views, Les 4 Saisons - Vue Bassin & Volcan - Quartier Perret UNESCO is an accommodation set in Le Havre, 100 metres from Le Volcan and 500 metres from Eglise St-Joseph. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Le Havre Beach.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Perret Model Appartment is 300 metres from the apartment, while Saint-Michel's Church is less than 1 km from the property. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 38 km away.

name: Hotel Spa Le Pasino
description:
Located at the heart of Le Havre, Hotel Spa le Pasino features an indoor swimming pool, a spa with sauna and a casino on site. It offers guest rooms with a flat-screen TV.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a queen-size bed and some offer views over the harbour. All private bathrooms include a hairdryer and bathrobes.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Spa le Pasino. Guests can work out in the fitness centre or relax in the spa bath at the hotel's spa.

Le Havre Train Station is a 6-minute drive from the hotel and free private parking is available on site. Malraux Museum is 1 km away.

name: Maison Coty - Hypercentre/Plage
description:
A recently renovated property, Maison Coty - Hypercentre/Plage is situated in Le Havre near Le Havre Beach, Saint-Michel's Church and Perret Model Appartment. It is set 1.5 km from Eglise St-Joseph and provides free shuttle service. The property is non-smoking and is located 1 km from Le Volcan.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Le Havre, like walking tours. Guests at Maison Coty - Hypercentre/Plage can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts is 24 km from the accommodation, while Honfleur's Old Harbour is 24 km from the property.

name: Best Western ARThotel
description:
The Best Western Art Hotel is located in the heart of Perret in Le Havre, just a 10-minute walk from the beach. The main destinations in Normandy are located within driving distance, such as Honfleur, 20 minutes away, Etretat, 30 minutes away and Deauville, which is 40 minutes away.

Decorated in a contemporary style by various artists, all rooms feature free Wi-Fi access, a flat-screen TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the guest rooms or in the dining room. Guests can also relax in the Art Hotel's bar.

A buffet breakfast is served only daily in the dining room.

name: All Suites Appart Hotel Le Havre
description:
Set in Le Havre, 2.8 km from Le Havre Beach, All Suites Appart Hotel Le Havre provides accommodation with a terrace and private parking. This 3-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift. The accommodation offers a sauna, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

At the aparthotel, the units are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. At the aparthotel, all units are soundproof. At the aparthotel, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The aparthotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

You can play billiards at All Suites Appart Hotel Le Havre.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Le Volcan, Saint-Michel's Church and Perret Model Appartment.

name: l'Île Enchantée - Centre Historique du Havre
description:
Offering city views, l'Île Enchantée - Centre Historique du Havre is an accommodation set in Le Havre, 700 metres from Le Volcan and 1.1 km from Eglise St-Joseph. The property is situated less than 1 km from Perret Model Appartment, a 16-minute walk from Saint-Michel's Church and 24 km from Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Le Havre Beach is 2 km away.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation offers a fireplace.

Guests can relax near the outdoor fireplace at the apartment.

Honfleur's Old Harbour is 24 km from the apartment, while La Forge Museum is 24 km away.

name: ibis Le Havre Centre
description:
The ibis hotel is located in the centre of Le Havre, close to the SNCF railway station, ferry ports and International Trade Centre. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

Ibis Le Havre Centre provides guest rooms equipped with private bathroom, satellite TV and ironing facilities.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Ibis Le Havre Centre is within easy access of the A29 and A131 motorways. Deauville is 40 km from the property, while Honfleur is 22.8 km from ibis Le Havre Centre. Parking is possible on site for guests arriving by car and there is also a meeting room.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage
description:
This hotel is located in the town centre of Le Havre, just 100 metres from the sea and next to the Malraux museum. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

Each guest room at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served every morning.

Parking is available in front of the hotel, which is free during the night and on Sundays and public holidays.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage is a 30-minute drive from both Honfleur and Etretat. Deauville and Trouville are 40 km away.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan,Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
Set in Le Havre and with Le Havre Beach reachable within 2.3 km, The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides karaoke and room service.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare also provide guests with a city view. The units at the accommodation come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Popular points of interest near The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare include Saint-Michel's Church, Le Volcan and Perret Model Appartment. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Hôtel Richelieu, Le Havre Centre-Ville
description:
Located between the town hall and the cathedral, Hôtel Richelieu, Le Havre Centre-Ville is located in the heart of Le Havre, just a 10-minute walk from the beach and 24 km from Honfleur. All rooms are located on upper floors and offer satellite TV, a private bathroom and free Wi-Fi.

Breakfast is served daily in the Richelieu’s dining room. The hotel also provides free newspapers.

The ferry port is just 500 metres away. The hotel is close to several restaurants, theatres and cinemas. It is 44 km from Deauville.

name: Vintage Paris Gare du Nord by Hiphophostels
description:
Set in the 9th district, this air-conditioned hotel is located just 500 metres from Gare du Nord Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge. Vintage Hostel Gare du Nord has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi.

Each guest room has a private bathroom and feature a LCD TV. A free fitness room is at your disposal on site.

Anvers Metro Station is 250 metres away, providing direct access to the Arc de Triomphe. Saint-Pierre fabric market is just 450 metres from the hotel and the Sacré-Coeur Basilique is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Flanelles Paris
description:
Located opposite Gare du Nord Train Station, this hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Sacre-Coeur and the Montmartre district of the city are a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

Each soundproofed guest room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. All rooms at Hotel Flanelles Paris offer an en suite bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. Additional services offered include a 24-hour reception desk and a luggage storage room.

The hotel is located 1 km from Canal Saint-Martin and 1.5 km from Place de la République. Gare du Nord Metro Station offers direct access to Notre-Dame Cathedral.

name: 9Hotel Republique
description:
Situated just 500 metres from Place de la République, 9Hotel Republique offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. There is also and a fitness centre and guests can benefit from a 24-hour front desk at the property.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and seating area. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer.

Breakfast in available in the dining room or in guests' rooms. Restaurants are in walking distance from the hotel and guests can have a drink at the hotel's bar. Additional facilities include a business centre for guests' convenience.

Nearby attractions include the Pompidou Centre and Park Buttes Chaumont which are both 20 minutes' walk from 9Hotel Republique. Paris Orly Airport is 19 km from the property.

name: Hotel Beaugrenelle Tour Eiffel
description:
Located on the left bank in central Paris, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower and the departure point of the Bateaux Mouches cruise boats. It has a 24-hour reception and a lounge with a computer and marble flooring.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a mini fridge, cable TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has a bathroom including a hairdryer at hotel Beaugrenelle.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the spacious breakfast room at Beaugrenelle Tour Eiffel. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar while reading the newspapers provided.

Dupleix Metro Station is 240 metres away, providing access to the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées, the Eiffel Tower and Montparnasse Railway Station.

name: Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille
description:
Situated just 300 metres from Gare de Lyon TGV Train, RER and Metro Stations in central Paris, this air-conditioned hotel offers a 24-hour reception and ticket service. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a flat-screen TV and a desk. All of the rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning while reading the newspapers provided. A vending machine selling drinks is located at reception.

Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille is located just 500 metres from the banks of the River Seine. The trendy nightlife of Bastille is a 10-minute walk away. Public parking is available nearby.

Breakfast is served in the breakfast room on the ground floor from 7am to 10.30 am. An "express" breakfast formula including 1 hot drink, 1 fruit juice and 2 viennoiseries is also available (to request to the hotel).

name: Hôtel Le Regent Paris
description:
In an 18th-century building in the historic 6th district, this elegant hotel (25 rooms) offers air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Odéon Metro Station is 800 ft away.

Satellite TV and a minibar are available in each soundproofed room. Guest rooms have a romantic décor with pastel colors. Some rooms feature a view of Rue de Buci. Enjoy a continental breakfast every morning in the vaulted cellar at Le Regent.

After breakfast, guests can relax in the lounge, which has marble floors and antique furnishings. With a 24-hour front desk, hotel Le Regent provides a tour desk and a ticket service. Notre Dame Cathedral is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and Eugène-Delacroix Museum is 1000 ft away. An airport shuttle service is available upon request

name: Hôtellerie L'Enclos Rey
description:
Boasting a garden, Hôtellerie L'Enclos Rey is set in Paris in the Ile de France region, 1.7 km from Eiffel Tower and 1.9 km from Paris Expo - Porte de Versailles. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.3 km from Rodin Museum.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Guests at Hôtellerie L'Enclos Rey can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Orsay Museum is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Parc des Princes is 3.9 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 17 km away.

name: Citadines Austerlitz Paris
description:
Midway between the Latin Quarter and Bibliothèque François Mitterrand, this Citadines Austerlitz Paris is a 3-minute walk from the Campo Formio Métro station. It is a 10-minute walk from Gare d'Austerlitz.

Citadines Apart'hôtel Austerlitz features 50 apartments, including studios and a 2-room apartment. They all have a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

The spacious and luminous breakfast room looks out onto the garden where the terrace is set in the summertime.

The Citadines Apart'hôtel offers a business centre with free Wi-Fi access, a laundry room and on-site car park with spaces subject to availability. Place d'Italie and Jardin des Plantes are both a 10-minute walk away.

name: HOTEL FORMIO
description:
Providing free WiFi throughout the property, HOTEL FORMIO is situated in Paris, 2.2 km from Luxembourg Gardens and 2.8 km from Sainte-Chapelle. The property is around 2.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral, 2.9 km from Opéra Bastille and 4.4 km from Pompidou Centre. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at HOTEL FORMIO also offer a city view. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available at HOTEL FORMIO.

Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Orsay Museum is 4.6 km from the hotel, while Rodin Museum is 4.6 km away. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Maison Traversière
description:
This hotel is located in Paris’s Bastille district, 100 metres from the Gare de Lyon, in a quiet street. It offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and private bathrooms.

Guests of the Hotel Du Midi can relax in the TV room or the lounge, which have internet access.

Additional services include a 24-hour reception.

Maison Traversière is a few minutes’ walk from the Bastille, Opera Bastille, the Seine and the Place des Vosges.

name: L'Espérance
description:
Located in the Montparnasse area of Paris, L’Espérance offers a 24-hour reception, a luggage service and free Wi-Fi access throughout. Gaîté Metro Station is just a 2-minute walk away and allows direct access to the Champs-Elysées.The property doesn't offer breakfast service.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, hanging rail, and desk . The en suite bathroom is complete with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Montparnasse Tower and Train Station is a 5-minute walk away and gives you a panoramic view of Paris. The Luxembourg gardens are just 2 km away and public parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: 1.75 Paris Le Charme
description:
Ideally set in the 13th arr. District of Paris, 1.75 Paris Le Charme is set 2.2 km from Luxembourg Gardens, 3.2 km from Sainte-Chapelle and 3.4 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon. The property is situated 3.5 km from Notre Dame Cathedral, 4.4 km from Orsay Museum and 4.5 km from Rodin Museum. The hotel offers city views, a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

1.75 Paris Le Charme offers an à la carte or continental breakfast.

Opéra Bastille is 4.5 km from the accommodation, while Pompidou Centre is 4.7 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 12 km away.

name: District Nation
description:
Located 500 metres from Place de la Nation in Paris, the hotel District Nation is a non-smoking property offering a 24-hour reception and luggage storage.

All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. District Nation features free WiFi throughout the property.

Continental breakfast can be enjoyed at an extra cost.

Bastille lively district is 20 minute away by walk and Pere Lachaise can also be reached within 20 minute. Guests can easily reach the Champs Elysées within 20 minutes by public transport. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18.5 km from the property.

name: Hotel Prince Albert Opéra
description:
Set in central Paris, a 2-minute walk from Opéra Garnier and Galeries Lafayette, this hotel offers simple rooms with flat-screen TVs. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel.

All of the rooms at the Prince Albert Opéra are serviced by an elevator. They each have satellite TV, a telephone and an en suite bathroom with a bath or shower.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the Prince Albert Opéra. A vending machine serving drinks is also available to guests.

The reception desk at Prince Albert Opéra is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are available each day in the lobby area.

The hotel is just a 3-minute walk from Havre-Caumartin Metro Station, which provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower.

name: Suites FL By Sweett
description:
Situated in the 17th arr. District in Paris, Suites FL By Sweett offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is around 1.1 km from Arc de Triomphe, 2.9 km from Eiffel Tower and 3.2 km from Musée de l'Orangerie. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Palais des Congrès de Paris.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Suites FL By Sweett features some rooms that have a terrace, and rooms are fitted with a kettle.

Gare Saint-Lazare is 3.5 km from the accommodation, while Tuileries Garden is 3.9 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 22 km away.

name: Hotel Vacances Bleues Provinces Opera
description:
Hôtel Vacances Bleues Provinces Opera is located in the lively neighborhood of the Grands Boulevards, next to the theatres and 300 metres from Grand Rex cinema. The Grévin Museum is 650 metres away while Opéra Garnier is 1.6 km away.

The hotel has air-conditioned rooms, a Grand Salon and meeting rooms.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning.

The Pompidou Centre is 1.7 km from Hôtel Vacances Bleues Provinces Opera and famous shops such as the Galeries Lafayette can be found 1.4 km away.

name: Hotel de Flore - Montmartre
description:
Situated in the 18th district, a 13-minute walk from Basilique Sacré Coeur, Hotel de Flore - Montmartre features ticket service, free fiber-optic internet connection and rooms with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels. A continental breakfast is available.

The bathrooms at Hotel de Flore - Montmartre are fitted with a shower. The rooms are simply decorated and have a telephone.

The breakfast Buffet includes French baguette from an award-winning bakery.  Restaurants and bars can be found less than 50 metres away from the hotel.

It is a 4-minute walk from Lamarck-Caulaincourt Metro Station which provides direct access to Saint-Lazare Train Station and La Madeleine. The Stade de France is a 20-minute metro ride from the hotel.

name: Le Monsieur By Sweett
description:
Situated in the 9th arr. District in Paris, Le Monsieur By Sweett offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is around 1.2 km from La Cigale Concert Hall, 1.6 km from Gare Saint-Lazare and 1.6 km from Louvre Museum. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Gare du Nord.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Popular points of interest near Le Monsieur By Sweett include Pigalle Metro Station, Opéra Garnier and Gare de l'Est. Paris - Orly Airport is 20 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Gérando
description:
Hotel Gérando is located in the Montmartre area in Paris. The hotel features a 24-hour reception, a luggage storage and free WiFi.

The soundproofed rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. All rooms are also serviced by a lift.

The Gérando’s continental breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room.

Restaurant and bars can be found within walking distance. Hotel Gérando is a 2-minute walk from Anvers Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Sacré-Cœur Basilica and a 14-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge.

name: Old Lille - Lovely typical apartment!
description:
Old Lille - Lovely typical apartment! is located in the Vieux Lille district of Lille, 600 metres from Printemps Gallery, 600 metres from Lille Opera and 1.1 km from Zoo Lille. The property is around 2.1 km from Lille Europe Train Station, 1.3 km from Hospice Gantois and 1.2 km from Aeronef. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and The Old Lille District is 400 metres away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Grand Place Lille, Lille Flandres Train Station and Tour de Lille. Lille Airport is 11 km away.

name: Residhotel Lille Vauban
description:
Residhotel Lille Vauban is ideally situated in the residential Vauban district, just a 20-minute walk from Lille Old Town. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available free of charge in the rooms.

The property offers studios equipped with a kitchenette with Nespresso coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a desk. Apartments fitted with a kitchen with Nespresso coffee machine, a dining area and a living area are also available. Each accommodation features a private bathroom.

Breakfast buffet is available at a surcharge at Residhotel Lille Vauban.

Chromecast service is available in all rooms.

From your aparthotel, the 45 hectares of the Bois de Boulogne is just 10 minutes away by walk, while Lille Grand Place is 20 minutes from Residhotel Lille Vauban. Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre is a 20 minutes walking distance from the property.

name: OKKO Hotels Lille Centre
description:
OKKO Hotels Lille Centre has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Lille. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Hospice Gantois.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options.

OKKO Hotels Lille Centre features amenities such as an on-site business centre and sauna.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Printemps Gallery, Lille Flandres Train Station and Grand Place Lille. Lille Airport is 9 km from the property.

name: Hotel De La Treille
description:
Hôtel de la Treille is located a 3-minute walk from Lille old district, 650 meters from Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre and 1.5 km from Lille Grand Palais. This pet-friendly accommodation offers free WiFi throughout.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Lille's Opera is 350 metres away, while Lille Europe train station is 15 minutes away by walk. Hôtel de la Treille is a 17-minute drive from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

name: Brit Hotel Lille Centre
description:
Set near the Gambetta Métro station, in the city centre of Lille, this hotel-restaurant welcomes you 1 km from the Fine Arts Museum, 2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 300 metres from the Maison Folie de Wazemmes.

The Brit Hotel Lille Centre is ideal for both business and leisure stays. It offers easy access from the main roads, secure, covered parking, bicycle storage and a restaurant serving buffet food.

The rooms are all equipped with a working area with high-speed, free Wi-Fi.

Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.6 km away.

name: Hôtel Saint Maurice
description:
Located in a quiet pedestrian area in the centre of Lille, next to the Saint Maurice Gothic church, the hotel offers free WiFi access in all areas. Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre is 850 metres from Hôtel Saint Maurice.

Hôtel Saint Maurice features 38 rooms accessible by lift. Each room features a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access.

The hotel is 10 minutes walking from the old town and its museums. Lille Grand Place is 450 metres away, while Lille Grand Palais is 1.5 km from the hotel. Public parking is available at a surcharge near the property.

name: Hyper centre chambre au calme
description:
Hyper centre chambre au calme is located in the Lille Centre district of Lille, 800 metres from The Old Lille District, 400 metres from Lille Opera and 1.3 km from Zoo Lille. It is set 1 km from Hospice Gantois and offers free WiFi plus a lift. The property is 300 metres from Printemps Gallery, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Coilliot House, Grand Place Lille and Lille Flandres Train Station. Lille Airport is 10 km away.

name: Hotel Art Deco Euralille
description:
Located 1 km from Lille-Europe Train Station, Hotel Art Deco Euralille is situated in the heart of the Euralille business district. The Grand Place is a 20-minute walk away, while Lille Grand Palais and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are 1.7 km from Hotel Art Deco Euralille. This hotel features an on site bar.

Rooms are bright and have an Art Deco design. They each have air-conditioning, a satellite TV and free WiFi access. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the hotel’s bar, which features a stained glass ceiling from the 1930s and leather chairs. There is also a library at the disposal of guests.

Romarin Metro and Tram Station is located in front of the hotel and offers direct access to Lille Flandres Station.

name: Appart'City Confort Lille Grand Palais
description:
Located in Lille City Centre, this residence is 700 metres from the Grand Palais and a 15-minute drive from Lille Grand Palais Convention Centre. It offers modern apartments with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV. Public parking is available on site.

The kitchenette in the soundproofed apartments includes a microwave, a fridge and a coffee maker. Each apartment features a seating area and dining area. All apartments have a private bathroom and are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served from Monday to Sunday at the Appart'city Lille Grand Palais and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Vending machines selling drinks are available at reception.

Lille-Flandres Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and Lille Grand Palais Metro Station is 900 metres away. The property is a 12-minute drive from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

name: Odalys City Le Havre Centre Les Docks
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodation, Odalys City Le Havre Centre Les Docks is located in Le Havre, 2.9 km from Le Havre Beach and 1.8 km from Le Volcan. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

The units come with carpeted floor and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Saint-Michel's Church is 1.9 km from Odalys City Le Havre Centre Les Docks, while Perret Model Appartment is 1.7 km away.

name: Le Nest by Sweett
description:
Situated in Paris, 1 km from Gare Saint-Lazare, Le Nest by Sweett features air-conditioned accommodation and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers free WiFi. Musée de l'Orangerie is 2.7 km from the hotel and Arc de Triomphe is 3 km away.

The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

Le Nest by Sweett offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Pigalle Metro Station, Opéra Garnier and La Cigale Concert Hall. Paris - Orly Airport is 19 km from the property.

name: Mama Shelter Lille
description:
Mama Shelter Lille is located in the centre of Lille, a 4-minute walk from Lille Flandres Train and Metro Stations, as well as a 7-minute walk from Lille Europe Train Station. This hotel is also 600 metres from the Grand'Place and Lille's Opera.

The air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and free video-on-demand. They also have a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Mama Shelter Lille. The restaurant serves homemade meals and guests can also enjoy cocktails at the bar .

Speaking 5 languages, staff are always on hand to help at the 24-hour front desk. The property also has laundry facilities, a concierge service and a car park.

Euralille shopping centre is 350 metres from the property and Lille Palace of Fine Arts is 1.4 km away, while Notre-Dame de la Treille Cathedral is 850 metres from Mama Shelter Lille. Lille-Lesquin Airport is 11 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place
description:
On the Grand Place in Old Lille, Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place is set in a building of Flemish architecture and the rooms offer a marble bathroom and antique furniture. Rihour Metro Station is 100 metres away, Le Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is a 2-minute walk from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 1.4 km away.

The hotel was renovated in 2018. Each air-conditioned guest room is equipped with satellite TV and free WiFi access. The elegant, soundproofed rooms include a minibar and some have tea and coffee making facilities. Staff is available 24 hours a day.

An extensive and varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place. Guests can enjoy cocktails in Le Windsor bar and there are restaurants 50 metres away.

The historic centre is a 5-minute walk and Lille Flandres Train Station is 900 metres away.  Bois de Boulogne Park and the Citadelle are 1.5 km away and Lesquin Airport is 11 km away. Meeting rooms are available on site. There is a public car park 100 metres away.

name: HOTEL AMBASSADEUR
description:
Well set in the centre of Lille, HOTEL AMBASSADEUR provides buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 2-star hotel offers a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Lille Flandres Train Station.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at HOTEL AMBASSADEUR also provide guests with a city view. All units in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Popular points of interest near HOTEL AMBASSADEUR include Zénith of Lille, Hospice Gantois and Grand Place Lille. Lille Airport is 9 km away.

name: Hotel Du Moulin d'Or
description:
Located next to Lille Flandre train station and in 5 minutes from the city centre, the Hotel Du Moulin d’Or is 900 metres from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre.

All the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with shower. A flat-screen TV with French satellite channels and free internet access are provided in the room.

Breakfasts are served in the dining room or directly in your room and includes artisanal jam and fresh fruit salad. Animals are allowed within the hotel.

Lille Grand Palais is 650 metres from the property.

name: CALM Appart' & Hostel
description:
Calm Apparthotel is located in Lille just a 2-minute walk away from the Gare Lille Flandres metro, tram and train stations and the a 10-minute walk from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre. Guests can enjoy free WiFi.

The contemporary apartments at Calm Apparthotel are decorated in neutral tones. Each apartment offers a kitchenette, a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom.

Guests can prepare homemade meals in their private kitchenette equipped with a stove, microwave and a refrigerator. Restaurants and supermarkets can be found within a 5-minute walk.

The Lille-Lesquin Airport is 15 minutes away and the Citadel of Lille is 2 km away. Grand Palais is 900 metres away from Calm Apparthotel. Private parking is available at the aparthotel at an extra cost.

name: Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais
description:
Located 1 km from Lille Grand Palais and the Euralille business district, the Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais offers soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi. Free closed private parking is also available.

ATTENTION: the hotel is currently undergoing renovation and may be noisy during pre-set hours; however, everything is in place to welcome you in the best conditions.

Each room at Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais includes a flat-screen TV, telephone and tea and coffee-making facilities. The attractively decorated rooms feature a bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every day. You can enjoy your meals 24 hours a day in the comfort of your room. After dinner, you can relax with a drink in the hotel bar or watch TV in the lounge. Other facilities include a meeting room.

The nearest metro station to the hotel is Caulier (Line 1), 450 meters away. The hotel is ideally located 7 minutes' walk from Lille Europe station and 10 minutes' walk from Lille Flandres station. The Zenith and Aéronef concert halls are 8 and 10 minutes' walk respectively, and the Grand Place is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

The Pierre Mauroy stadium is 10 km from the Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais. The N356 motorway is within easy reach, a 3-minute drive away.

name: Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes
description:
Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes is a 17-century former convent located 5 minutes from the centre of Lille. Nouveau siecle Convention Centre is 450 metres from Alliance Lille Couvent des Minimes. The hotel offers a luxurious lounge area and patio covered by a glass roof.

Each air-conditioned room has stylish décor and equipped Canal+ satellite TV and a minibar. They also have a marble bathroom and free Wi-Fi access.

Le Jardin du Cloître restaurant serves a buffet breakfast daily and local cuisine based on fresh market products. L’Échiquier Piano Bar offers live entertainment every evening.

Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes sits just 150 metres from Bois de Boulogne, a leafy 50-hectare park. It is also 15 minutes from both Lille Europe and Lille Flandre SNCF/TGV Train Stations by car. Lille Grand Palais is 6 km from Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes, while Pierre Mauroy Stadium is 6 km away.

name: Lille A Part - Gites Urbains
description:
Located in the heart of Lille Old Town, this property offers 2 apartments located just a 10-minute walk from Lille Flandres Train Station, 2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 1.1 km from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre. You can admire the courtyard from the living room while browsing the free WiFi.

Set in an 18th-century building, Lille A Part is now decorated in a contemporary style and includes a seating area with a flat-screen TV. There is also a dining area and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hosts can provide a continental breakfast or you can prepare breakfast yourself using the toaster and Nespresso coffee machine. There are also hot-plates and a microwave for making hot meals.

Public parking with an additional charge is available near the apartment and Lille Europe Train Station is a 15-minute walk away. You may also choose to visit the Grand Place, also 15 minutes away on foot.

name: Moxy Lille City
description:
Conveniently set in Lille, Moxy Lille City provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. Private parking is available on site.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Popular points of interest near Moxy Lille City include Coilliot House, Printemps Gallery and Hospice Gantois. Lille Airport is 7 km away.

name: Ibis Budget Lille Gares Vieux-Lille
description:
Located in Lille, Hotel Ibis Budget Lille Gares Vieux-Lille is 400 metres from the Old District and 400 metres from Grand'Place. It offers free WiFi access and a 24-hour front desk.

Serviced by a lift, each non-smoking room features a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Extras include a desk and bed linen.

There are vending machines for drinks on site and a large range of restaurants can be found in the area.

Hotel Ibis Budget Lille Gares Vieux-Lille is 750 metres from Lille- Europe Railway Station and 600 metres from Lille Flandres Train Station. Lille Airport is 8 km away.

name: Lille City Hotel
description:
Set on a pedestrian shopping street in Lille City Centre, this low-cost hotel is 260 metres from the Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum, 1.2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 9 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium. Rooms feature satellite TV and free internet access.

Each air-conditioned guest room at Lille City Hotel is equipped with a telephone. All of the rooms have a private bathroom and are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Lille City Hotel. There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Lille-Flandres Train Station is just a 10-minute walk from Lille City Hotel. The Opera House and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are 600 metres from the hotel and the historic centre is 1 km away.

name: Hotel Chagnot
description:
Hotel Chagnot is situated in Lille city centre, directly opposite Lille Flanders Train Station and a 10-minute walk from Lille-Europe Station. It offers modern accommodation and free Wi-Fi access. Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre and Grand Palais Convention Centre are both 1 km away.

All of the soundproofed guest rooms have a private bathroom with shower and they are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Hotel Chagnot serves an express breakfast to takeaway.

The hotel is located 8.8 km from Lille-Lesquin Airport. Le Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum is 15-minute walk from the hotel. Department stores Printemps and Galeries Lafayette are a 10-minute walk away, while the Opéra de Lille is 450 metres away. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 16-minute drive away.

name: Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre by IHG
description:
Located in Lille city centre, this hotel is 350 metres from Lille’s Palais des Beaux Arts and 9 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium. Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 900 metres from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 2 km away.

Rooms at the Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a telephone, hairdryer and tea and coffee making facilities. All rooms are serviced by a lift. Free WiFi access is available.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily.

The Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre offers a 24-hour reception desk and secured, underground parking (subject to availability). Additional facilities include 1 meeting room and a dry-cleaning service.

The nearest Metro Station is République Beaux Arts, which offers direct access to Lille Europe and Lille Flandres Train Stations. The hotel is located 800 metres from La Grande Place and 1.5 km from The Citadel of Lille.

name: Stay Appart Hotel Lille Centre
description:
Situated within 300 metres of Printemps Gallery and 1 km of Hospice Gantois in the centre of Lille, Stay Appart Hotel Lille Centre features accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lille, like walking tours.

Popular points of interest near Stay Appart Hotel Lille Centre include The Old Lille District, Lille Opera and Zoo Lille. Lille Airport is 10 km from the property.

name: Hotel Lille Europe
description:
Located just 250 metres from Lille-Flandres Train Station, this 3-star hotel is set at the heart of the international business district. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 17-minute drive away. This hotel has a 24-hour reception and free internet access.

All soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a TV with cable channels. Each colourful room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All rooms at Hotel Lille Europe are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can use the microwave in the breakfast room featuring panoramic views.

Lille Europe hotel is accessible via the N356 motorway. The Opéra House is 750 metres from the hotel and Notre-Dame Basilica is a 10-minute walk away. Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the hotel and the Grand Palais is 1.3 km from the hotel. Private parking on site is available and upon request only.

name: Hôtel particulier "le clos de la croix"
description:
Featuring a garden and views of city, Hôtel particulier "le clos de la croix" is a bed and breakfast situated in a historic building in Bayeux, 300 metres from Baron Gerard Museum. The property has inner courtyard views and is 400 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux and 500 metres from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry. The bed and breakfast features family rooms.

The units at the bed and breakfast come with a seating area. Each unit comes with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a terrace and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, all units have bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the continental breakfast.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

German Battery of D-Day is 8.2 km from the bed and breakfast, while D-Day Museum is 10 km away. Caen–Carpiquet Airport is 28 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Le Saint Patrice
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodation, Hôtel Le Saint Patrice is situated in Bayeux, 800 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 1.2 km from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry. The property is around 8.5 km from German Battery of D-Day, 11 km from D-Day Museum and 12 km from Arromanches 360. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hôtel Le Saint Patrice also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a city view. The units in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Buffet and American breakfast options are available at Hôtel Le Saint Patrice.

Omaha Beach Memorial Museum is 20 km from the hotel, while Omaha Beach is 20 km away. Caen–Carpiquet Airport is 28 km from the property.

name: Hôtel De Brunville & Spa
description:
Just 400 metres from Bayeux Cathedral, this hotel offers an outdoor heated pool and a jacuzzi  which are accessible all year round. It is ideally located in the centre of Bayeux, near the Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry, and few kilometers away from the D-Day's beaches.

Rooms at the Hôtel de Brunville & Spa are comfortable and well-equipped with modern amenities.
A continental buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel De Brunville & Spa. Fresh, regional products are served in the hotel’s restaurant and guests can enjoy drinks in the bar, or by the pool.

The Spa du Grand Luxembourg, located in an indoor 200 m² space, is the result of our quest for the very best in well-being treatments and equipment.

Come and discover our new offer, unique in Bayeux: jacuzzi, sauna, hammam, 4-season sensory shower, ice fountain, salt cave with infrared deckchairs and PHYTOMER treatments.
The indoor wellness area and treatments are available on reservation.

A limited number of paid parking spaces are available

name: Odalys City Amiens Blamont
description:
Set within 2.8 km of Zénith d'Amiens and 900 metres of Berny's Museum in Amiens, Odalys City Amiens Blamont offers accommodation with free WiFi.

The studios all have a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, kettle, and a fridge. There is also a flat-screen TV.

The Floating Gardens Park is a 13-minute walk from the aparthotel, while Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is an 11-minute walk from Odalys City Amiens Blamont. Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport is 50 km away.

name: Appartement Les Jardins de Jules Verne - Côté Jardin
description:
Boasting garden views, Appartement Les Jardins de Jules Verne - Côté Jardin features accommodation with a garden and a terrace, around 2.8 km from Zénith d'Amiens. The property is situated 1.5 km from Berny's Museum, 2.4 km from The Floating gardens Park and 1.4 km from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is 1.7 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

University of Picardie Jules Verne is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Amiens Golf Club is 9.4 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 63 km away.

name: The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud
description:
Situated in Amiens, 3.6 km from Zénith d'Amiens, The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.8 km from Amiens Train Station.

At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms come with a seating area. All units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Berny's Museum is 3.7 km from The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud, while The Floating gardens Park is 4.5 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 61 km away.

name: Nemea Appart Hotel Coliseum Amiens Centre
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodation, Nemea Appart Hotel Coliseum Amiens Centre is set in Amiens, 1.7 km from Amiens Train Station and 1.9 km from Zénith d'Amiens. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel features a fitness room and private check-in and check-out.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchenette has a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. A stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. At the aparthotel, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options.

Berny's Museum is 1.2 km from the aparthotel, while The Floating gardens Park is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 64 km from Nemea Appart Hotel Coliseum Amiens Centre.

name: B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale
description:
Offering a restaurant and free Wi-Fi, B&B HOTEL  Amiens Centre Cathédrale is located in the centre of Amiens.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a desk. The private bathrooms come with a shower.

At B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale you will find a 24-hour front desk, a bar and a snack bar. Other facilities offered include luggage storage. A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The hotel is 1.3 km from Zénith d'Amiens, 800 m from Berny's Museum and 1.1 km from Amiens Train Station. Beauvais Tillé Airport is 50 km away. The property offers parking at an extra cost.

name: ibis Styles Amiens Centre
description:
Featuring a bar, ibis Styles Amiens Centre is located in Amiens in the Picardy region, 300 metres from Amiens Train Station and 3.9 km from Zénith d'Amiens. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from The Floating gardens Park.

At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe. Guest rooms in ibis Styles Amiens Centre are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at the accommodation.

Ibis Styles Amiens Centre offers a sun terrace.

With staff speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, around the clock guidance is available at the reception.

Berny's Museum is 400 metres from the hotel, while Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is 400 metres away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 66 km from the property.

name: Appt au pied de la cathédrale avec parking gratuit
description:
Located in Amiens in the Picardy region, with Amiens Train Station and The Floating gardens Park nearby, Appt au pied de la cathédrale avec parking gratuit provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 200 metres from Berny's Museum, 200 metres from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens and 5 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.7 km from Zénith d'Amiens.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Amiens Golf Club is 8 km from the apartment, while French-Australian Museum is 24 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 68 km from the property.

name: Holiday Inn Express Amiens by IHG
description:
Holiday Inn Express offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi. It is located in the centre of Amiens just 50 metres from the Train Station and a 10-minute walk from the Cathedral.

Serviced by a lift, all of the rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen HD TV with satellite channels. There is also a safety deposit box and an espresso machine.

A free buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Holiday Inn Express Amiens. Many restaurants can be found nearby.

This non-smoking hotel also has a bar, a fitness room and laundry and ironing services. Underground, public parking is available nearby for cars up to 1.80 metres high.

name: Domaine de Bayeux
description:
Located in the centre of Bayeux, the Domaine de Bayeux is set in an 18th century house featuring a tree-lined park. There are guest rooms in the main building and a further 11 air-conditioned designer bedrooms available in the extension of the orchard, each with private terrace or balcony.

Featuring a unique decor, the rooms will provide you with an LCD TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A local breakfast is prepared daily at this property, and is served in the bright dining room featuring a chandelier.

With free parking, this hotel is 300 metres from Museum of Bayeux Tapestry, 600 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 900 metres from Notre Dame de Bayeux Cathedral. The property is just a 5-minute walk from Bayeux Train Station.

name: Chambre meublée
description:
Chambre meublée, a property with a garden, is situated in Amiens, 3.1 km from Zénith d'Amiens, 1.2 km from The Floating gardens Park, as well as 600 metres from Berny's Museum. The property is located 700 metres from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens, 3.8 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne and 8.6 km from Amiens Golf Club. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is 500 metres away.

The spacious apartment has 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

French-Australian Museum is 23 km from the apartment, while Somme Trench Museum is 29 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 67 km away.

name: ibis budget Amiens Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Amiens Centre Gare is set in Amiens city centre, a 5-minute walk from Amiens Train Station and a 15-minute walk from Notre-Dame of Amiens Cathedral. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A buffet breakfast can en enjoyed every morning.

The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 50 km from the hotel.

name: Aquabella Hôtel & Spa
description:
Surrounded by a beautiful garden, Aquabella offers Provencal-style rooms and guests have free access to the spa. It is located in central Aix-en-Provence, a short walk from the old town.

The guest rooms at the Aquabella are all air-conditioned and equipped with free Wi-Fi access and mini-bars. Bathrobes are also provided.

Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine in the hotel restaurant, L’Orangerie. During the summertime La Terrasse de la Tour is the hotel’s outdoor grill, serving grilled dishes and salads by the outdoor swimming pool.

Guests can relax at the Aquabella’s Sensoriel Spa. Guests have access to the sauna, hammam, and hot bath. There is also a Kneipp shower and ice fountain.

Guests will find public parking just 50 metres away from the property, available at an extra cost.

name: Comfort Aparthotel Marseille Prado
description:
Located in Marseille, the eco-friendly Comfort Suites Aparthotel Marseille Prado Plage Plage is just 100 metres from the beach, 5km from the Vieux Port and 2 km from the Velodrome Stadium. It offers air-conditioned accommodation and an outdoor swimming pool.

Each studio or  Comfort Suites Aparthotel Marseille Prado Plage has a kitchen or kitchenette equipped with a microwave, fridge, stovetop and dishwasher. Apartments also have satellite TV and a furnished balcony.

A continental breakfast is served daily with a view of the swimming pool and terrace. A bowl and toast bar as well as sweet and savoury dishes are offered. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

 Comfort Suites Aparthotel Marseille Prado Plage is serviced by a bus to the city centre and just 1,5 km from the Rond-Point du Prado Metro station. The Borely Park is 600 metres away. Marseille Airport is 30 km from the aparthotel. Private parking is available for an extra charge, according to availability.

name: Mercure Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description:
Mercure Marseille Centre Vieux Port is located next to the WTC convention centre and the Jardin des Vestiges, and is just a 5-minute walk from the Vieux-Port. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access.

Rooms at the Mercure Marseille Centre are equipped with satellite and cable TV and a radio. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A full breakfast buffet is served every morning. Guests are invited to enjoy a drink and a light snack at the Marseille Centre’s bar, 1.13.

The Marseille Centre Mercure Hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Saint Charles TGV Train Station. It is easily accessible by the A7 motorway and a 25-minute drive from Marseille Provence Airport. Private parking is available at an extra cost.

name: AUGUSTINS FOUNTAIN Studio Cosy AIX Centre Historique à 3 minutes de COURS MIRABEAU -WIFI-SMART TV-RUE CALME
description:
AUGUSTINS FOUNTAIN Studio Cosy AIX Centre Historique à 3 minutes de COURS MIRABEAU -WIFI-SMART TV-RUE CALME is set in the Aix-en-Provence Historic Centre district of Aix-en-Provence, 31 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, 31 km from Vieux Port Metro station and 31 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. It is located 30 km from Joliette Metro Station and provides free WiFi plus full-day security. The property is 30 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Castellane Metro Station is 32 km from the apartment, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 32 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 26 km from the property.

name: Maison De La Bourgade
description:
Featuring a garden and views of garden, Maison De La Bourgade is a bed and breakfast situated in a historic building in Uzès, 27 km from Parc Expo Nîmes. With quiet street views, this accommodation features a balcony. The bed and breakfast provides pool views, a seasonal outdoor pool, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. Some units also have a well-fitted kitchen equipped with an oven, a toaster, and a fridge. At the bed and breakfast, all units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy table tennis on-site, or go cycling or walking tours in the surroundings.

Avignon Central Station is 38 km from Maison De La Bourgade, while Papal Palace is 38 km from the property. Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 34 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Le Pietro
description:
Le Pietro, a property with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden, is set in Uzès, 38 km from Avignon Central Station, 39 km from Papal Palace, as well as 40 km from Avignon TGV Train Station. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 27 km from Parc Expo Nîmes.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Parc des Expositions Avignon is 48 km from the apartment, while Pont du Gard is 14 km away. Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 35 km from the property.

name: Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port offers air-conditioned accommodation in Marseille, only 550 metres from the port. Marseille Saint-Charles train station is a 12-minute walk away from the property.

All apartments and studios are accessible via a lift and feature a flat-screen TV. Each unit has a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, fridge, stovetop, coffee machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within a 2-minute walk of the property.

The nearest metro station is only 44 metres from the property. Velodrome Stadium is 6.4 km from Staycity Aparthotels Marseille, while La Canebiere is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the property.

Some units come with a balcony.

name: Appartements 3 étoiles terrasse ou patio intra-muros
description:
Appartements 3 étoiles terrasse ou patio intra-muros in Aigues-Mortes provides adults-only accommodation with a casino and barbecue facilities. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. In addition to free WiFi, the property also provides a sun terrace as well as a solarium.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, slippers and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Aigues-Mortes, like bike tours. If you would like to discover the area, fishing, hiking and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and Appartements 3 étoiles terrasse ou patio intra-muros can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Parc des Expositions de Montpellier is 23 km from the accommodation, while Montpellier Arena is 24 km away. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 29 km from the property.

name: 11 le tadorne
description:
Set in Aigues-Mortes, 24 km from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier and 25 km from Montpellier Arena, 11 le tadorne offers a terrace and air conditioning. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 29 km from Zenith Sud Montpellier.

This apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A water park is also available for guests at the apartment.

Odysseum Shopping Centre is 29 km from 11 le tadorne, while Montpellier Town Hall is 32 km from the property. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 30 km away.

name: La Grange - 10 couchages
description:
Located in Carla-de-Roquefort, 20 km from Foix Castle and 20 km from Fountain Fontestorbes, La Grange - 10 couchages offers a garden and air conditioning. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 20 km from Montsegur Castle.

The spacious holiday home is equipped with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the city views. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Museum of Montségur is 21 km from the holiday home, while Underground River of Labouiche is 25 km away. Carcassonne Airport is 64 km from the property.

name: Hôtel la Bona Casa
description:
Hotel Bona Casa is located in the historic centre of Collioure, just 300 metres from the beach and from the Château Royal. The hotel proposes free Wi-Fi internet access and a shaded terrace.

The guest rooms at Hotel Bona Casa have a view of the street or the patio, and some have a private terrace. They each include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. The hotel is completely non-smoking.

A continental breakfast is served every morning and shops and restaurants are found within 200 metres from the property. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s tea room from March to October.

Port-Vendres is 3 km from the hotel and Argelès-sur-Mer is 6 km away. The property is a 30-minute drive from central Perpignan and from the Spanish border, which can also be reached by train.

name: Nemea Appart Hotel Concorde Toulouse Gare Matabiau
description:
Located in the centre of Toulouse, next to the Canal du Midi and in front of Toulouse Matabiau Train Station, Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde offers a fitness centre located on the 9th floor, including a sauna.

At Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde each accommodation is air-conditioned and includes a TV as well as free WiFi access. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

The apartments and studios have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance.

In-room beauty treatments are available upon request and for an extra charge.

Néméa Appart‘Hôtel Résidence Concorde's location makes it an excellent base to discover Toulouse with Toulouse centre and Place du Capitole a 15-minute walk away. Toulouse Blagnac Airport is a 15-minute drive from the property.

name: Dali Hôtel Montauban
description:
Dali Hôtel Montauban in Montauban provides accommodation with a terrace, a restaurant and a spa and wellness centre. Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Free private parking is available and the hotel also provides bike hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Each room comes with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include city views.

The hotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Guests at Dali Hôtel Montauban will be able to enjoy activities in and around Montauban, like hiking and cycling.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area.

Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 52 km away.

name: Brit Hotel Confort Montauban
description:
Brit Hotel Confort Montauban is set in Montauban, within 49 km of Zénith de Toulouse and 48 km of Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden. With a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 47 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely.

At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk. All units in Brit Hotel Confort Montauban are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Compans Caffarelli Metro Station is 48 km from Brit Hotel Confort Montauban, while Toulouse-Matabiau Station is 48 km away. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 48 km from the property.

name: L'appartement de l'église
description:
Set in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, with Amphora Beach and Arenas Beach nearby, L'appartement de l'église offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The air-conditioned accommodation is 700 metres from Crin Blanc Beach. The property is non-smoking and is located 39 km from Arles Amphitheatre.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 41 km away.

name: Studio Arché - Welkeys
description:
Studio Arché - Welkeys features a balcony and is located in Biarritz, within just 200 metres of Plage Pêcheurs and 700 metres of Cote des Basques Beach. It is set 2.4 km from Plage Marbella and provides a lift. The property is 200 metres from Grande Plage, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The apartment comes with a TV. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster and there is a private bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 19 km away. Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: La Belle Amarre-Bed and Breakfast-Maison d'Hôtes
description:
La Belle Amarre-Bed and Breakfast-Maison d'Hôtes provides accommodation located 400 metres from the centre of La Rochelle and offers a terrace and a bar. With city views, this accommodation features a patio. The guest house features family rooms.

The units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, bathrobes and a desk. Guests can have wine or champagne, fruits and chocolates or cookies delivered to their room. All units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available. There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Concurrence Beach, La Rochelle Train Station and L'Espace Encan. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 4 km away.

name: Les studios du chemins vert
description:
Located in La Rochelle, 2.5 km from Concurrence Beach, Les studios du chemins vert provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. It is situated 1.8 km from La Rochelle Train Station and features a concierge service. The aparthotel features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a terrace offering garden views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available.

Guests can keep up their exercise routines during yoga and fitness classes. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel, while cycling and walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near Les studios du chemins vert include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km away.

name: Le Masq Hôtel Best Western Premier
description:
The Best Western Masqhotel is a design hotel located a 5-minute walk from La Rochelle’s Vieux Port. It offers contemporary rooms, a lounge bar and free WiFi.

Rooms and suites at the Masqhotel are air-conditioned and feature original artwork. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and tea and coffee making facilities.

A buffet breakfast with hot and cold dishes is served each morning at the hotel. Guests are also invited to relax in the hotel’s lounge bar, which offers a large selection of drinks and free newspapers.

The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day. A laundry service and private parking are available at an additional cost.

An Eco-Label awarded hotel, Best Western Masqhotel is located 150 metres from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from La Rochelle Airport.

name: Hôtel François 1er
description:
Located in the heart of historic La Rochelle, this hotel is set in a 16th century building just a 5 minute walk from the Old Port and local market. Hôtel François 1er offers free unlimited WiFi and a 24-hour reception.

All room at Hôtel François 1er are spacious, and feature a design and cosy décor inspired by the themes of rock, movie, painting, graffiti or photography. They are fitted with a TV, and come with a private bathroom.

Various facilities are available at the property such as the room service, a bar lounge, and a chill out area. Upon prior request and at an extra cost, guests can park their car in the property's secure parking located in the city centre.

The hotel is within walking distance from several shops, restaurants and lively bars. Hôtel François 1er is also close to attractions such as the Aquarium, the Natural History Museum, the city's parks and beaches.

La Rochelle Train Station is conveniently located 1.9 km from Hôtel François 1er.

name: Le Fétilly avec parking privatif et climatisation
description:
Located in La Rochelle in the Poitou-Charentes region, Le Fétilly avec parking privatif et climatisation features a patio and quiet street views. The apartment, set in a building dating from 1980, is 3.9 km from La Rochelle Train Station and 4.9 km from L'Espace Encan. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.7 km from Concurrence Beach.

The apartment with a balcony and inner courtyard views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Featuring free private parking, this 3-star apartment also features free WiFi. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 5.3 km from the apartment, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 2.6 km from the property. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 4 km away.

name: Le Chalutier - Terrasse - Bassin des Chalutiers
description:
Le Chalutier - Terrasse - Bassin des Chalutiers is a beachfront property located in La Rochelle, 1.9 km from Plage Du Roux and 2.4 km from Minimes. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1.6 km from Concurrence Beach.

The apartment with a terrace and sea views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, La Rochelle Train Station and Parc Expo de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 9 km away.

name: Hôtel La Monnaie Arty & Spa
description:
Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour. Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre. The parking on site is limited and available upon request.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Wellness centre is only available upon request.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products. Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.

name: Appartement du Port - Welkeys
description:
Offering city views, Appartement du Port - Welkeys is an accommodation set in La Rochelle, 2.6 km from Plage Du Roux and 600 metres from La Rochelle Train Station.
