Featuring a lift, this property also provides guests with a water park. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 1.5 km from Concurrence Beach.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 7 km away.

name: Résidence Pierre & Vacances Centre
description:
Located in La Rochelle, this Pierre & Vacances residence is a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and 300 metres from the TGV Train Station. It has a heated indoor swimming pool and a terrace.

The Pierre & Vacances Centre offers studio apartments with a lounge area and a flat-screen TV. Each studio has a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, microwave and an electric coffee-maker.

The residence is serviced by a lift and facilities are available for guests with reduced mobility.

The Residence Pierre & Vacances Centre is an ideal base for discovering La Rochelle and guests can enjoy a boat trip to the Île de Ré and Fort Boyard. The beach is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Subject to availability, paid parking is available upon reservation and for an extra charge.

Please note that the swimming pool is open from 09:00 until 19:00 daily.

name: La Rochelle en famille - 5 personnes
description:
Well set in a central area of La Rochelle, La Rochelle en famille - 5 personnes offers garden views and a private beach area. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The accommodation provides a lift and private check-in and check-out for guests.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and lake views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Rochelle, like walking tours. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and La Rochelle en famille - 5 personnes can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Concurrence Beach, La Rochelle Train Station and L'Espace Encan. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 7 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Appartement Petit coin de paradis - Welkeys
description:
Offering city views, Appartement Petit coin de paradis - Welkeys is an accommodation situated in La Rochelle, 1.8 km from La Rochelle Train Station and 2 km from L'Espace Encan. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 1.4 km from Concurrence Beach.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port
description:
Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle on the harbour. It offers free WiFi throughout the entire hotel.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is close to many restaurants and is a short walk to the historic district, the beach and the attractions of La Rochelle. From here it is easy to access the island of Ré and Oléron.

It offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, en suite facilities and flat-screen TV with Canal+ and Eurosport.

Breakfast is be served from 07:00 to 11:00 on Saturday and Sunday and from 06:00 until 10:30 from Monday to Friday.

Please note that when booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply .

name: Hôtel Les Brises
description:
Situated on the sea front, just 2 kilometres from La Rochelle’s old port, Hotel Les Brises has a panoramic view of the sea and nearby islands. It offers free Wi-Fi .
The guest rooms at the Brises are equipped with satellite TV. Private bathrooms have luxury toiletries.

Guests can relax on the large sea-side terrace with panoramic views, or enjoy a drink in the bar. Additional facilities include a lift.

Les Brises is 2 km from the centre of La Rochelle, and is next to the Franck Delmas Park.

name: Appart'City Classic La Rochelle Centre
description:
This Appart'city is a 10-minute walk from La Rochelle Train Station and 15 minutes from the Old Port and the Old Town. It offers contemporary accommodation with a seating area and an LCD TV.

The apartments and studios at Appart'City Classic La Rochelle Centre have free WiFi internet access. Some offer a private balcony and all feature a kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge.

A buffet breakfast is served at the residence and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Guests can also buy drinks and snacks at the reception.

Outdoor and underground parking is possible at Appart’city and La Rochelle Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Guests may also choose to visit Ile de Ré, which is just 15 km away.

name: Appartement T2 lumineux et cosy au calme proche du centre avec TV et Wifi
description:
Offering quiet street views, Appartement T2 lumineux et cosy au calme proche du centre avec TV et Wifi is an accommodation located in La Rochelle, 1.9 km from Plage Du Roux and 2.5 km from Concurrence Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a minimarket, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The area is popular for walking tours and bike tours, and car hire is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Appartement T2 lumineux et cosy au calme proche du centre avec TV et Wifi include L'Espace Encan, La Rochelle Train Station and Parc Expo de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 8 km away.

name: Porte Royale - Charme de l'ancien rénové - Hyper Centre - Tv 4K - Fibre
description:
Set in the centre of La Rochelle, just 1.7 km from Concurrence Beach and 1.2 km from La Rochelle Train Station, Porte Royale - Charme de l'ancien rénové - Hyper Centre - Tv 4K - Fibre offers accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is around 4.2 km from The Minimes Marina, 13 km from Mytiliculture Museum and 400 metres from Bunker La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from L'Espace Encan.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. At the apartment, there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

Popular points of interest near Porte Royale - Charme de l'ancien rénové - Hyper Centre - Tv 4K - Fibre include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Musee du Nouveau Monde. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Hôtel de l'Océan
description:
Built in 1646, Hotel de L’Ocean is located on the Old Port, in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers soundproofed rooms equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

Some rooms offer a view of the Bay of Biscay and the harbour.

A continental breakfast can be served on the outside terrace, in the breakfast room or in the room.

Hotel de L’Ocean is a 2-minute walk from La Rochelle’s main tourist attractions and La Rochelle Aquarium is a 15-minute walk away. Boat shuttles to Ile d'Aix, Fort Boyard, and Ré and Oléron islands are available in front of the hotel.

name: CENTRAL Hôtel La Rochelle Centre
description:
Conveniently set in the La Rochelle City Centre district of La Rochelle, CENTRAL Hôtel La Rochelle Centre is located 1.4 km from La Rochelle Train Station, 1.5 km from L'Espace Encan and 1.6 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Concurrence Beach.

All rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. All units include a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available at CENTRAL Hôtel La Rochelle Centre.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, Charruyer Park and La Rochelle Cathedral. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 4 km away.

name: Appartements Les Rochelais
description:
Set in the La Rochelle City Centre district in La Rochelle, Appartements Les Rochelais offers 3-star rooms with free WiFi. The property features inner courtyard views and is 2.9 km from Plage Du Roux and 1.1 km from La Rochelle Train Station. The property is 700 metres from Concurrence Beach, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km away.

name: Les 3 Tours et parking
description:
Les 3 Tours et parking is set in the La Rochelle City Centre district of La Rochelle, 2.3 km from Plage Du Roux, 2.7 km from Minimes and 700 metres from La Rochelle Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.3 km from Concurrence Beach, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with sea views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Tour de Nesle La Rochelle Vieux Port 3 etoiles
description:
The charming Hotel de la Tour de Nesle is ideally placed at the heart of the old town, in front of the 2 towers at the entrance to the port.

The hotel offers comfortable rooms with simple, functional decor and free Wi-Fi internet access. Some rooms offer a view of the famous medieval towers.

Start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room.

The picturesque area surrounding the Tour de Nesle is full of restaurants, shops and cafes.

name: Appartement Saint Claude - Centre Port
description:
Located 1.5 km from Concurrence Beach and 2.7 km from Plage Du Roux in the centre of La Rochelle, Appartement Saint Claude - Centre Port provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property features city views and is 1 km from L'Espace Encan and less than 1 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from La Rochelle Train Station.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, Saint-Sauveur Church and Bunker La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 7 km away.

name: Le Saint-Nicolas
description:
Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.

name: Hôtel Le Yachtman, The Originals Collection
description:
Located in La Rochelle, Le Yachtman features a heated swimming pool and a terrace with views of the harbour. It offers en suite accommodation and is just 500 metres from the train station.

The guest rooms at Le Yachtman come with a flat-screen TV and some have a lounge area. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi access.

You can enjoy a drink in the bar while reading the newspapers provided at Le Yachtman. A buffet breakfast with fruit salad, honey and orange juice is served every morning in the dining room, which offers views of the Old Port.

Nearby sights include La Rochelle Aquarium, La Rochelle Towers and the medieval town centre. Paid private parking is possible at a nearby location.

name: Hôtel Le Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle
description:
Located in La Rochelle, 2.5 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle,  The hotel and catering school property is around 5 km from La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, 1.5 km from Musée Maritime de La Rochelle and 1.8 km from La Rochelle Aquarium. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from L'Espace Encan.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Continental and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle. There are also 2 onsite restaurants with a daily menu, where guests can dine upon reservation.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include The Minimes Marina, Museum of Automata and La Rochelle University. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 11 km from Hôtel Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle.

name: Résidence Biarritz Ocean
description:
Résidence Biarritz Ocean is located in the heart of Biarritz, just 400 metres from the famous beach, la Grande Plage and 240 metres from Biarritz’s casino. The residence offers self-catering rooms and apartments with balconies.

All rooms and apartments at Résidence Biarritz Ocean are equipped with satellite TV, a phone and an en suite bathroom with a bathtub. Some bathrooms are accessible to disabled guests. They all have large balconies and some have a view of the residence’s garden. Apartments have an equipped kitchenette with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher.

Marine Museum is a 10-minute walk from the residence. Guests at Résidence Biarritz Ocean benefit from discounts on green fees at 7 golf courses in the region. Biarritz Airport is 4 km away.

name: ALFRED HOTELS Port-Vieux
description:
Completely renovated in 2024, the Port-vieux hotel, formerly George VI, located in the center of Biarritz, 50 meters from the beach and a 2-minute walk from Les Halles, welcomes you in a new atmosphere by ALFRED HOTELS.

ALFRED HOTELS, embraces a bold and accessible vision of elegance.

Our promise is simple: to surprise with an experience worthy of the greatest establishments, at an affordable price.

Each ALFRED HOTELS is anchored in the hearts of cities, the welcome is made up of smiles that stand out, the rooms combine comfort and elegance, the night is a promise of well-being & breakfast is a gourmet ritual.
ALFRED HOTELS are imagined as a collection of inhabited, lively and sustainable places. We leave room only for the essentials to offer a unique and authentic experience.

We promote the heritage of the Basque Country, by forging strong ties with local partners, preserving and celebrating the unique history of the region and building a local team, which understands its nuances and particularities.

name: Résidence Victoria Surf
description:
Résidence Victoria Surf offers self-catering studios located in the centre of Biarritz, overlooking the main beach. The property features an outdoor swimming pool with a paddling pool for children.

Each studio has a TV and an equipped kitchenette with vitro-ceramic hobs and a fridge. Some studios have a balcony, and all have a bathroom fitted with a shower.

Ideally located for visiting Biarritz, Résidence Victoria Surf provides private, underground limited parking, upon prior request. You will find a choice of shops and restaurants within a 5-minute walk from the property.

name: Hôtel Saint James
description:
A 14-room hotel set in a early 20th-century house, Hôtel Saint James is located at the historic centre of Biarritz, just a 5-minute walk from the main beaches, including Côte des Basques and La Grande Plage. The harbour, the convention centre and the Barriere Casino are also located within walking distance.

The Saint James offers rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The rooms are located on 3 different floors and not serviced by a lift.

In the morning, from 8.00 to 11.00 a.m. a daily breakfast is served at the property's restaurant, Le Café du Commerce.

Hôtel saint James is a 5-minute drive from the train station and it is also close to the covered market, Halles.

The Saint James hotel is located in a festive district particularly animated late

name: Résidence Pierre & Vacances Premium Haguna
description:
Pierre & Vacances Premium Haguna is located in the city centre of Biarritz, just 300 metres from the beach. The self-catering residence offers spacious apartments. At an extra cost, guest can access a wellness centre with a sauna, hammam and solarium.

The studios and apartments at the Haguna residence are fully furnished and include a TV, a living area and a private bathroom. The kitchens include cooking facilities, dishwasher, fridge and microwave.

Guests can choose the Comfort Formula, which must be purchased on line before the arrival. It includes beds made for arrival, change of bathroom linen mid-stay, mid-stay cleaning.

Pierre & Vacances Premium Haguna is an ideal base for exploring the Basque coast. Bayonne is just a 10-minute drive from Pierre & Vacances Premium Haguna and San Sebastian is a 35-minute drive away. Books and board games are available for free.

Baked goods can be ordered at the reception the evening before and served as a buffet. A bakery menu is available in the apartment and at reception, this service is at an additional cost.

Green Key-awarded.

name: Hotel Marbella
description:
Located in Biarritz, Hotel Marbella is in the Old Harbour district just a 5-minute walk from three beaches. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Each guest room at Hotel Marbella is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms feature a balcony or a terrace. They all offer a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

This hotel's location makes it an excellent base to discover the Basque Coast. It is also within walking distance from the town centre, the spa and many sport and cultural facilities. Biarritz Train Station is located 4 km from the property and Biarritz Airport is 5 km away.

name: Hôtel Cosmopolitain
description:
Located 700 metres from the Rock of the Blessed Virgin and just 200 metres from the beach in central Biarritz, Hôtel Cosmopolitain is a  3-star hotel featuring elegantly decorated guest rooms and common areas.

Hôtel Cosmopolitain also offers free Wi-Fi access and air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom and satellite TV in each.

Lunch is available and guests can enjoy a cocktail or a glass of champagne in the hotel bar.

There are numerous bars and restaurants in the streets around Hôtel Cosmopolitain. The Sea and Chocolate Museum are 1 km away and the hotel is a 10-minute drive from Biarritz airport and SNCF Train Station.

name: BIARRITZ Victoria Surf
description:
Facing the seafront, BIARRITZ Victoria Surf is an apartment providing a 2-star accommodation in Biarritz. It features pool with a view, open-air bath and private parking. Featuring a lift, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a casino and a sun terrace. There is parking on-site and the property provides an electric vehicle charging station.

The apartment features a cable flat-screen TV. The kitchen comes with an oven, a microwave and a toaster and there is a private bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a snack bar, and packed lunches are also available.

Bike hire and car hire are available at the apartment and the area is popular for fishing and hiking. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near BIARRITZ Victoria Surf include Plage Miramar, Grande Plage and Plage Pêcheurs. Biarritz Airport is 3 km away.

name: Ama Hôtel
description:
Designed by the famous Basque architect Raymond Larrebat Tudor and built in the 18th-century, Ama Hôtel is a lovely residence in the heart of Biarritz.

It is ideally situated 200 metres from the beach and casino and close to the local thalassotherapy centre.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature free Wi-Fi access, a minibar and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer.

Public parking is available just 150 metres from the hotel.

name: Chambre d'Hôtes Arima
description:
Set in Biarritz, 1 km from Plage Miramar, Chambre d'Hôtes Arima offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a seasonal outdoor pool. With pool views, this accommodation offers a patio. The property is 1.1 km from Plage Pêcheurs, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The guest house is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the guest house. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast.

The guest house has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Grande Plage is 1.1 km from the guest house, while Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 3.6 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 3 km away.

name: Maison Cuevas
description:
Maison Cuevas in Biarritz provides adults-only accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a garden. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the guest house free of charge. The accommodation offers a concierge service and a housekeeping service for guests.

At the guest house, all units include a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the guest house have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms come with a terrace. At the guest house, the units come with bed linen and towels.

The breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

Plage Miramar is 1.5 km from Maison Cuevas, while Grande Plage is 1.6 km away. Biarritz Airport is 4 km from the property.

name: VUE EXCEPTIONNELLE SUR L’OCEAN STUDIO 2/4 pers
description:
Offering free WiFi and sea views, VUE EXCEPTIONNELLE SUR L’OCEAN STUDIO 2/4 pers is an accommodation located in a central area of Biarritz, just 200 metres from Cote des Basques Beach and 300 metres from Plage Port Vieux. This beachfront property offers access to bowling in the bowling alley. The property is non-smoking and is situated 600 metres from Plage Pêcheurs.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Hiking, walking tours and bike tours are possible within the area, and a casino is available on-site.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 18 km away. Biarritz Airport is 3 km from the property.

name: Hôtel PALMITO
description:
Set in the Old Town in Biarritz, this non-smoking hotel is located just 100 metres from the beach. Free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV are provided in the guest rooms.

A glimpse of the sea or the courtyard is offered in each room, and some rooms feature a balcony. All of the rooms have a private bathroom, and some have a walk-in shower.

You can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast while reading the newspapers provided.

Biarritz Barrière Casino is just 700 metres from the hotel and Biarritz Train Station is 4 km away. Restaurants, bars and nightclubs are located 50 metres away.

name: Roc Seven Biarritz
description:
The Roc Seven Biarritz restaurant and its nine exclusive rooms overlook the Port-Vieux beach and its iconic arcades. It embodies the art de vivre of the southwest, with its warm atmosphere, friendly vibe, and breathtaking rooftop and panoramic terrace. Guests can enjoy stunning views of Atlantic sunsets, spacious rooms with elegant design, a vibrant bar, a wine cellar, and an open kitchen.
Recently fully renovated, Roc Seven Biarritz now features enlarged and redesigned rooms, a reimagined restaurant, and transformed outdoor spaces. The terrace and rooftop, designed as lively gathering spots, feature an outdoor bar and DJ sets, promising to become the beating heart of Roc Seven.
In terms of design, terracotta floors, ceilings made of woven plant canes, and warm tones such as terracotta, Basque green, and ecru create a true summer signature. Every detail, from backlit niches to custom headboards made of natural fibers, reflects the new identity of Roc Seven Biarritz, blending elegance with a welcoming, convivial spirit.

name: Les Echappées Belles - Studio du phare
description:
Les Echappées Belles - Studio du phare is a beachfront property situated in Biarritz, 400 metres from VVF Beach and 400 metres from Plage Miramar. The property has sea views and is 700 metres from Grande Plage and 2 km from Cote des Basques Beach. The accommodation features a lift and full-day security for guests.

The apartment is equipped with a flat-screen TV. The kitchen features a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster, as well as coffee machine and kettle. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Guests are welcome to eat in the on-site family-friendly restaurant, which is open for dinner, lunch, cocktails and high tea.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Biarritz, like hiking.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 4.3 km from Les Echappées Belles - Studio du phare, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 19 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 5 km away.

name: Hotel Edouard VII
description:
Just 5 minutes walking distance from the Biarritz beaches, sits Hotel Edouard VII, a 19th-century residence that combines the charm of yesterday and the comfort of today.

This unique residence has a rich history based on its past residents. It was once the home of the Mayor of Biarritz. It was also the place Napoleon III used to receive medical care on his visits to the region.

Guestrooms are spacious and feature a refined and elegant décor. All are air-conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with private bathrooms, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi internet access.

The area surrounding Hotel Edouard VII has much to offer. In addition to the beautiful coast and its beaches, you will find restaurants, shops, museums and casinos. San Sebastien is only a 45-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel de La Plage
description:
Situated in Biarritz and facing the ocean, Hôtel de La Plage offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access just 50 metres from the Plage du Vieux Port. The train station is located a 10-minute drive away.

The rooms at Hôtel de La Plage have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some rooms have a view of the sea. Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. All type of restaurants can be found within 150 metres.

The hotel is a 5-minuted rive from the centre of Biarritz and 15 km from Saint-Jean de Luz. Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is situated a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz
description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Biarritz, Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Plage Miramar.

The units at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. The rooms include a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some boast city views. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz include Grande Plage, Plage Pêcheurs and Cote des Basques Beach. Biarritz Airport is 4 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Au Bon Coin
description:
Set 400 metres from the sea front and the beach La Grande Plage in Biarritz, Au Bon Coin offers a bar, lift, terrace and free WiFi throughout.

The soundproofed rooms and the suite at Au Bon Coin feature a flat-screen TV , and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a walk-in shower. Rooms suitable for guests with reduced mobility are also available.

The buffet breakfast is available daily and includes tea, coffee, hot chocolate, fruit, bread, French pastries, cheese, ham, fruit juices, yogurts and eggs.

Au Bon Coin is 300 metres from the city centre and Biarritz Airport is 3 km away. As an environment friendly property, Au Bon Coin received the The Tourisme Trophee Bearn Pays Basque 2023 and also the Tourisme Handicape label.

name: Le Gamaritz
description:
Le Gamaritz is located in Biarritz city centre, just a 2-minute walk from the Port Vieux beach. It offers design, air-conditioned accommodations with a walk-in shower, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

Guests of Hotel Le Gamaritz can enjoy breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace, at an extra cost. Some restaurants and tapas bars can be found in the area.

The Gamaritz is 6 km from the A63 motorway. It is 700 metres from the Biarritz Barriere Casino and a 10-minute drive from Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport and Biarritz Train Station.

name: Coliving Biarritz
description:
Boasting a shared lounge, a terrace as well as water sports facilities, Coliving Biarritz is set in the centre of Biarritz, 600 metres from Cote des Basques Beach. The property is around 3.5 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, 18 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 18 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. Some units at the property feature a patio with a sea view.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Coliving Biarritz also have free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a city view. All guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Popular points of interest near Coliving Biarritz include Grande Plage, Plage Pêcheurs and Plage Marbella. Biarritz Airport is 3 km from the property.

name: Résidence Vacances Bleues Le Grand Large
description:
Offering panoramic views of Biarritz Cote des Basques Beach and a heated outdoor swimming pool, Le Grand Large is an aparthotel situated in the heart of Biarritz, just 200 metres from the Old Harbour with various stores, local markets and tapas bars nearby.

The spacious studios at the Le Grand Large feature a loggia with blades viewing the Ocean or the Lighthouse. They all are equipped with a modern private bathroom and a complete kitchenette with ceramic hob.

A continental buffet breakfast is available.

This aparthotel is less than a 5-minute walk from Cote des Basques Beach. Within 3 km, guests can enjoy Biarritz Golf and Bidart Golf. Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is 4 km away.

name: Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre
description:
Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre is located in Biarritz, 300 metres from the beach and 5 minutes from the convention centres Bellevue, Casino and Gare du Midi as well as 100 metres from Biarritz central market. It offers free WiFi and Canal + channel.

The charming Maison du Lierre hotel provides numerous services. These include breakfast which can be enjoyed on the terrace in summertime. Upon reservation and for an additional fee, guests also have access to the on-site sauna, massage services and facial and ritual treatments.

Each room has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. The rooms overlook an interior courtyard. Some have a balcony or terrace.

Guests have access to a private living room with a computer corner.

name: Appartement T2 Bayonne st esprit avec parking
description:
Located in Bayonne, 14 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 24 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, Appartement T2 Bayonne st esprit avec parking offers air conditioning. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 25 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Hendaye Train Station is 38 km from the apartment, while FICOBA is 38 km away. Biarritz Airport is 10 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Barnea
description:
Hotel Hôtel Barnea is located in the centre of Biarritz, just a 3-minute walk from the beach, shops and restaurants.

Each soundproofed room has a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A continental breakfast is served daily.

Biarritz Golf Course is 2 km away and the Centre de Congrès is just a 3-minute walk from Hôtel Barnea.

name: Hotel Loreak
description:
Hotel Loreak is located 2 km from Bayonne city centre and offers en-suite accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access and a flat-screen TV.

Renovated in May 2020, rooms at the Hotel Loreak are also air-conditioned and come with a work desk. There is a hairdryer in the private bathroom and all rooms are serviced by a lift.

The restaurant offers regional cuisine with a buffet service, and set menus are also available. Guest can also relax with a drink in the lounge.

Free on-site parking is available at the Hotel Loreak and the beaches of Biarritz and Anglet are just 8 km away. The hotel is serviced by the A63 motorway.

name: Hôtel des Arceaux
description:
Set in a pedestrianised area of Bayonne’s historical centre, this charming hotel is housed in a 17th-century building. All the rooms are uniquely decorated and include free WiFi internet access.

Some rooms feature a private bathroom while other have access to a shared bathroom and toilet.

You can reach the attractions of Bayonne on foot thanks to the central location of the Hôtel des Arceaux.

The hotel is ideal for exploring the Basque country. Explore the mountains, beaches and countryside in the area surrounding the Hôtel des Arceaux.

name: Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre
description:
Set in Bayonne, just 700 metres from the city centre and Ste Marie Cathedral, Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site at an extra cost and subject to availability.

All the rooms have a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in the private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre also has a Club Area set on the top floor with panoramic views of the city, Adour River and Rhune Mountain.

Bayonne Arenes Bullring is 600 metres away and Ansot Park just 1.6 km away. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre L’Okko is located 5 km from the Ocean beaches. The nearest airport is Biarritz - Anglet - Bayonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Baionakoa Résidence
description:
Offering city views, Baionakoa Résidence is an accommodation set in Bayonne, 12 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 22 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like fishing and walking tours.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 22 km from Baionakoa Résidence, while Hendaye Train Station is 36 km away. Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: Vitrail YourHostHelper
description:
Vitrail YourHostHelper is located in Bayonne, 22 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 22 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church, as well as 35 km from Hendaye Train Station. Located around 35 km from FICOBA, the apartment is also 47 km away from Pasaiako portua. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 12 km away.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Biarritz Airport is 4 km away.

name: jeu de paume
description:
Jeu de paume is located in Bayonne, 21 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 22 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church, and 35 km from Hendaye Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 11 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. At the apartment, there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

FICOBA is 35 km from jeu de paume, while Pasaiako portua is 47 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 4 km away.

name: La Chambre d'Hote de Mano - Centre-ville de Bayonne
description:
Offering city views, La Chambre d'Hote de Mano - Centre-ville de Bayonne is an accommodation located in Bayonne, 26 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church and 39 km from Hendaye Train Station. It is situated 25 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 15 km away.

Towels and bed linen are available in the guest house. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like cycling.

FICOBA is 39 km from La Chambre d'Hote de Mano - Centre-ville de Bayonne. Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: Hostel 20 Bayonne
description:
Located 15 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, Hostel 20 Bayonne offers 1-star accommodation in Bayonne and features a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and luggage storage space.

The hostel offers a vegan or gluten-free breakfast.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 25 km from Hostel 20 Bayonne, while Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 26 km away. Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: Temporesidence Cathedrale
description:
Located in Bayonne, Temporesidence Cathedrale is just 2.5 km from the train station and 6 km from Biarritz. It offers spacious apartments and studios with a fully equipped kitchenette.

All of the soundproof apartments and studios feature an LCD cable TV and a separate seating area. Each has a microwave, fridge and hotplates to prepare meals which can then be eaten in the dining area. The Wifi system of the entire residence was completely updated in June 2022 with access to high-speed optical fiber.

All of the rooms at Temporesidence Cathedrale are serviced by a lift and the residence also has laundry facilities and luggage storage. Public parking is available at a nearby location.

Local activities include hiking and the town offers many attractions such as Bayonne castle, the Basque Museum and Saint André’s Church.

name: Libertitu
description:
Situated within 12 km of Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 22 km of Saint Jean de Luz Train Station in Bayonne, Libertitu features accommodation with seating area. This 3-star bed and breakfast offers a lift, a housekeeping service and free WiFi. FICOBA is 36 km away and Pasaiako portua is 47 km from the bed and breakfast.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, each unit has bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a grocery delivery service is also available.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 22 km from the bed and breakfast, while Hendaye Train Station is 36 km away. Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Appartement T3 Centre Ville Bayonne
description:
Appartement T3 Centre Ville Bayonne is set in Bayonne, 25 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 26 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church, and 39 km from Hendaye Train Station. The apartment is 39 km from FICOBA. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 15 km away.

The apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: T2 BASQUE BAYONNE
description:
Offering inner courtyard views, T2 BASQUE BAYONNE is an accommodation situated in Bayonne, 26 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 26 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. The apartment, set in a building dating from 1960, is 39 km from Hendaye Train Station and 40 km from FICOBA. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 16 km away.

This apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a washing machine. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Biarritz Airport is 7 km from the property.

name: Hôtel des Basses Pyrénées - Bayonne
description:
Set in Bayonne, within 200 metres of Saint Marie Cathedral and an 11-minute walk of Ansot Park, Hôtel des Basses Pyrénées - Bayonne offers free WiFi. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace. Bayonne Town Hall is 600 metres from the hotel and Basque Coast Hospital Centre is a 9-minute walk away.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the property.

With staff speaking English, Spanish and French, information is available at the reception.

Petite Chambre d'Amour beach in Biarritz is 8 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz - Anglet - Bayonne Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis budget Bayonne
description:
Located 2 km from Bayonne historic centre and train station, and 8 km from the beaches, ibis budget Bayonne has a 24-hour front desk, free Wi-Fi and free parking.

The air-conditioned rooms all have a private shower room. Pets are welcomed at the property yet an additional fee of 10 EUR per animal per night will apply.

There is a Courtepaille Restaurant on site offering traditional food and a grill on the terrace. A continental breakfast can be served in the breakfast room or on the terrace and includes pastries, fruit juice, brioche, cake, yogurts, compote, cheese and hot drinks.

Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is 7 km from ibis budget Bayonne and the A63 highway is 500 metres away. The Basque Museum is 2 km away.

name: Temporesidence Chateauneuf
description:
Located in the Aquitaine region, this residence features modern accommodation with wired internet access and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The sandy beaches of Biarritz are just 8 km away.

The soundproofed accommodations feature a seating and dining area. The kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. All accommodations have a private bathroom.

The Temporesidence Chateauneuf is set in the lively historic centre and Bayonne Train Station is 1 km away. Saint André Church is 210 metres from the residence. Public parking is available nearby.

The entire residence’s Wi-Fi system was fully updated in June 2022 with access to broadband fibre optic.

name: ibis Bayonne Centre
description:
Located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Bayonne, this ibis hotel is set on the banks of the Adour River, just 600 metres from the train station. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms and a furnished terrace.

The rooms at ibis Bayonne have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Each room also features a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

At the ibis Bayonne, you can also relax with a drink from the bar and dine at the on-site restaurant.

Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and a lift. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout this property. Private parking is possible on site, with an additional cost, and Biarritz Parme Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

Please note that we accept pets except on the restaurant

name: Hôtel Le Bayonne
description:
Set in central Bayonne in the Aquitaine region, Hôtel Le Bayonne offers a seasonal, outdoor swimming pool. Guests are invited to use the hammam.

Free fibre-optic Internet access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels are provided in each of Hôtel Le Bayonne rooms. They are all air-conditioned and include work desks and telephones.

Traditional cuisine is proposed in the restaurant at Hôtel Le Bayonne, and drinks are served in the bar. Breakfast can be enjoyed daily in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms.

Bayonne Train Station is 3 km away and private parking is available with a supplement. The hotel is 7.6 km from Biarritz and 5.5 km from the Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport.

name: ibis Styles Bayonne
description:
Located on the banks of the Adour River with an exceptional view of the medieval town of Bayonne, ibis Styles Bayonne is within walking distance of the 12th-Century Cathedral.

All of the 45 rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned, equipped with en suite facilities and include central heating and flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi access and breakfast are included.

The 5 floors of the hotel are serviced by a lift. On the ground floor guests can enjoy light meals 24 hours a day.

The ibis Styles Bayonne is easily accessible from the A63 motorway. It is situated just 50 metres from Bayonne Train Station and just 200 metres from the historic city centre. It is 8 km from the airport and 35 km from the Spanish border. Guests can find public parking at an extra cost at the Train Station. Outdoor Parking spaces, which are free from 18:00 to 09:00, can be found close the property, on the river side. Direct access in front of the hotel by "Rue Neuve".

name: Appartement T2 cosy et calme
description:
Appartement T2 cosy et calme is set in Bayonne, 11 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, 23 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, and 24 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. The property is located 37 km from Hendaye Train Station, 37 km from FICOBA and 49 km from Pasaiako portua. There is a terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. This apartment also features a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Biarritz Airport is 7 km from the property.

name: Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR
description:
Set within 12 km of Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 22 km of Saint Jean de Luz Train Station in Bayonne, Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR offers accommodation with seating area. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

At the bed and breakfast, the units are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Guests at Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like hiking and walking tours.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church is 23 km from the accommodation, while Hendaye Train Station is 36 km away. Biarritz Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne
description:
Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Bayonne. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. There is a sauna, evening entertainment and room service.

At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. All guest rooms at Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 12 km from the accommodation, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 22 km from the property. Biarritz Airport is 5 km away.

name: Hotel Le Port Neuf
description:
Hotel Le Port Neuf is located in the historical centre, 100 metres from Bayonne Cathedral and 300 metres from the Basque Museum. It offers free Wi-Fi access and an onsite bar with a terrace.

The rooms at Hotel Le Port Neuf are decorated in a contemporary style and include a flat-screen TV. There is also an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served every morning from 8:00 to 10.00, and local gastronomic restaurants can be found 300 metres from the property. The property also boasts an on-sit wine bar.

The hotel is also ideally located a 10-minute walk from the train station.

name: Parc 709 Bayonne
description:
Offering quiet street views, Parc 709 Bayonne is an accommodation situated in Bayonne, 22 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 22 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 12 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with river views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Hendaye Train Station is 35 km from the apartment, while FICOBA is 36 km away. Biarritz Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: La croisée des chemins
description:
La croisée des chemins is set in Montauban. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is at guests' disposal throughout the property.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 51 km from the property.

name: Hotel Cote Basque
description:
This hotel sits in the heart Bayonne’s historical town, in front of the Saint Esprit bridge. It offers free Wi-Fi and en suite rooms.

Guest rooms at the Hotel Cote Basque are equipped with satellite TV, air conditioning and are accessible by lift. Hairdryers can be requested.

A full buffet breakfast is served every morning.

The hotel is 100 metres from Bayonne train station,  5 km from Biarritz and 30 km from San Sebastien. A public car park is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: "Le Cocon" 4 Pers - Neuf et Confortable - So Cozy
description:
Set in Montauban in the Midi-Pyrénées region, "Le Cocon" 4 Pers - Neuf et Confortable - So Cozy offers accommodation with free WiFi.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 52 km away.

name: En toute intimité dans le centre historique
description:
En toute intimité dans le centre historique is situated in Montauban. The property has quiet street views.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Montauban, like hiking.

Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 51 km from the property.

name: L’appartement de Manon
description:
L’appartement de Manon is located in Montauban. The property features inner courtyard views. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The spacious apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. This apartment also provides guests with a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The accommodation is non-smoking.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 50 km from the apartment.

name: Vanille Bourbon
description:
Situated within 50 km of Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely in Montauban, Vanille Bourbon offers accommodation with seating area. The property has city views. The bed and breakfast features rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

At the bed and breakfast, units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Montauban, like walking tours and bike tours. Outdoor play equipment is also available at Vanille Bourbon, while guests can also relax in the garden.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 50 km from the accommodation.

name: Kyriad Montauban Sud - Albasud
description:
Located near the A20 motorway, Kyriad Montauban Sud - Albasud is just 8 kilometres from Montauban's town centre and train station. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi access.

Rooms at Kyriad Montauban Sud - Albasud are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily at the Kyriad Montauban Hotel.  The hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant offers traditional cuisine for  dinner.

Additional facilities include a garden and terrace with a children’s playground.

Kyriad Montauban Sud - Albasud is 50 kilometres north of Toulouse and 66 km from Cahors. It is near the Pente d’eau de Montech and guests have access to free private parking.

name: Premiere Classe Montauban
description:
This Premiere Classe hotel is located a 10-minute drive from the centre of Montauban. It offers a 24-hour reception desk and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Premiere Classe Montauban are equipped with a flat-screen and private bathroom with  Kyriadt Restaurant is within walking distance of the hotel.

Premiere Classe Montauban is in the heart of the Albasud3 Zone and near Exit 66 of the A20 motorway. Guests have access to free private parking.

name: Chez Juliette, proche Place Nationale avec parking
description:
Chez Juliette, proche Place Nationale avec parking is set in Montauban. This apartment offers free private parking, a lift and free WiFi.

This apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 51 km away.

name: ibis budget Montauban Les Chaumes
description:
ibis budget Montauban Les Chaumes is 4 km from the centre of Montauban and 270 metres from the A20 motorway. It offers free Wi-Fi access and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels.

All rooms feature a desk, air conditioning and a wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a shower and free toiletries. Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at ibis budget Montauban Les Chaumes. There is a restaurant on site and a grocery store can be found 50 metres away.

This property is 2 km from Montauban Train Station and 10 km from Aiguillons Golf Course. Free private parking is available on site.

name: ibis Montauban
description:
Located at the exit of the A20 Motorway, a 5-minute drive from Montauban, this ibis hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a meeting room and a bar. Free private parking and free WiFi access are available.

Rooms have a simple decor and include an LCD TV, a telephone and a work desk. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower or a bathtub.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. French specialties are proposed at the restaurant, which is open only for dinner.

The Fobio Stadium is 1.5 km away while the Sapiac Stadium is 4 km from Hôtel ibis Montauban. Montauban-Ville-Bourbon Train Station is a 15-minute drive from the hotel and Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 35 minutes away by car.

name: Centre Louis Ormières
description:
Located in a former convent in Montauban next to the River Tarn, Centre Louis Ormières features a restaurant, a garden, function rooms and free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available onsite.

At the hotel each room is fitted with a private bathroom.

Guests at Centre Louis Ormières can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The centre of Montauban is less than a 10-minute drive away. Toulouse is 49 km from the accommodation, while Blagnac is 49 km away. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 51 km from Centre Louis Ormières.

name: Hôtel Mercure Montauban
description:
This Mercure is housed in an 18th-century building in the historic district of Montauban, just opposite the cathedral and near the business district.

The Hôtel Mercure Montauban has 44 rooms, 6 of which are non-smoking and 2 that have been adapted for people with disabilities. All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with clean, private bathrooms, Wi-Fi internet access and flat screen satellite TV.

Bourdelle, the hotel restaurant, features gourmet French cuisine. It offers a non-smoking area and children’s meals. The hotel bar, Brasserie Bourdelle, serves a variety of drinks and cocktails under a beautiful glass roof.

The hotel also has 5 meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 170 people.

name: Pause COCOONING en Centre historique
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Pause COCOONING en Centre historique is an accommodation located in Montauban.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 51 km from the apartment.

name: Villa de cammas
description:
Located in Montauban in the Midi-Pyrénées region, Villa de cammas features a garden. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. The guest house provides a saltwater pool and a shared kitchen.

The guest house is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the guest house. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Guests at the guest house can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. A coffee shop can be found on-site, and in the warmer months you can make use of the barbecue facilities.

The guest house has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 52 km away.

name: La Maison Molières
description:
La Maison Molières is situated in Montauban. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi.

The holiday home has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go hiking nearby.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 53 km from the holiday home.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Les Portes de Montauban
description:
Set in Montauban, 42 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely, Sure Hotel by Best Western Les Portes de Montauban offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

The hotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Zénith de Toulouse is 44 km from Sure Hotel by Best Western Les Portes de Montauban, while Toulouse Stadium is 46 km from the property. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 43 km away.

name: DORMIR A MONTAUBAN Logements Carreyrat Calme et Verdoyant
description:
Situated in Montauban, DORMIR A MONTAUBAN Logements Carreyrat Calme et Verdoyant features accommodation with seating area. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

All units are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a outdoor furniture. Units have a kettle and a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some rooms also boast a fully equipped kitchen fitted with a dishwasher. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A children's playground is also available at the apartment, while guests can also relax in the garden.

Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 54 km from the property.

name: Appartement Cosy en Centre ville
description:
Appartement Cosy en Centre ville is situated in Montauban. The property has city views. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

The recently renovated apartment features 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: L'authentique
description:
A recently renovated apartment, L'authentique offers accommodation in Montauban. Free WiFi is included throughout the property.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 51 km from the apartment.

name: B&B HOTEL Montauban
description:
Hôtel B&B Montauban is located north of Montauban, a 50-minute drive from the centre of Toulouse, a 65-minute drive from the Aveyron gorges and a 45-minute drive from Cahors. Free WiFi access is available.

The air-conditioned guest rooms have a flat screen TV,  All rooms include a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available at the hotel for an additional charge, and children benefit from a reduced rate for breakfast.

The nearest airport is Blagnac Airport, a 40-minute drive from the hotel. The property offers free parking.

name: Echappée Belle à Montauban - garage
description:
Echappée Belle à Montauban - garage is situated in Montauban. This 3-star apartment offers a lift and private check-in and check-out. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Montauban, like fishing, canoeing and hiking. Walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 52 km from Echappée Belle à Montauban - garage.

name: Abbaye des Capucins Spa & Resort
description:
Abbaye des Capucins Spa & Resort is located in Montauban, a 30-minute drive from Toulouse. It offers free access to the outdoor pool, spa centre and fitness room with cardio gym equipment.

Abbaye des Capucins Spa & Resort offers soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning. Each guest room has a private bathroom and some have a terrace viewing the River Tarn. At an extra cost, guests can have breakfast in the comfort of their rooms.

Guests can also enjoy a meal in the hotel's brasserie called Le Bistro des Capucins.

Massage and beauty treatments are available at the Abbaye des Capucins Spa & Resort . There is a business centre and free private parking.

name: Hôtel du Commerce
description:
Located in the centre of Montauban, Hôtel du Commerce offers soundproofed guest rooms set in a renovated, 18th-century house with a lift. The hotel is 100 metres from the Ingres Museum and 1 km from Montauban Train Station.

With a unique décor, all of the rooms at Hôtel du Commerce have a flat-screen TV. Each room also features a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bath or a shower. Some of the rooms are equipped with air conditioning.

Each morning you can choose between a continental and an English buffet breakfast, which can be served in the communal lounge or in the comfort of your room. There is a restaurant just 5 metres from the hotel.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Public parking is possible near Hôtel du Commerce, with an extra cost, and A20 Motorway Exit is 2.5 km away.

name: Hypercentre, Calme, Cosy, Parking Gratuit, Netflix Gratuit
description:
Located 2.8 km from Zénith de Toulouse and 3.4 km from Toulouse Stadium in the centre of Toulouse, Hypercentre, Calme, Cosy, Parking Gratuit, Netflix Gratuit provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property features inner courtyard views and is 6.2 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely and 13 km from Diagora Convention Centre. The accommodation offers a lift and full-day security for guests.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with city views. The unit has soundproofing and a walk-in shower. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Le Pont Neuf, Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station and Compans Caffarelli Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 7 km away.

name: Lombard
description:
Lombard offers accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Toulouse, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. There is a private entrance at the holiday home for the convenience of those who stay. The holiday home features family rooms.

At the holiday home, the units are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units at the holiday home come with a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the holiday home include Le Pont Neuf, Carmes Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 8 km away.

name: Le cozy, Jean Jaurès
description:
Le cozy, Jean Jaurès is set in the Toulouse City-Centre district of Toulouse, 5.2 km from Toulouse Stadium, 8.1 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely and 10 km from Diagora Convention Centre. The property is situated 700 metres from Marengo-SNCF Metro Station, 1.1 km from Place du Capitole and 700 metres from Toulouse-Matabiau Station. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 4.6 km from Zénith de Toulouse.

This apartment comes with a living room and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Capitole Metro Station, Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station and Jean-Jaures Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 9 km away.

name: Hotel Ours Blanc - Centre
description:
The Hotel Ours Blanc is located on the Place Victor Hugo, in central Toulouse. The Hotel Ours Blanc is situated 200 metres from Jeanne d’Arc Metro Station. Toulouse Stadium is 4 km from the property. Free WiFi is available in common areas.

Each guest room is soundproofed, air-conditioned and has a TV and high speed WiFi access.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast. You will find numerous restaurants nearby.

Guests can visit the nearby theatres, Gaumont and UCG cinemas. Hotel Ours Blanc – Centre can also visit the nearby Canal du Midi, the Place du Capitole and the Victor Hugo Market.

name: ibis budget Toulouse Centre Gare
description:
Set in Toulouse city centre, 8 km from Toulouse Blagnac Airport and 6 km from Toulouse Stadium, ibis budget Toulouse Centre has 24-hour front desk, free Wi-Fi, free on-site parking and soundproofed rooms. Please note that it is a non smoking hotel

All rooms at ibis budget Toulouse Centre have a private bathroom with toilet and shower, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is available and it can be eaten in the breakfast room or on the terrace. It includes fresh croissants, a wide selection of breads, cereals, brioches, chocolate spread, jams, honey, fresh fruit salad, yogurts, cheeses, hot drinks, and fruit juices.

The convention centre and a swimming pool can be found 1.5 km from ibis budget Toulouse Centre. Matabiau Train Station is 1 km from the hotel.

name: Sainte-Catherine by Yumē
description:
Sainte-Catherine by Yumē is set in the Toulouse South-East district of Toulouse, 4.5 km from Zénith de Toulouse, 7.4 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely and 10 km from Diagora Convention Centre. The property is around 1.3 km from Le Pont Neuf, 1.9 km from Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station and 1.7 km from Capitole Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from Toulouse Stadium.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Carmes Metro Station, Jardin Royal and Esquirol Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 9 km away.

name: Odalys City Toulouse Centre Compans Caffarelli
description:
Odalys City Toulouse Centre Compans Caffarelli provides accommodation located 1.6 km from the centre of Toulouse and offers a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are free shuttle service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel features family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

At the aparthotel, each unit is equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and fridge are also provided, as well as a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, pancakes and fruits are available. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Guests at the aparthotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Toulouse, like walking tours.

Popular points of interest near Odalys City Toulouse Centre Compans Caffarelli include Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden, Compans Caffarelli Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 6 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description:
Set in Toulouse, 4.4 km from Toulouse Stadium and 7.4 km from Zénith de Toulouse, Toulouse grand T2 climatisé Proche Place Dupuy offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 9.4 km from Diagora Convention Centre, 1.6 km from Place du Capitole and 1.4 km from Esquirol Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 9 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Jardin Royal, Capitole Metro Station and Jean-Jaures Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 9 km from Toulouse grand T2 climatisé Proche Place Dupuy.

description:
Ibis Styles Toulouse Capitole is located in Toulouse's historic centre, on Place du Capitole. It offers bedrooms renovated in 2017.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in a pleasant open space on the inner courtyard and patio.

Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception and luggage storage.

Ibis Styles Toulouse Capitole is 4 km from Toulouse Stadium and less than a kilometer from Toulouse SNCF Train Station. The nearby Capitole Metro Station provides access to Toulouse’s main attractions, including the St. Sernin Basilica.

description:
Located in the centre of Toulouse, Mercure Toulouse Saint-Georges is just 50 metres from Place Wilson and 3.5 km from Toulouse Stadium. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi access, a terrace with a swimming lane.

Rooms at the Toulouse Saint-Georges are equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom and all are serviced by an elevator.

The accommodation also offers a bar, laundry service, room service, buffet breakfast. There is also a 24-hour front desk.

The Saint-Georges is 300 metres from Toulouse's City Hall set on the Capitole Place and 100 metres from Jean-Jaurès Metro Station, which allows access to all of Toulouse. A public car park is conveniently located beneath the hotel.

name: Hotel Ours Blanc - Wilson
description:
Located in the very heart of Toulouse, Hotels Ours Blanc is in a prime position close to the Wilson, Victor Hugo and Capitole squares. Toulouse Stadium is 3.5 km away.

Hotel Ours Blanc - Wilson boasts 32 elegantly decorated rooms in which to enjoy a quiet and relaxing atmosphere. All rooms are soundproofed, air-conditioned and offer wireless internet access.

The hotel enjoys a central location in the heart of Toulouse, near cinemas, department stores, theatres, museums,and restaurants. Make sure you spend some time discovering the famous Canal du Midi, one of Unesco's World Heritage sites.

description:

description:

Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a restaurant. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

At the hotel, every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms include a kitchenette fitted with a fridge. The rooms have a safety deposit box.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options.

You can play billiards and table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling.

With staff speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, round-the-clock advice is available at the reception.

Popular points of interest near The Social Hub Toulouse include Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden, Compans Caffarelli Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 6 km from the property.
