description:
Situated conveniently in the centre of Toulouse, OVYO Hôtel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At OVYO Hôtel all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available at the property.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Le Pont Neuf, Carmes Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 8 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description:

All units in the aparthotel are fitted with a coffee machine. The aparthotel features some units that feature quiet street views, and the units have a private bathroom and a desk. At the aparthotel, units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden, Compans Caffarelli Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 6 km from the property.

description:

description:

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The unit at the property features a walk-in shower and a dressing room. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

description:

The holiday home has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the holiday home.

description:

description:

Offering a bar, the property is located within 1.8 km of Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a private bathroom and bed linen.

Guests at Eklo Toulouse can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay.

Toulouse Stadium is 4.8 km from the accommodation, while Diagora Convention Centre is 14 km from the property. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 3 km away.

name: Plaza Hotel Capitole Toulouse
description:
The 4* Plaza Hotel (formely Crowne Plaza) is ideally located in the heart of the city, 200meters from Capitole underground train network, 10km from Blagnac Airport and 15km from the Exhibition & Convention Center MEETT.
The Capitole Opera House is 200meters from the hotel & Pierre Baudis Convention Center is a 10-minutes walk.

In each of our 162 rooms & suites, a work desk area, TV Plasma screen, a bathroom with bathtub, safe box, Wifi, Tea/Coffe maker, telephones.
Some of our rooms offer a view over the Capitole Square.

The Continental buffet breakfast breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 06h30AM to 10h30AM and Saturday-Sunday till 11h00AM.
The restaurant-Bar “L’Atrium” is open daily for lunch and dinner. The Chef proposes delicious homemade dishes prepared with fresh and local products. The Atrium Bar welcomes you to enjoy a wide range of cocktails and drinks.

Our reception is open 24/7 all year round. And a free WIFI is available throughout the hotel.
The fitness center, reserved only for the hotel’s clients, is open daily from 06h30AM to 10h00PM.

Many tourist attractions are within walking distance from the hotel: Saint Sernin Cathedral, Couvent des Jacobins, Les Augustins Museum, Garonne river.

This is our guests' favorite part of Toulouse, according to independent reviews.

name: 101 Cour de la Bastide
description:

A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units feature a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Guests at Appartement Lila will be able to enjoy activities in and around Carcassonne, like hiking.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the holiday home. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Carcassonne Cathedral is 3.3 km from Le Cosy Occitan villa chaleureuse indépendante baignoire terrasse jardin, while Memorial House (Maison des Memoires) is 3.4 km from the property. Carcassonne Airport is 3 km away.

On the terrace or in the dining room, you can enjoy the B&B’s continental breakfast. A range of drinks are available from the bar, while the restaurant serves French and local cuisine in the form of set menus.

We kindly inform you, despite some pictures we can't erase on the internet, the hotel doesn’t have a swimming pool any longer.

The rooftop swimming pool is heated (from April to 31 st of October) and the Hot tub / Jacuzzi are free access and open from 9:00am until 9:00 pm

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning with the option to dine (snacks only) in the comfort of guest rooms. Madeloc also offers free WiFi throughout the property.

A gift shop is also available and offers local produce.

linen/towel are not included

A buffet breakfast is served daily in Hôtel La Casa Pairal’s breakfast room, or in guests’ rooms upon request. Drinks are served in the hotel’s garden area.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guests can have a continental breakfast every morning in the dining room or in the garden at Le Mirage. A range of restaurants and a grocery store can be found within 200 metres of the property.

This hotel is a 30-minute drive from Arles and 4 km from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Les Rizières
description:

Air-conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar feature in the rooms. Free WiFi internet access is available throughout the hotel.

Less than 10 km from Les Rizières is the Camargue National Park and the sea is just 2.8 km away.

Please note that a maximum of  1 pet is allowed per room.  Please note that the property can only allow pets with a maximum weight of 15 kilos. An extra charge may apply.

Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. Hôtel Le Neptune en Camargue provides certain rooms with city views, and each room is fitted with a coffee machine. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Crin Blanc Beach is 500 metres from Hôtel Le Neptune en Camargue, while Arles Amphitheatre is 39 km away. Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 41 km from the property.

description:

The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Amphora Beach, and guests can benefit from on-site private parking and complimentary WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Arenas Beach.

The apartment with a balcony and city views has 1 bedroom, 2 living rooms, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the quiet street views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, like cycling, hiking and walking tours.

Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 41 km from the property.

description:
Bleu Marine is just 150 metres from Mediterranean beaches and 300 metres from the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer village. It features a fenced, outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and free Wi-Fi.

Several rooms at Hotel Le Bleu Marine have a balcony with pool view. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning. Many shops and restaurants are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Hot and cold drinks are available upon request.

There is a thalassotherapy centre just 100 metres from the hotel's door.

Hotel Le Bleu Marine is 40 km from Arles and 60 km from Montpellier. Free parking is available on site.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all guest rooms at Hôtel Casa Marina have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also offer a terrace. All rooms have a safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is available at the accommodation.

Arenas Beach is 400 metres from Hôtel Casa Marina, while Crin Blanc Beach is less than 1 km from the property. Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 41 km away.

We will have the pleasure to serve you on your terrace, at sunset, an aperitif accompanied by tapas to satisfy your gluttony or your appetite.

Zenith Sud Montpellier is 26 km from La Maison du Môle, while Odysseum Shopping Centre is 27 km from the property. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 27 km away.

Set in small and terraced houses, the apartments at Résidence Odalys Le Mas des Flamants offer a private patio or garden. A TV and Wi-Fi access are also available with an extra cost.

Meals can be prepared in the accommodation’s kitchenette and enjoyed in the small dining area. Each kitchenette includes hotplates, a microwave and a dishwasher.

One free parking space is offered per apartment and an on-site launderette is also at your disposal. Local activities include walking the 5 minutes to the town centre or relaxing on Port-Camargue Beach, 7 km away.

name: La Villa Mazarin
description:
Property Description
Set in a building dating from the 15th century, La Villa Mazarin is located in the fortified city of Aigues-Mortes. It offers a terrace and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The guest rooms have air conditioning, heating, satellite TV, a telephone and a fridge. All rooms are furnished in 17th-century Provençale style.

In the hotel's restaurant, La Table, you can enjoy French culinary specialties or choose from a selection of light meals and snacks. The salon opens onto the courtyard and sun terrace. The restaurant is open in the evenings from Wednesday to Sunday from 7pm to 9pm, and only at weekends for lunch (noon to 1pm).
Closed on Mondays and Tuesdays.

The Villa Mazarin has a private underground car park 1.85 m high.
This option, which costs €18 per day per vehicle, must be booked in advance (subject to availability, as the number of spaces is limited).

Your pet (dog or cat) is welcome (ON RESERVATION - one pet per room - supplement of €25 per day applies). Please contact us beforehand.

Our relaxation area is available until midnight (sauna, steam room, fitness room, swimming pool heated between 23° and 26°).

Montpellier is 35 km from La Villa Mazarin, while Nîmes is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Mediterranee Airport, 25 km from the property.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like cycling and canoeing.

Arles Amphitheatre is 40 km from My Pad Provence 2, while Parc Expo Nîmes is 48 km away.

name: ApartHotel Sainte-Marthe
description:
Located opposite the Université Sainte Marthe, just a 15-minute walk from the Palais des Papes and the historical centre of Avignon, Apart'Hotel Sainte-Marthe offers self-catering apartments and free WiFi access throughout. Splashworld Waterpark is 23 km away.

The air-conditioned apartments feature a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe, a fully-equipped kitchenette, and the private bathrooms are complete with a shower or bathtub.

Some apartments have a terrace with views of Avignon, and some apartments have easy access for people with reduced mobility.

A continental buffet breakfast is available onsite daily from 07:30 to 10:00, upon reservation and for an extra charge.

Apart'Hotel Sainte-Marthe is a 5-minute drive from Avignon Train Station, free public parking is possible nearby and private parking is available on site with a supplement.

If you are arriving by foot, you can access the property via boulevard Limbert. If you are arriving by car, the Apart'Hotel can be accessed via rue du Théâtre.

name: Hôtel Les Corps Saints
description:
Hôtel Les Corps Saints boasts a location facing Agricol Perdiguier Square in Avignon's historic city centre, 5 minutes' walk from the train station. The rooms include free WiFi. Corps Saints Square is 80 metres from the hotel.

Only accessible by stairs, the rooms come with a TV and have a private bathroom with a shower.

For an additional fee, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast with cheese, pastries, cold meat, jams, yogurt, boiled and hard boiled eggs. Another breakfast option called 'Bistrot' is available and includes fruit juices, unlimited hot drinks, croissants, fresh bread, jams and homemade butter. Restaurants can be found less than 100 metres away.

Papal Palace is a 10 minutes' walk away. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. Avignon TGV train station is 15 km away.

name: La Banasterie
description:
La Banasterie is the oldest B&B in Avignon, dating back to the year 1521 and it is located in the heart of the city just 50 metres from the Palais des Papes. It offers a terrace, flowered patio and library.

Individually decorated, all air-conditioned rooms, TV, wardrobe and a Nespresso coffee machine, and Damman teas. The en suite bathroom is complete with a hairdryer and free eco-friendly toiletries.

A continental breakfast is provided each morning at La Banasterie. Guests can also sample traditional cuisine in the restaurants found within walking distance. Four lounges are available, one includes a bar and an other features a library.

The famous Pont d’Avignon is just a 3-minute walk away and the Cathedral is 50 metres from the B&B. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout and Avignon Airport is ideally located 15 km away. Public parking is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: My Pad Provence 6
description:
In the Avignon City Centre district of Avignon, close to Papal Palace, My Pad Provence 6 has a terrace, free WiFi and a washing machine. The 4-star apartment is 5.7 km from Avignon TGV Train Station. The property is 1.6 km from Avignon Central Station, and within 800 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is offered. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Parc des Expositions Avignon is 11 km from the apartment, while Arles Amphitheatre is 41 km from the property.

name: Maison Lumière - Appart. T2 architecte intra-muros
description:
In the heart of Avignon, set within a short distance of Papal Palace and Avignon Central Station, Maison Lumière - Appart. T2 architecte intra-muros offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. It is situated 11 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon and offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.9 km from Avignon TGV Train Station.

The recently renovated apartment is fitted with 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like walking tours.

Arles Amphitheatre is 41 km from Maison Lumière - Appart. T2 architecte intra-muros, while Pont d'Avignon is less than 1 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Bristol
description:
Ideally located inside the ramparts in the centre of Avignon, Hôtel Le Bristol offers air-conditioned rooms, a bar, free WiFi and a shared lounge. There is also a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service.

Just a 15-minute walk to the Palais des Papes, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at Hôtel Le Bristol can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 9 km from Hôtel Le Bristol.

name: La Chambre Cézanne
description:
Boasting a garden, private pool and garden views, La Chambre Cézanne is situated in Aix-en-Provence. Housed in a building dating from 2021, this bed and breakfast is 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 31 km from Joliette Metro Station. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The unit is air conditioned and is comprised of a terrace with outdoor furniture as well as a flat-screen TV with streaming services. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 32 km from the bed and breakfast, while Vieux Port Metro station is 32 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km away.

name: Appartement de Charme
description:
Situated in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Appartement de Charme features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The air-conditioned accommodation is 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 31 km from Joliette Metro Station.

The recently renovated apartment has 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property offers quiet street views.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 32 km from the apartment, while Vieux Port Metro station is 33 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km away.

name: Bon Pasteur
description:
Set in Aix-en-Provence, 31 km from Joliette Metro Station and 32 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Bon Pasteur provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is around 32 km from Vieux Port Metro station, 32 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and 32 km from Castellane Metro Station. The property is 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Saint-Ferreol Street is 32 km from the apartment, while La Timone Metro Station is 34 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km away.

name: Bel Appartement dans le centre d'Aix-en-Provence
description:
Located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 31 km from Joliette Metro Station, Bel Appartement dans le centre d'Aix-en-Provence offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is set 32 km from Vieux Port Metro station, 32 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and 33 km from Castellane Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 32 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre.

The apartment is equipped with 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and microwave, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Saint-Ferreol Street is 33 km from the apartment, while La Timone Metro Station is 34 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km from the property.

name: Domaine de Saint Clair
description:
Domaine de Saint Clair is an adults-only Bed&Breakfast located just 3.3 km (10 minutes) from the historic center of Aix-en-Provence.

The guest rooms at Domaine de Saint Clair are located in a Provençal house, independent of the mansion. The Domaine de Saint Clair offers only 3 spacious suites to guarantee peace and privacy, in a privileged setting. The suites of 30 m2 each are recently restored and warmly decorated.

The house is fully air-conditioned and has free Wi-Fi internet access.

All suites overlook a large shared terrace with a view of a wooded garden. Their private bathroom has a walk-in shower and all necessary amenities.

The Domaine offers a large outdoor swimming pool, open in season, sunny all day and lined with century-old pines providing shade in the garden surrounding the swimming pool.

A continental breakfast is served on the seasonal terrace or in the breakfast room.

The Estate benefits from an exceptional location, offering the tranquility of the Aix countryside and proximity to the bustling city all year round, with its narrow streets, rich mansions, magnificent fountains and café terraces...

Secure private parking is available free of charge.

The Luberon region is a 25-minute drive away from Domaine de Saint Clair and Les Baux-de-Provence in the Alpilles region is 44 minutes from the property.
Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.6 for a two-person trip.

name: Hôtel Particulier le 28
description:
Featuring a private garden with 2 terraces and an on-site restaurant, Hôtel Particulier le 28 is located in Aix-en-Provence. Private parking is available on site. The swimming pool and spa are located in a spa 250 meters from the hotel. Our guests benefit from special rates and advantages. The spa is open from 10 am to 5.30 PM. Acces and treatment on reservation

The air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. Hôtel Particulier le 28 features free WiFi.

Breakfast with local products is available. Guests can dine in the garden. There is also a babysitting service offered at the property.

Cours Mirabeau is 200 metres from Hôtel Particulier le 28, while Saint-Sauveur Cathedral is 800 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Hôtel Particulier le 28.

name: Le Petit Patio
description:
Located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 31 km from Joliette Metro Station, Le Petit Patio offers free WiFi, a terrace and air conditioning. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is non-smoking and is set 32 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Vieux Port Metro station is 32 km from the apartment, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 32 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km from the property.

name: Le Pigonnet - Esprit de France
description:
This iconic hotel in Aix-en-Provence, renowned for its French gardens and fountains, celebrated its centenary under the theme of renewal. Jacques Garcia redesigned the reception area, the Bar, and the Pigonnet's restaurant, La Table du Pigonnet.

A new experience, Les Amis, invites guests to savor the flavors of Provence with conviviality, whether in the gardens, at the bar, or in the comfort of their room, thanks to a versatile menu showcasing local flavors, available to enjoy in various settings. This new place celebrates those who have brought life and soul to this century-old residence through their art —writing, composing music, painting—and by commemorating life’s milestones such as birthdays, engagements, and other cherished moments.

Among the 55 rooms, three exceptional suites have been created, opening onto terraces and sitting areas with views of the lush surroundings. The bastide, nestled in the heart of three hectares, shares this haven of peace with two villas, perfect for private moments.

A new 350 m² spa, called Folie Verte, is expected in spring 2025. This wellness offering will celebrate the gardens and poetry of Le Pigonnet with holistic treatments, including body care, HydraFacial, singing lessons, and art therapy.

Conveniently located just steps from the vibrant heart of Aix-en-Provence, this century-old residence, a member of the Esprit de France – Hôtels & Demeures collection, reinvents the art of Provençal living.

name: Chambre style balinais
description:
Chambre style balinais in Aix-en-Provence features accommodation with free WiFi, 32 km from Joliette Metro Station, 33 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 33 km from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is situated 33 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, 33 km from Castellane Metro Station and 33 km from Saint-Ferreol Street. The property is 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

The spacious bed and breakfast has a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

La Timone Metro Station is 34 km from the bed and breakfast, while Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 35 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km away.

name: Centre d'Aix - charmant appartement 1 chambre Pythagore avec parking
description:
Located 30 km from Joliette Metro Station, 31 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 31 km from Vieux Port Metro station, Centre d'Aix - charmant appartement 1 chambre Pythagore avec parking provides accommodation set in Aix-en-Provence. This apartment features free private parking, a lift and free WiFi. The property is soundproof and is situated 30 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a hot tub and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 31 km from the apartment, while Castellane Metro Station is 32 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 26 km away.

name: Studio centre historique 200 m de la mairie - Climatisé
description:
Offering city views, Studio centre historique 200 m de la mairie - Climatisé is an accommodation set in Aix-en-Provence, 32 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 32 km from Vieux Port Metro station. It is located 31 km from Joliette Metro Station and offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a cable flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 32 km from the apartment, while Castellane Metro Station is 32 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Paul
description:
Centrally located in Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Paul is only 150 metres from the Spa, the Palais des Festivals and the historical part of the city. It features a garden with a terrace area. Free WiFi is available in all the rooms.

Accessed via stairs, the guestrooms at Hotel Paul feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a fan. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

During the summer months, guests can relax in Paul Hotel's garden, which features tables and chairs with sun shades. There is also a TV room.

Every morning a continental breakfast is served for an extra charge. For lunch and dinner, guests can choose from a range of cafes and restaurants found within 400 metres of the property.

Aix-en-Provence train station is 1.5 km from the hotel and Marseille Marignane airport is 30 km away. Marseille is 35.5 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, 30 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Joliette Metro Station is 30 km from The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 31 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 26 km away.

name: Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery
description:
Located just a 5-minute walk from Cours Mirabeau and the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery is a 4-star hotel featuring a heated seasonal outdoor pool open from April to the end of september. It also boasts a terrace, a fitness centre and free WiFi access.
Each air-conditioned guest room has been decorated in a contemporary style and includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a safe. The private bathroom comes with either a bath or shower, bathrobes, a hairdryer, slippers and free Occitane toiletries. All rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine.
Traditional French cuisine is served in the hotel's restaurant, La Table du Roi. Guests can enjoy a drink in L'intemporel bar.
Grand Hôtel Roi René - MGallery Collection is 400 metres from the train station. Private parking is available upon request and for an additional fee.

name: Hôtel Bellegarde by Viktor
description:
Featuring a bar, Hôtel Bellegarde by Viktor is located in Aix-en-Provence in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 31 km from Joliette Metro Station. With a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 32 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Guest rooms in Hôtel Bellegarde by Viktor are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Hôtel Bellegarde by Viktor offers a sun terrace.

Vieux Port Metro station is 32 km from the hotel, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 32 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Le Mozart
description:
Located 500 metres from the Granet Museum, Hôtel Le Mozart offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It is easily accessed from Motorway A8, a 3-minute drive away.

Additional facilities in the rooms include an LCD TV with satellite channels. The rooms also provide a telephone and an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a bath or shower.

You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

Free private parking is available onsite. Alternatively, guests can keep their vehicle in the secure garage for a supplementary cost and upon reservation. Electric car charging station is available subject to availability. Newspapers are also available at the 24-hour reception.

name: La Caravelle
description:
In the heart of Aix-en-Provence, the La Caravelle hotel welcomes you less than an 8-minute walk from the Cours Mirabeau, the Granet Museum and the Palais des Congrès.

All rooms have air conditioning, a desk and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A la carte breakfast is served every morning at La Caravelle. A continental breakfast is also available at a reduced rate includes a hot drink, a croissant, a glass of fruit juice, bread, butter and jam.

The hotel includes video surveillance and free computer access in public areas. Public parking is nearby, and a private parking is also available on site for an additional fee (reservation is needed before arrival, 3 spots available)

Establishment undergoing renovation but remains open to the public.
Model photos of the establishment from 2024.

This hotel has been entirely renewed.

name: Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel
description:
Located within a 10-minute walk of the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel boasts free access to a spa with a heated indoor pool, steam room, fitness room, and 2 treatment cabins are also available. It offers a 24-hour front desk, free WiFi and newspapers.

The spacious guest rooms all feature garden or city views. They come with a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Various breakfast options such as American, continental and a breakfast buffet are available for guests. The hotel also offers a bistro and a bar.

Guests can go golfing 3 km away, bowling 1 km away or horse riding 1.9 km away. The Grand Theatre is 200 metres away. Marseille-Marignane Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Villa ELISABETH
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, 31 km from Joliette Metro Station and 32 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Villa ELISABETH offers air conditioning. Located 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, the property provides a garden and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is set 32 km from Vieux Port Metro station.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

A continental breakfast is available at the apartment.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 32 km from Villa ELISABETH, while Castellane Metro Station is 33 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km from the property.

name: L'Escapade Aixoise hyper centre historique studios free netfilx wifi romantics apartments historic center
description:
Located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, just 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 31 km from Joliette Metro Station, L'Escapade Aixoise hyper centre historique studios free netfilx wifi romantics apartments historic center provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is set 32 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, 32 km from Vieux Port Metro station and 32 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. La Timone Metro Station is 34 km away and Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 34 km from the apartment.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Castellane Metro Station is 33 km from the apartment, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 33 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km from the property.

name: Hôtel des Augustins
description:
Located just of the famous Cours Mirabeau in the heart of the old town of Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Les Augustins is set within the walls of a 12th-century convent.

Hotel Les Augustins boasts a subtle blend of historic and modern architecture and a magnificent lobby.

The hotel features spacious rooms combining traditional architecture and modern facilities. Each room provides air conditioning, a TV and a minibar.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of guest rooms. There is also free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel and a 24-hour reception,

name: Séjours & Affaires Aix-en-Provence Mirabeau
description:
This Séjours & Affaires residence is located in Aix-en-Provence near the Cours Mirabeau. It offers furnished studios and free Wi-Fi internet access.

All of the studios at Séjours & Affaires Aix-en-Provence Mirabeau are soundproof and have a complete kitchen area with fridge, microwave, hotplates and dishes. All of them are serviced by a lift.

The studios have fold-out sofa beds, and a house cleaning including the change of linen is provided once a week.

name: Hotel Cardinal
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, within 800 metres of Cours Mirabeau and Saint-Sauveur Cathedral, Hotel Cardinal features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Attractions in the area include Aix-en-Provence Congress Centre, a 3-minute walk away.

The individually decorated rooms and suites in the hotel are equipped with a desk. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette, a microwave, a fridge, a stovetop and a coffee machine.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

name: Sublime Pépite Vieux Port 2p Vue Imprenable
description:
Offering free WiFi and sea views, Sublime Pépite Vieux Port 2p Vue Imprenable is an accommodation located in a central area of Marseille, just 1.4 km from Plage des Catalans and 600 metres from Vieux Port Metro station. With city views, this accommodation provides a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.4 km from Fausse Monnaie.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palais du Pharo, Saint-Ferreol Street and Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km away.

name: The Babel Community - République - Joliette
description:
Situated conveniently in Marseille, The Babel Community - République - Joliette offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Vieux Port Metro station, a 7-minute walk from Joliette Metro Station and 800 metres from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The accommodation features evening entertainment and a concierge service.

The units come with a fridge, dishwasher, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom, rooms at the hotel also have a city view. At The Babel Community - République - Joliette all rooms come with a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Saint-Ferreol Street and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km away.

name: Appartement Vieux-Port de Marseille - Opéra
description:
In the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, close to Vieux Port Metro station, Appartement Vieux-Port de Marseille - Opéra has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 2.9 km from Fausse Monnaie. The property is 2 km from Plage des Catalans, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station and Joliette Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km from the property.

name: Hotel Marsiho by Happyculture
description:
Located in the centre of Marseille, Hotel Marsiho by Happyculture offers 51 rooms with modern décor and free WiFi. With a 24-hour reception, it is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Port of Marseille.

All the soundproofed rooms feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Each also includes a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Each morning, the property offers a buffet breakfast to be enjoyed on site.

Guests can enjoy a mobile charging station and a Nespresso coffee machine in the public area.

La Canebière is just 350 metres from the hotel and Saint-Charles Train Station is 800 metres away.

name: Zenitude Hôtel Résidences Marseille Saint-Charles
description:
Located in Marseille, Zenitude Hôtel Résidences Marseille Saint-Charles is a residence just a 5-minute walk from Saint-Charles Train Station, a 12-minute walk from the Old Port and 5 metro stops away from the Palais des Congrès et des Expositions de Marseille. It offers a 24-hour front desk, air conditioning and self-catering accommodation with free WiFi.

Studios and apartments at Zenitude Hôtel Résidences Marseille Saint-Charles are serviced by a lift and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathtub. Some are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the dining room. Each accommodation type has a kitchen equipped with kitchenware, a refrigerator and a dishwasher.

Zenitude Hôtel Résidences Marseille Saint-Charles is a 15-minute walk from the Opera and Marseille’s Cathedral is 1 km away. Public parking is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: Hotel Le M
description:
Well set in the Castellane et Préfecture district of Marseille, Hotel Le M is located 2.7 km from Plage des Catalans, 600 metres from Castellane Metro Station and 500 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge, room service and free WiFi. The accommodation provides a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Every room is equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at Hotel Le M have a city view. All units include a safety deposit box.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Arabic, German, English and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area.

Vieux Port Metro station is less than 1 km from Hotel Le M, while Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is a 17-minute walk away. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km from the property.

name: Mouchki
description:
In a prime location in the Saint-Charles district of Marseille, Mouchki is located 2.7 km from Plage des Catalans, less than 1 km from Vieux Port Metro station and a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The property is around 1.9 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, 2 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and 2.9 km from La Timone Metro Station. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features a hot tub.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes.

Guests at Mouchki can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Castellane Metro Station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Joliette Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km away.

name: Hostel Vertigo Vieux-Port
description:
Hostel Vertigo Vieux Port is located 5 minutes from the old port. Its central location means you can enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.
The first beach is a 15-minute walk away, France's oldest district, the Panier, is 20 minutes away, as is the iconic Bonne Mère, Notre Dame de la Garde cathedral, but be prepared to climb. It's worth it: the views and sunsets are magical! It's a perfect place to have a drink.
Auberge Vertigo is also close to metro, buses and tramway lines, so you can hike in the incredible Parc National des Calanques, stroll the streets, enjoy the beaches and the Mediterranean, and visit the surrounding area and Provence !

You'll find dormitories from 2 to 16 beds, spread out in several buildings around a large flourishing courtyard, where you can soak up the sun, have lunch and meet other guests for a drink. You can use the aromatic garden to flavour your dishes.

Two kitchens are available around the clock, as well as chill-out areas.
A laundry service is available.
Sanitary facilities are in the dormitories (several toilets and showers in the 6-, 8- and 16-bed dormitories).
You can arrive at any time; our team is on hand at reception to welcome you 24 hours a day. Chen-in from 3pm, and checked out at 10am, but feel free to come before or stay after, leaving your luggage in the free luggage room, taking advantage of the communal areas and the kitchen...

The Auberge offers an all-you-can-eat breakfast, served from 8am to 10am, for 6 euros.

The rooms and communal areas are equipped with air conditioning and heating, as well as Wi-Fi.

You can also enjoy the Vertigo bar-restaurant, on the corner of the street, from Tuesday to Saturday, from 6pm to 2am: tapas, bistro, cocktails...
Check out all our easter eggs and win a drink at the bar!


How to get there:

- From Gare Saint-Charles: Line 1, direction La Fourragère, Vieux Port or Estrangin station (15 minutes)
- Parking: Cours d'Estienne d'Orves car park (3 minutes)
https://www.indigoneo.fr/fr/parkings/17103/parking-estienne-dorves

- Le Vélo terminal (city bicycles) on the corner of the street


When you arrive, don't hesitate to ask the team for advice, they'll be delighted to help you discover our beautiful city, and scan the QR codes under your bed to find out about our favourite addresses!

name: Hôtel Hermès
description:
Hôtel Hermès is just 35 metres from the Vieux Port in central Marseilles. It offers a roof-top terrace with panoramic views of the harbour and the city, and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Hermès has a partial view of the Vieux Port. They are soundproofed and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and private bathrooms.

The hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning, served in the dining room.

The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from the Hermès hotel. The Saint Charles SNCF Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Le Fortia - Nid douillet sur le Vieux-Port de Marseille
description:
Right in the centre of Marseille, situated within a short distance of Plage des Catalans and Vieux Port Metro station, Le Fortia - Nid douillet sur le Vieux-Port de Marseille offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 2 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, 1.5 km from Palais du Pharo and 1.4 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Fausse Monnaie.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station and Joliette Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km from the property.

name: L'Amarrage
description:
Located in Marseille, 2.6 km from Fausse Monnaie and 2.8 km from Plage de Maldorme, L'Amarrage provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.8 km from Joliette Metro Station, 2 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 1.4 km from Palais du Pharo. The property is 1.6 km from Plage des Catalans, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Vieux Port Metro station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km away.

name: ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles
description:
Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles is located opposite St-Charles SNCF Train Station and is an 8-minute walk from the Old Port. Palais des Congrès, Marseille Exhibition Centre and the Vélodrome Stadium are an 8-minute metro ride away and the hotel offers free WiFi access.

Rooms at Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles are decorated in a contemporary style and feature an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each one is accessed by a lift, air-conditioned and has an en suite bathroom with a shower. Some rooms are available for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast of fresh croissants and fruit juice is offered every morning at Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles and is served in the dining room or on the terrace. The hotel also has a bar where guests can enjoy an aperitif before dining in the nearby restaurants.

Additional hotel facilities include luggage storage at reception. There is a paid car park at the St-Charles SNCF Train Station. Notre Dame de la Garde is 2.5 km away.

name: Marseille City Chambres&Appartements
description:
Marseille City Chambres&Appartements offers rooms and apartments located a 10-minute walk from Marseille’s Old Port and from Saint-Charles, the main train station. It features free Wi-Fi access.

The air-conditioned rooms includes a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The apartments come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen. There is a bathroom with a shower, a towel warmer and a toilet.

You will find bars and restaurants within 200 metres of the property. La Canebière, Marseille’s historic high street, is a 10-minute walk away as well as the EuroMéditerranée business district.

name: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles by IHG
description:
Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles is opposite the train station and a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port in Marseille’s city centre. It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles are soundproofed and feature a modern décor. Each is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A complimentary breakfast is offered and Le Mistral bar serves light meals. Guests can relax on the outdoor terrace. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk and a laundry service for an additional charge.

Saint-Charles Metro (lines 1 and 2), provide direct access to Parc Chanot and the city centre. Accessible from the A7, the hotel also offers private parking for an additional fee.

name: Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port is set in an 18th-century stone building opposite the Vieux Port in Marseille's city centre. Recently renovated It offers panoramic harbour views and rooms with free WiFi. The property features a lift that runs from the first floor and staircase access to reception and the first floor.

Each guest room at Life is soundproofed, air conditioned and has a view of the harbour or the courtyard. There is a flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms are equipped with a bath or a shower and eco-friendly toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, served in the lobby. The staff at Life are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The lobby is also a place where you can meet other guests staying at the hotel.

Life Hotel is 100 metres from the Vieux-Port Metro Station and Marseille's main road, La Canebière. The Saint Charles SNCF Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Residhome Marseille
description:
Residhome Marseille is situated in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille, 2.7 km from Fausse Monnaie and 2.8 km from Plage de Maldorme. Free WiFi is available. Public paid parking is also available nearby.

The aparthotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

Batterie des Lions is 2.8 km from Residhome Marseille, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km from the accommodation.

name: easyHotel Marseille Euromed
description:
Attractively located in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille, easyHotel Marseille Euromed is situated 700 metres from Joliette Metro Station, less than 1 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and a 17-minute walk from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 1.9 km away and Vieux Port Metro station is 1.9 km from the hotel.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

EasyHotel Marseille Euromed offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay.

Castellane Metro Station is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 3.4 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 20 km away.

name: Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles
description:
Set in Marseille, just a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint Charles Train Station, Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles features a garden and free WiFi. The hotel is easily accessible from A7 highway. Secured parking is provided but parking spots are limited and cannot be booked in advance.

The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille's Old Port is 1.1 km from the accommodation and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 20 minutes' walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles.

name: Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port
description:
Well located in the centre of Marseille, Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port provides air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the hotel, each room comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available at Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Vieux Port Metro station, Castellane Metro Station and Saint-Ferreol Street. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km away.

name: The Babel Community Hôtel - Vieux Port
description:
Set within 3 km of Fausse Monnaie and 1.2 km of Castellane Metro Station, The Babel Community Hôtel - Vieux Port offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Marseille. It is situated 300 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street and features a lift. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 2.1 km from Plage des Catalans.

The units in the aparthotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, units at the aparthotel also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms here will provide you with a terrace. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

A restaurant, coffee shop and bar can be found on-site.

Fitness classes are available at the property.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Vieux Port Metro station, Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and Joliette Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 23 km away.

name: LES TOITS DU VIEUX-PORT
description:
LES TOITS DU VIEUX-PORT offers accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Marseille, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Castellane Metro Station, and Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. Plage des Catalans is 2 km away and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.2 km from the aparthotel.

Accessible via private entrance, all units have air conditioning, soundproofing, wardrobe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some units feature a seating area and/or a terrace with an outdoor dining area. All units will provide guests with a dressing room and a coffee machine.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Vieux Port Metro station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Joliette Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km from the property.

name: PARADISE Earth & Sea
description:
Providing city views, PARADISE Earth & Sea is located in the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, 2.9 km from Fausse Monnaie and 400 metres from Vieux Port Metro station. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 2 km from Plage des Catalans, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned units have a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, coffee machine, and a fridge. With a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the aparthotel, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station and Joliette Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km away.
